1132112.content:
Do you want Eevee's water type evolution, Vaporeon?

Vaporeon has a unique power that allows it to manipulate or melt into water thanks to its cell composition that is similar to water molecules. Combined with its ability of water absorption, it could even allow the Pokemon to change its own size. Another interesting fact; the human male's body is made up of approximately 60% water which potentially puts the Pokemon's owner in its line of sight regarding possible size changing shenanigans.

There are still many other eeveelutions if this one doesn't float your boat.
1132112.title: Vaporeon

choices: Motions for you to stand back (She grows)
Beckons you closer (She shrinks you)
11321121.content:
The sound of a needy Vaporeon echoed throughout the house as you browsed your computer. Turning around you could see her sitting in the doorway, staring back at you expectantly before letting out another whine. With a smile you give her an exaggerated sigh before you stood up and started to walk towards her. What she desired was to go for a swim. Ever since she was an Eevee she loved swimming and it was no surprise that one day when walking her along the beach she suddenly transformed into the water type evolution. From then on her love for everything water only increased.

The Vaporeon flitted her head back to you as she pitter-pattered down the hallway, making sure that you were still following as she made her way through the house. Luckily for her, your house was situated rather close to both the beach and a large freshwater lake. She enjoyed visiting both places equally but more often than not she chose to swim around the pool in the backyard. While she had access to the pool at any time, she liked either swimming with others or having an audience. Today you were opting to just be a spectator. Watching a Pokemon swim around might sound boring in itself but that wasn't the case with your where Vaporeon was concerned. Her evolution gave her the strange power to manipulate water, an ability she learned to use in the most spectacular ways.

Eventually you reach a sliding glass door with your Vaporeon looking up at you as she waited for you to open it, her thick tail twitching behind her in anticipation. As you slid open the door you could hear her paws slap against the beige sandstone-bricked path as she bolted for the pool. Nearing the pool she catapulted her self into the air and leaped towards the water. It was like she melted straight into the water when she made impact, her body barely producing a ripple in the still pool as her form seemingly disappeared. Barely a moment later the water bent upwards as the form of her head breached the surface, her happy face beaming at you as she began her performance.

You pulled up a wooden deck chair and sat as you got ready to watch her. Vaporeon was an entertainer at heart and always enjoyed turning her swims into a grand show. Every time she came up with new and creative ways to manipulate water, pulling off wild tricks and making fantastical displays. Eventually you started entering her into Pokemon Contests, her abilities allowing her to snag a winning place a lot of the time. For now though, she was performing just for you. You got lost in her displays as the water around her seemed to lose gravity and arrange itself in bizarre patterns.

Moving on to making watery recreations of different Pokemon she met you were awe-struck at how much her abilities were improving. Standing on top of the water as if it was frozen over, a water sculpture of a Charizard was standing looking toward you. The water she used was holding form so well it was like the sculpture was made out of pure, unblemished ice rather than a liquid. You were even more amazed when she started to animate it, making the Charizard move its arms, legs and tail like it was a living being. You watched as it stretched out its wings and braced its leg as if it was about to take off, and at that moment that it would have flown, the sculpture exploded upward in a shower of small droplets.

With the sparkling water trickling back down accompanied by a pretty rainbow, your Vaporeon was proudly staring back at you. You gave her a round of applause as she began leisurely swimming around the pool, her performance coming to an end. "Amazing as always!" You cheer.

Leaning back you close your eyes as you decide to sun-bathe considering she finished her show only to be interrupted by her a couple of moments later. "Eon!" She barked as she tried to grab your attention.

Hanging on to the edge of the pool she looked over to you. It seemed she still had another trick to show you so you stood up and walked closer to the pool to see what she had in store. The excitement on her face was palpable and you had to say, it was infectious. It was obvious she put a lot of effort into this one and desperately wanted to show you.

You watch as she...
11321121.title: Vaporeon's Show

choices: The lake
The ocean
113211211.content:
Vaporeon raised a paw out of the water and made a shooing gesture with it, motioning for you to stand back. Taking a few long steps backwards she gives you an affirmative nod to let you know she was going to begin her new trick. She closed her eyes and took a deep breath. For a few moments nothing seemed to be happening but then you noticed the water surrounding her body was acting strangely. The water started moving towards Vaporeon and seemed to continue flowing into her. You recognized that she was using water absorb, an ability all Vaporeons shared. You've never seen her use it in one of her displays before, though.

As your focus went from the water to Vaporeon herself you noticed something was happening to her, too. It looked like she was getting larger. It started slowly but as you watched her double in size it seemed to pick up speed. You scratched your head as you watched. She had made a giant watery version of herself before but that was transparent and obviously artificial. This, however, looked more authentic. Her body still looked solid rather than liquid as it slowly took up more space in the pool and you swore you could hear a faint sound like leather being pulled. As her feet reached the bottom of the pool she gently perched her front paws on the sandstone surrounding the pool as she slowly opened her eyes and looked down at you with a satisfied grin.

The thought of giant Pokemon always entertained you and you couldn't help but be amazed at how real she was making it look. The water level in the pool was dropping as Vaporeon's increasing size allowed her to absorb water faster and faster. You could just see behind her and how much space she was taking up in the pool, her tail slowly curling around in the pool as it tried to search for more room. Eventually she ran out of water to absorb and her growth crawled to a stop, leaving her about the size of the pool itself.

With her growth finished, Vaporeon shifted her weight and adjusted herself in the pool so that she was standing, making you flinch as she created a series of small tremors. "Vaporeon?" She boomed as if to ask if you liked her new trick.

Doubt began to seed in your mind as you watched her grinning down at you. Her voice grew louder as well... And it felt like her body actually had a solid weight to it. You cautiously approached the giant Vaporeon. Her arms alone were taller than you the fact she was leaning over you as you got closer made you feel even smaller. Reaching a hand out you touch her ankle and feel the flesh on her arm depress as you rub your hand along her smooth skin. You could feel it - a healthy amount of fat and hard muscles underneath as you pushed down even harder. Solid, not liquid.

You look upwards to your Vaporeon in shock as you realize why it all looked so real. It was simply because it was - she absorbed water to make herself bigger! Your now-giant Vaporeon bent down towards you and your vision was obscured as something hot and wet brushed against your face making you stumble backwards. She softly giggled at how flustered you were before she exited the pool and stood at her full height.

"Since when could you do that? That's crazy!" You exclaim. She looked like the same old Vaporeon. Just much, much bigger. With a guess, you assumed she must be a bit taller than 15 feet from her paws to the top of her head.

You also noticed another thing. The only factor that limited how much she grew was how much water was in the pool, so that begged the question... "Can you keep making yourself bigger as long as you have a supply of water?"

"Vaporeon~" She cooed happily, giving a definitive yes.

"Wow." Was all you could mutter. Her body was already truly massive and the concept that she could keep making herself bigger blew your mind. The curious part of you wanted to see that though. To see what ludicrous heights she could grow to. Your thoughts were interrupted as her huge nose pushed into you as she attempted to nuzzle you. She looked at you expectantly with the same look she has when she wants to go out somewhere. It was clear Vaporeon wanted to explore her new ability just as much as you.

"You want to go for a walk somewhere, don't you?" You say as you rub a hand along her cheek. Vaporeon simply nodded and lowered herself to the ground. She motioned her head towards her back and shot you that same expectant look. It took you a moment to piece together what she was asking of you and you broke out into a grin as you realized. She wanted you to ride on her back!

Approaching her you place a hand on her smooth hide and attempt to scale the giant Pokemon, the water type leaning away from you to give a better climbing angle. With a bit of effort you managed to climb up her extremely soft body, holding onto her back tightly as she slowly rose back up to her full height. You let out a chuckle as she took a few experimental steps around the yard, feeling her strong muscles move below you. Vaporeon stopped when she felt you were comfortable and turned her face to the side to look at you. It seemed she wanted you to pick a location to go to.

You managed to narrow your options down to either the nearby lake or the ocean. The lake was surrounded by forest and wasn't that far from town. It was a fairly expansive and you think it would be interesting to see how other Pokemon or even humans would react to your giant Vaporeon. The ocean however also sounded appealing - you could only imagine how big she could make herself in an environment that was mostly water, the perfect testing grounds for learning the limits of your Vaporeon's new ability.

Vaporeon's large tail swayed to and fro as she awaited your decision. Where will you go with her?
113211211.title: The big debut

choices: Explore the oceans
Ask Vaporeon to make herself larger
1132112112.content:
"How about we go to the Ocean?" You asked her. The corner of her mouth curled up into a grin barely a second after the words left your mouth and you jolted as she suddenly went into motion. Judging by her reaction she might have been hoping you would make that suggestion, quickly stepping over the fence of your backyard into a gravel alleyway. Already the sea was visible as the walkway descended a fair distance down to the beach, it's dark glistening water contrasting with the clear light blue sky. Riding on the back of your Vaporeon like she was a regular riding Pokemon like a Rapidash or Gogoat was definately a strange experience, especially since you could see right over the corrugated iron fences into people's backyards on either side of the alley.

Everyone always thinks their Pokemon is special, but as you gave awkward waves to stunned onlookers that were pottering around in their yards until a giant blue creature leisurely strolled by you reckoned that was especially true for your Vaporeon. Myths of giant Pokemon had always been popular throughout the ages but they were exactly that, myths and legends. It made you feel thrilled that your own Pokemon had developed a unique skill that would make suddenly make that concept non-fiction. As you were leaving the confined space of the alley it looked as if Vaporeon was almost as thrilled as you were as more and more people stopped to gawk at her. Whenever she passed by a particularly large group she might give them a cute nod or a flick of her large tail but she still continued her determined march toward the sea.

She took great care to tip-toe on the sidewalk and not disrupt traffic as she descended down the road leading to the beach but her effort was for naught as cars slowed to a halt so their passengers could watch the giant Pokemon pass by. Thankfully the road was short and soon her paws were sinking into the pristine white sand. The commotion of people eager to see what this huge Vaporeon was up to combined with all the beach-goers created a sizable crowd and you were honestly surprised to see that Vaporeon was ignoring. Whenever you were down at the beach with her while it was busy you would often find her migrating over to where the people were to show off her water-manipulating skills and put on a show, yet it seemed today she only wanted to perform for you. For now, at least.

Gracefully as always she delicately entered the water, her body barely upsetting the small waves as they slapped against her her legs. You felt the cool water dampen your feet as she sunk down into the water and sensed the muscles on her back take on a different rhythm as she began to swim. Looking back you could see that she had already put a good distance between herself and the shoreline, the confused people scratching their heads on the beach getting more distant each second while her tail was snaking side-to-side to propel herself faster through the water. Guessing wildly you judged she was going as fast as a speed boat by how hard the wind was hitting your face. You were glad she was able to give you such a smooth ride over the water because you think you would have been thrown off by now.

You just enjoyed the ride as she swam and swam, noticing now and then that your hands would randomly slip off of her coinciding with a sudden burst of increased speed, something that you were beginning to suspect was Vaporeon trying to discreetly make herself larger. In time, she slowed to a stop. Judging by how the land you departed from looked like a thin layer on the horizon, it was obvious she took you out to really deep waters. The waves were rolling wider and higher while the great expanse of deep blue stretched on for what felt like forever in every direction. It made you slightly nervous but the face of your Vaporeon looking excitedly back at you filled you with reassurance that you were safe. "Va-Vaporeon?" She barked to you in a questioning tone. She was asking if you were ready.

Giving her a nod she turned away and she slowly began to descend into the water until you were kicking your legs to stay afloat. Living next to a beach and having an extremely active water Pokemon made you a proficient swimmer but you still hoped she returned soon as you watched the tips of her ears dissipated beneath the waves. A large splash a fair distance away from you caught your attention. A mass of water seemed to 'fall down' into the ocean as if a large chunk of it were removed. Shortly after a large splash twice the size of that occurred as more water got removed. And then one twice as large as that that made the waters crash and foam. You were starting to get worried as you watched the turbulent waves try and restore the disturbance in the water level and felt yourself being pulled towards it until something soft and malleable pushed against your feet.

The water bubbled white and bent upwards as something incredibly large began to breach the surface below you. Like an island emerging out of the sea you began rising as the solid blue ground pushed harder against your feet, making you stagger as you struggled to maintain your balance on the rubbery surface. You yelped as you began to fall over but were relieved when your body came into contact with a dark-blue wall. In a style very unlike Vaporeon's usual grace, water crashed loudly down below you as it ran off her much larger body and as she raised her head higher and higher into the sky you realized that 'wall' you fell against was actually the ridge running down her spine. It took your brain a few seconds to compute the shear enormity she made herself as she had probably made herself quintuple her previous size, if not even larger!

Her white frills on her neck whistled in the wind as she turned her head back to you, a smug look plastered on the side of her face. At a wild guess you assumed she probably grew to be nearly 100 tall. You struggled to prop a shoulder over the ridge of her spine as she carefully began swimming around the water quite slowly and deliberately. It was strange before to feel her strong muscles work as you sat atop her but now with your feet sinking into her expansive hide you could almost feel each cord of muscle tensing and relaxing as she shifted about in the water. It was a testament to how powerful her increase in size made her and frankly, you were awestruck. "Wow..." You muttered under you breath as your admired her in all her enlarged glory.

"Vaporeon?" Her voice boomed out. Even her vocalizations commanded a power about them as they echoed along the waves. The volume even caught her off-guard and she called out to you again, trying to talk to you again in a quieter tone. "Vapor?"

"Huh..." It took you a moment to try and decipher what she wanted considering you were still getting used to reading the facial cues of a creature almost twenty times bigger than you. "Oh. Are you asking me what we should do?"

She nodded. "Vaporeon."

Indeed, it was a good question. A few ideas did come to you, though. For a long time you've wanted to go exploring the ocean; visiting deserted islands or diving into hidden underwater caves. You often fantasized about adventuring through undiscovered places with her but never did though since most of the opportunities that came up required you to join a large group of other people. However, you were now alone with Vaporeon and her larger size would theoretically make traveling to one of these destinations a piece of cake!

Speaking of larger size, you could also ask her to make herself a tad bigger again. Being in the presence of such a large Pokemon that was undeniably loyal to you was exhilarating and If you're out deep as you think you are, the sea floor is still a long, long way down. With plenty of water around for her to absorb you think that she might have been holding back and you were still quite curious to see how far she could take it.

Vaporeon awaited your answer. The choice was yours.
1132112112.title: To the ocean

choices: You decide to play with Vaporeon at your size
You ask Vaporeon to grow you back to normal
You want to see how strong Vaporeon's shrinking power is
113211212.content:
With a simple hand motion, Vaporeon gesture you to come closer. Smiling a bit, maonly because its hard to say no to the adorable pokemon, you decide to humor Vaporeon and see what she wants to show.

"Ok, Vaporeon, what exactly you want-?" Before you could even finish the question, Vaporeon was able to drag you into the pool as soon as you got close enough to the edge. You fell into the pool water and try to swim up to the surface. As you do, you felt a strange feeling on your entire body, but pay no attention to it as yoy got to the surface of the water.

"Vaporeon, what in the world?!" You said as you cough up water and try to wipe the water in your eyes. However, as you do, you notice something increadibly strange, you seem to be in a vast ocean. Confuse, you try to figure out where you were. That thought was interuppted whe. You felt a strong current underneath you. You look down and could see a massive shadow swimming in the water. What's worse is that its getting bigger as its heading towards you.

Panicing, you try to swim away from the shadow, with no luck as whatever the shadow is, its much faster than you are. In one minute, the ocean rumbles as the source of the shadow surfaces and you felt yourself being lifted up to the sky.

Everything shakes and your were daze and confuse as to what happened. Its only when you hear a familiar, yet extremely loud, noise that you saw what was swimming around you.

"Vaporeon~!" Vaporeon, now far more massive than anything you seen, shouts out loud as she looks at you in glee.

"Va-Vaporeon?!" You were confuse, wondering how you adorable pokemon got so massive. You didn't got a chance to ask her as you felt her swimmimg again. You look and saw what looks like land, except it looks familiar. It when Vaporeon got closer that you reconize the land as the edge of you pool. Its right there you realizes that Vaporeon didn't grew, you shrunk.

With a simple movement for the aquatic pokemon, Vaporeon jumps out of the water and walks towards a nearby chair to set you down. Now on a more solid ground that wasn't shaking, you had time to question you pokemon.

"Vaporeon, you can shrink me?" You ask, still having a hard time believing this situation. Vaporeon only simply giggles and nods to you. You were amaze and confuse that Vaporeon somehow is capable of doing something like that, though there is something that concern you. "Wait, can you grow me back?" You ask, fearing that you might be stuck like this size.

"Eon..." Vaporeon gives a look that says yes, but also pouts at the idea, probably enjoys seeing you at a small size more. She then change her expression, mainly that she wants to change the subject somehow and wags her tail, indicating she wants to have some fun with you at this size. As adorable the idea might be, you are a little nervous of playing with her at this size. Then again, you are curious of this shrinking ablilty and want to see just how capable Vaporeon's power is.

After some thought...
113211212.title: Evershrinking Water

choices: Ask to be grown back a little bit
Think of something to do
1132112123.content:
While being a fraction of your previous size was nerve-wracking, you were utterly fascinated at Vaporeon's new ability and you were curious to know to what extent she could control it. "Uh, Vaporeon...? You said as you looked up to her. Your words got caught in your throat as you were still trying to take in her size, towering over you even while you were perched up on the deck chair. "...So just how small can you make something?"

"Eon." She plainly said, making a so-so gesture with her paw. You just blinked at her. That certainly didn't explain much.

"Well... Can you show me, maybe?" You said at her with a slight blush. It was a bit embarrassing submitting yourself to your Pokemon and letting her have even more power over you, but you were eager to know just how far she could take her new powers. The request obviously caught her off guard as she tilted her head and stared at you for a moment before breaking into a happy grin.

"Vaporeon!" She affirmed, her tail lashing excitedly behind her.

Phew. You sighed as you mentally prepared yourself for your requested shrinking. You waited for Vaporeon to extend a paw for you to hop on so she could take you back to the pool, but it never came. Instead, a shadow loomed over you. "Uhh..." You could only murmur as you saw her huge paw hanging above you. Instinctual fear overtook you as it started gaining speed and rushed down towards your small form. You braced your hands above yourself but as soon as the paw would have impacted and crushed you, it seemed to meld all around you. Not a moment later it felt like you somehow broke the surface of her paw and found yourself submerged in what seemed like warm water.

Vaporeon used Acid Armour! Parting your eyes you could confirm it, your blurry vision able to see that you were trapped inside the middle of her liquefied paw. Looking up you could just make out the shape of a smug face staring down at you, but it fell into obscurity as it got blurrier and blurrier. Turning around you could see that the edges of paws were stretching out until you couldn't even see them, either. Before long you were left in a vast, weightless blue void. It was really quite weird to think you were inside your Pokemon like this but you held on. You just floated in the liquid for a while, unsure if you were still shrinking or not while thanking your lucky stars for your uncanny talent for holding your breath for a long time.

A sense of movement assaulted your senses at it felt like you were being pushed around by gravity. The sensation was like being in a car or an elevator, a possible indicator that Vaporeon was moving around. It soon stopped and then your felt another sensation all around your body. The warm water flowed all around you and seemed to push against your back until you softly impacted something solid. With a wet 'pop' you found yourself on dry land again. Instead of the wooden chair you were on before, the landscape was course and rocky.

Standing up and brushing some of the excess water off of your body you decide to turn around and look towards your Vaporeon. Only you found yourself looking up... Up... And up until you fall on your behind from craning your head back too much. She was indescribably massive from your perspective as she stood over you, a cute smile plastered on her blue face. You've been to the big city before and the comparative height she seemed to reach blew the towering buildings you saw out of the water. Even her paws looked like they were hundreds of feet tall!

As you were trying to find another object besides the blue giantess to get a grasp of your size, your view came down to the hundreds of small beige rocks scattered about the place. Picking one up the rocks revealed it to be course, jagged and surprisingly light, just about the size of a large watermelon. Your eyes widened when you realized it was only a single grain of sand that made up the sandstone path around the pool. Your body was the size of a few grains of sand! The far off grass at the edge of the path was like a great forest and the backyard fence behind that comparable to distant mountains.

You flinched as you witnessed the god-like Vaporeon move above you and saw her lower herself closer to you, almost hearing the air being displaced as she did so.
She seemed to be deep in thought as she gazed at you. Now would probably be the best time to speak up if you wanted to be bigger because it seems she's trying to think of something to do with you, although you were curious with what she could possibly come up with. Maybe you could join her and think of something to do?

113211223.title: Other

You started getting smaller

1132112232.content:
You fumbled with your custom Pokedex and waited for it to boot up as you watched your Espeon quietly groom herself on the sofa. Bringing the small hand-held computer up and pointing it towards the psychic type prompted an image of her species and stats to pop up on the screen. It displayed exactly what you would expect; her stats, what moves she knows, her nature, et cetera. The difference with this Pokedex was that it could display levels over a hundred. The local Pokemon professor explained 'levels' as a measure of the Pokemon's experience and how strong they are, usually reaching a complete plateau at one hundred. However, as you waved the device towards Espeon it was displaying a value almost twice that.

When you first captured her as an Eevee it was obvious something was different about her. She defeated every wild Pokemon that came her way with relative ease and every fight she won made the consequent ones all the easier. She was so proficient at battling that you never saw the need to capture any more Pokemon for your team and after she evolved you beat gym leader after gym leader with her psychic powers alone. Curious, you took her to a professor and he confirmed that she somehow breached that level plateau and was continuing to get stronger. By this point you were certain she could give legendary Pokemon a run for their money.

Nowadays you just take her to the odd battle tournament and live off the cash she wins. In this world having a Pokemon that can knock out any other Pokemon in a single move turns out to be a good source of income, although you do have to remind her to tone it down. More often than not she would accidentally knock the opposing Pokemon out in a single move and while it was impressive, the crowd tends to find it boring. Telling her to put on a show for the audience yielded good results and her showmanship even ended up winning her a small cult following. Quite often she would nag you to read off positive comments from social media to her.

Normally something like this would be something to celebrate and while you did enjoy the perks of having a completely overpowered Pokemon, a lot of strange things have been happening around her lately. Usually psychics can interact with the world using their psychic powers, such as making objects levitate. Espeon, however, gained the ability to take that interaction one step further. It was pretty innocuous you had to admit, just small pranks and tricks. For example one day she kept changing the color of your shirt between red and black randomly for some reason. It was a harmless prank but it deeply unsettled you how she could alter reality just by thinking about it.

You told her this and, surprisingly, she swore she wouldn't do it again. The only stipulation she presented was that she was allowed to use one specific ability when she learned how to do it. She refused to elaborate but you reluctantly agreed. Ever since that day she kept reminding you of the deal by chiming in with her telepathy, teasingly mentioning how you're going to love it. The mischievous look she always has on her face when she talks about it never reassured you, though. In fact, she had the same look on her face now.

"So, what level am I now?" Espeon telepathically asked.

"Two hundred and twelve," you stated. "You've gained two levels this week and all you've been doing is sleeping. You're not sneaking and fighting wild Pokemon are you?"

She gave a quick laugh. "No, although I considered it since there's not much else to do cooped up in here. Can't we go to another tournament or something? I'm bored!" Her forked tail thumped against the couch as she gave you a pleading look of mock sadness.

"Well there are no other tournaments in the area for a while. Maybe next month?"

She huffed. "Okay. That one ability I've been working on is nearly ready, by the way. I was thinking we should test it out together."

"Really?" You said as you set down the Pokedex on the table and let out an anxious laugh. "I was just thinking about that."

"Mhm," she hummed. "Don't be so nervous, though. I know for a fact you're going to like it. Admittedly, you won't at first but you will."

Much like the rest of her species Espeons had a knack for precognition so you gave her words some credence. "Will I, now?" You weren't sure if her assurances was making you more or less anxious about whatever she had planned, though. She stared at you with happy eyes as she sat down on the couch.

"Want to find out?" Espeon asked. It was then you noticed the red gem on her forehead was starting to brilliantly shine.
1132112232.title: Overleveled Espeon

11321122321.author_name: This site is dead.I wana leave
choices: Go into the city, possibly hoping to meet some fans or have some fun
Grow even bigger
Play around or experiment with her powers
11321122321.content:
Espeon smiled and the gem on her forhead sparkled. At first nothing happened, then you noticed Espeon seemed different… Was it just your imagination or did she suddenly take up more of the sofa? Her smile turned to a smirk and she strutted over and sat in your lap. She was definetly heavier and you could feel her weight increasing by the second.

With her body beggingint o stretch acorss the sofa it was obvious she wasn’t her usual size.

“Espeon you’re growing!”

You hear a chuckle in your head.

“You certainly have a firm grasp of the obvious.”

You’re too stunned to think of anything clever to say, mesmorised by her growth. She had nearly doubled in sized and was still. She left your lap and climbed onto the arm of the chair, her hindlegs resting on it. She suddenly placed her front paws on your shoulder, the unexpected and increasing weight momentarily throwing you off balance.

She took advantage of this and pounced, pinning you down. She wasn’t big enough to keep you pinned... you think, you weren’t sure how pyshically strong she was, since she always relied on her psychic attacks when battling, but you lay there and let her lick your face. You heard her voice in your head again.

“What do you think?”

“I’m pretty surprised, but it’s nice. Though I thought you were plenty strong already”

She nuzzled your face, her head now larger than yours. You could feel her fur brushing against your face.

“Even the best has room to improve. And I’m sure I could put on an even better show for all my fans.”

“How? You can already one hit pretty much anything.”

“True but this would give another way to play with my foe.” Now her smile looked like a cat playing with a mouse. You couldn’t help be slightly unnerved, even though she was friendly “Like this.”
She put her front paws on your shoulder again. She was big enough to engulf you now, you could feel a carpet of fur push against you. She was clearly bigger than you now, but you couldn’t guess how long. Clearly enough to fill the entire at the very least. You tried to sit up but felt pinned. She winked at you. She didn’t seem be exerting much force but had you pinned down. Just how strong was she?

You tried to wiggle out, slightl slipping out from her grip, but when you try to sit down, she pins you down with one paw. She giggles.

“Impressed?”

“Y-yeah. Just how big are you going to get anyway.”

She looked around whimsically.

“No idea. I’m curious to see how big I could get.”

“Espeon if you keep going I don’t know how much more this couch can take.”

She hissed.

“Are you saying I’m fat?!”

You shudder.

“N-no not at all.”

She laughed.

“I was just teasing you, you don’t need to be scared. But I know if I grow as big as I can here I’ll wreck the house.”

You noticed she said house, not sitting room. Just how big could she grow? Did she have any idea?

“Come on, let’s go outside.”

She jumped off the coach and landed with a boom.

Having got a full view of her you could now appreciate how large she had become. She was taller than you, and considerbly longer than tall. She doesn't seem to notice your astonished reaction, casual moving through and navigating the sitting room despite her new size. She looked over her shoulder, noticing you wern't following her.

"Are we still doing this?"

"Yeah sorry, I'm coming."

You rush after her and walk together. Hmm even at thise size you could use her as a ride Pokemon.... If she'd let you.

When she reaches the door frame Espeon shrank slightly, enough that she could slider through ti with a little manuvering. You both get a short distance from the house. She looks at you and smiles.

"Shall I begin?"

"Sure."

Espeon's gem shone again, this time brighter than before. This time she made no effort to be subtle about her growth, instead surging in growth. In seconds she went from being about your height to doubling it. She loomed over you and giggled.

"From down here you look like a tiny Eevee!" Even though she spoke telepathcially her voice sounded louded, not as though she was shouting but as though even her mental voice had been amplified by her size. Was she doing this on purpose or was it a side effect of her growth?

"You used to be a tiny Eeevee up to here. " You gesture below your knees.

She briefly put her paw on your head.

"Then let's turn the tables!"

Her gem shone again and she surged upwards, growing bigger than your house. In seconds you were less than knee sized to her.

What does she plan to do next?
11321122321.title: Espeon used Growth!

choices: A fight with the local gym leader
A fan meetup
To show off her new ability to everyone
113211223211.content:
Espeon still held her paw lightly upon your head while she finished making herself bigger. Looking up and cradling two of her toes you were almost certain that the entire paw could cover up a large portion of your body if she wanted to but judging by the increasing pressure, she did. You tried to push against it but eventually you gently fell to the floor and she had you pinned down and softly rolled the ball of her paw around you.

"At this point It's probably more accurate to say you're like a Joltik," she telepathically joked.

Thankfully you were blessed with fresh air as she stopped pinning you down and looking up at her mischievous grin you could only throw your hands up in surrender. Struggling back to your feet you could feel the ground tremor slightly as Espeon took a few steps to adjust herself. She stood so incredibly high and was so large that it was almost awe inspiring and you had a strange feeling in your gut that she was holding out on her growth, so far.

You scratched your head as you talked up to her, "So, uh, what are you planning on doing?"

A giggle filled your head after you asked her. She slowly lowered herself until she was sitting with her two arms crossed and still she was towering over you. "You're letting me choose?" she said playfully. "I thought the trainers were the masters in these types of relationships, I mean, you did capture me after all."

Her smug overtone made it clear to what she as alluding to. Many times you had let her do her own thing and she made a similar quip but this time it felt like the suggestion held more weight to it considering the sheer size difference. For just a moment you felt flustered before you pulled yourself together and spoke again. "Knowing you, I bet you already had something in mind that your were planning anyway."

"I was thinking we could make a trip to the city," she said and upon taking notice of your furrowed brow, she clarified. "And no, I'm not going to go on a rampage or anything before you ask."

You wanted to counter her idea by saying it would attract a whole lot of attention but you had a gut feeling that was exactly what she was after. Scenario after scenario was running through your head and any elements that might be deemed negative could be interpreted as quite the opposite by Espeon. No doubt she would enjoy the chance to duel any Pokemon the police send her way and you figured she would find scaring people with her enormous size to be humorous. As you were brainstorming you barely noticed the psychic energy wrapping around you, suddenly jolting you upwards and lifting you up in in the air. After a moment of flailing, you found yourself being dropped down on the fluffy pink fur of Espeon's back and she wasted no time before standing up and setting off toward the city. From her back you could see well over a lot of the houses in the neighborhood and already see the city skyline in the distance.

"Let's get to it, then," she sang. "At this size it should only be a quick walk!"

With a few massive steps she had stepped over the fence of your backyard and made it to the road, a couple of cars screeching to a stop as she blocked their way. Now walking the length of the road you could hear her paws crashing down on the asphalt and concrete below, her new massive weight causing it to buckle and crack. Even if she wasn't actively terrorizing the neighborhood you could hear people down below yell out at the sight of her and the fact she was taking up the whole road only made more cars swerve out the way. Taking a peek behind her you could see the paw-shaped impacts she was peppering the road with and the numerous amount of cars that ended up having to swerve out of her way.

"Is this really a good idea? You've already caused a lot of damage," you pointed out.

"I'll admit, I'm good at levitating things but I still have trouble when it comes to levitating myself so the road will just have to bear with it. The last time I tried that I accidentally threw myself at the enemy and nearly knocked myself out, too!"

"You only tried it that one time a real long time ago," you reasoned. "Can't you just do it a little bit so you're not destroying the road?"

"Nope," she flatly said. "Besides, it's not causing that much damage to the-"

She was interrupted by a loud crash after she veered off to one side of the road, her shoulder clipping a tall light pole and causing it to spark and fall to the ground with a metallic thud. For a moment Espeon stopped to look at it before she continued without saying a word. You decided to break the brief silence by asking her a question. "Are you sure this is a good idea?"

"That was a fluke, I'll be more careful from now on," she insisted.

You left it at that. As much as you wanted to steer her away from her current path she was absolutely determined making it to the city and even as her trainer, you doubted she would listen at this point. Instead of reasoning with her you pressed yourself down on her long, luxurious fur and watched the scenery from your high vantage point go by. You could feel her much larger muscles tensing and relaxing beneath you as she casually stomped her way to the city and soon enough you noticed some of the buildings getting taller. One building in particular was covered in reflective glass panels and you could see Espeon happily walking along with a very small human hitching a ride on its back. It was a strange image that you would have never foresaw that you would be a part of but strangely enough you didn't mind. Even with the probable large sum of dollars in damages she was causing to the local infrastructure you felt that this might be a nice change to your lovable psychic Pokemon.

After a short while you noticed she was having trouble stepping over the sheer amount of beeping cars so you asked her a question while she carefully maneuvered around them. "Right, so what were you thinking of doing in the city, again?"

"I may have used your social media account to announce an event."

"You what?" you said as you fiddled with your pockets. Thankfully you had left your phone in your pocket and when you flicked on the screen the first thing you saw was one of the posts she made. Just like she said, while pretending to be you on your account she had organised an event at the heart of the city and before you scrolled down to read the rest you could already imagine what she could have planned. She could have just called for a meetup with her fans or perhaps promised to show off her new ability but there was always a chance she challenged the gym leader that lived in the city. Espeon always had a grudge against him since he declared that the tournaments she likes to take part in were a waste of time and you could definitely see her calling him out to a Pokemon battle to publicly shame him.

The post Espeon made in your stead already had a large amount of reactions that made it apparent that an extreme amount of people had already seen the it. It started off assuring a grand event they'll never forget and scrolling down further she clarified in your place exactly what you, or rather what she had promised...
113211223211.title: To the city
