She approached the closest group of people, pausing a very short distance in front of one friendly looking group, coyly half looking at them and half away. You had seen this before, she was clearly fishing for pets.

People hesitated, but someone extended a hand, stroking her soft fur, then another followed. She purred.

"See? I don't bite"

She played to the crowd, walking around and letting others stroke, posing for photos and doing paw shakes with a couple of people.

While Espeon drew almost all the attention, a couple of people asked how you raised such a Pokemon.

You didn’t know how to respond. While you did use her in battle a lot and encouraged her to do her best, you couldn’t take credit for her exponential growth.

Eventually Espeon apparently had her share and was ready to move on. She looked back to you then addresed the crowd.

“I have an announcement to make!” She spread her thought speech across the area. “Me and my trainer are on a journey to collect all the badges in this region and we have come to your fair city to battle it’s gym leader. Come with me if you wish to see me in action!”

She strode forward and nodded with her head for others to follow. A surprising amount did so.

You ran ahead of the crowd and caught up to her. It was difficult to keep up with her pace at her size, and she seemed to walk with an extra spring in her step. Seeing you struggle, she slows down slightly, while still maintaining a vigorous pace.

"Well that was fun." She said in private thought speech.

You finally reach her and say quiet near her ear

"You really do like attention don't you?"

"Yes. Is that such a bad thing? I feel tingly in my body when I meet some new fans. i suppose it's like humans and social media."

"But you REALLY enjoy it."

She paused for a split second.

"Well.. maybe there is a little more to it. But it does make me feel alive, and that I'm more than just a beast of a battle."

"You have me."

"I know, and I'm doing this gym thing in part for you."

"In part? So you have your reasons to."

Her pace quickened slightly.

"A couple. I enjoy the thrill of fighting some of Kanto's most celebrated trainers, and the fame and attention that comes with it-"

She looked away after saying this.

"There's something else isn't there?"

"Mm, perceptive. I do have other reason. BUt i'd like to keep it close to my chest for now."

That was strange.

"Espeon why?"

"We all have our secrets. But I promise I will tell you, just not yet."

You were silent not sure how to take this. A few seconds later you here her voice again.

"Do you trust me?"

You had to think a second. She could be reckless, she could sometimes be selfish, but she was rarely if ever malicious, and realizing she might have come close to hurting innocent people, tried to do better. While she was focused on having fun, she did care about your happiness to and didn’t want to hurt others. What did you have to lose? Besides this was pretty fun.

"Ok Espeon I trust you."

"Hmm you hesitated but very well."

What could he other reason be? Was there some other goal she was aiming for? Could this be related to her blossoming powers? Maybe it has something to do with why her level went up quicker than before. Was she somehow drawing power from people's admiration of her? How would a Pokémon even do that? As far as you know Espeons did not feed on emotion. Unless she really was a legendary Pokémon in disguise. But you've known her since she was an eevee. Whatever she said about being sickly, she was always quite strong.

Wait while she was strong, she did seem to develop rapidly with you as a trainer. Was that something to do with it?
Or something else?
11321122321111231131121112.title: She performs for the onlookers

113211223211112311311211121.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Continue
Continue
113211223211112311311211121.content:
You were so lost in thought that you did not notice the increasing greenery around you or the large building in front of you. You look, noticing the building that looks like the top of a Gloom. Yep, this must be the place. The two of you approach the entrance, with the crowd Espeon bought following behind. Espeon's thought speech brings you back to reality.

“We’re here.”

Before you approach the gym you motion Espeon to stop.

"Espeon-"

"I know what you're going to say. I don't have to be a psychic to figure it out. No insulting perfume, no wrecking the place, no endangering others. Does that about cover it?"

The two of you enter, the crowd following behind. The gym looked somewhere between what you would expect a gym to look like, and garden. Well it made sense a grass type gym leader would like gardening.

There were a attendants watching the door. Their eyes widened at the sight of your large Espeon. but they quickly regained their composure. "What brings you to our gym today? Would you like to see our selection of perfumes?"

You answer.

"We're here to battle the gym leader."

"Right this way." They motioned you to follow. Oddly they didn't seem surprised at the other people Espeon had brought to the gym

You step through the doors. A pleasant smell whaffs through the air, not only from all the plants around you, but
you can smell perfume to. Espeon makes a show of taking a large sniff of the air.

"Mmmmm.." Oh no, was she going to cause trouble? She looked at you with that devlish smie, her eyes full of mischief. "Smells good." She had you going! You relax, the pleasant smell making it easy to do so.
It took the attendants a second to answer, they were clearly surprised your Espeon talked

"Thanks, it's our special mixture."

But not as surprised as you expected. Perhaps they had seen talking pokemon before?

You are lead to a wide open pokemon arena, surrounded by another garden.

In the center is a woman in a kimono sipping tea.

"That's a quite a large Espeon."

Esepeon smirked.

"You have no idea."

She took another sip of tea and stood up.

"Anyway, welcome to my gym. I assume you are here for a battle."

Erika also did not seem surprised by the people Espeon had brought in. Did the public regularly watch Erika battle? Erika reached for a pokeball.

"Anyway shall we get started? I propose a 3 on 3 battle."

Espeon swaggered towards her.

"No need I'm more than enough for a team of Pokemon!"

Erika's glared at her, shaking a little. Uh oh.

"I can see your bigger than the average Espeon but that doesn't mean I won't put up a fight! Don't take me lightly! You maybe big but I have empathy for my pokemon!"

Oh boy, it was true Erika did have a temper beneath that calm facade. Still at least she wasn't throwing you out the gym.

Espeon crouched down and spread her paws, the way she normally does when she's prepared to battle, Though her upper half looked as relaxed as ever.

"Oh I'm looking forward to it! You sure you only want to use one at a time against me?"

Erika glared at you.

"Your pokemon has quite an attitude."

"It's just how she is, don't take it too personally."

Espeon got between you.

"Hey if you were me you would have attitude to."

"That does it! Vileplume go!" She tossed her pokeball.

Her signature pokemon already?

"Vileplume!."

The plant pokemon cheers as she comes out her ball. But stops when she catches sight of your Espeon. Espeon flashed at her teeth at her, causing the plant pokemon to run for Erika.
Erika sighed and patted her Vileplume.

"I know she's big but that just makes her easier to hit! Please do this for me VIleplume."

Vileplume looked back and fourth between Espeon and Erika, finally jumping out from Erika and looking resolute.

"Thank you Vileplume Use Stun spore!"

Browninsh yellow spores filled the air and drifted towards Espeon. She put a paw on her nose, noticing the stink will before the cloud reached her. Espeon waited till the cloud had almost reached her, then with speed that surprised, leapt high into the air. a so quickly you brefly lost track of her movement, landing behind the Vileplume. Espeon stuck her tounge out.

"Missed me!"

Erika scowled

"Vileplume, Again!"

Espeon did the same thing, leaping back to where she had been before. Erika dived out of the way of the way as it approached her.

"Vileplume try a sleep powder!"

Espeon made a show of waiting for it to reach her, looking at the crowd, then without bothering to look at the oncoming cloud, jumped out of the way again.

She stuck her tongue out at Erika.

"Really you're trying nearly the exact same thing?"

Erika fumed.

Espeon was amused by the clear exasperation on Erika's face,

"Let me guess you didn't think i could be this big and this fast? I could try moving slower if it would help."

Erika gritted her teeth

"Vileplume Giga drain!"

Vileplume's plumage glowed and a field of energy shot from it. Again Espeon dodged it with the same ease.

"Again"

This time Espeon made a show of dancing around the field.

"Use Petal Dance!"

Vileplume spun around in a circle and as she did a storm of sharp pink blossoms fill the air. There were enough of them that you didn't Espeon think Espeon could dodge them all. Naturally Espeon wasn't worried. She danced around some of them, then stopped, letting some strike her. Even when they make a direct impact, they dont seem to leave a mark.

Erika gasped. When the petals cleared, Espeon was unharmed and Vileplume was tottering around, clearly dizzy from the effort. Not giving the plant Pokemon a chance to recover, Espeon leaped over and slammed Vileplume to the ground with a paw, the plant struggling in vain, even with Espeon only using a fraction of her strength.

You would expect Erika to be ready to give up, her arms were shaking as she looked on with horror.

"Now! Another stun spore!" She yelled out

Even though Vileplume responded immediately, Espeon jumped into the air again, landing behind Vileplume, as the Stun Spore drifted in the opposite direction. Espeon then swung both of her front paws, knocking Vileplume down, the force causing Vileplume to roll several feet.

Espeon let the plant pokemon stand up,then lifted it into the air with psychic. You could hear gasps from Erika and several members of the audience, as Vilplume almost reached the ceiling. Espeon let go and VIleplume fell from the air, landing with a crash.

Dust filled the air, and as it started to clear, Espeon casually walked. As the dust cleared, everyone could see Vileplumes eyes had been replaced with swirls. Espeon rested her front paws on Vileplume and flashed the crowd winning smile. Though you couldn't help notice a fair few of them didn't look happy. One or two even looked scared. Though some others were clearly impressed with your Espeon.

"You can do it Erika!" An older gentlemen called and some others were cheering with him. Hmm did Erika have a following of her own?
Erika returned Vileplume

"I'll admit your Espeon is strong, but she has a real attitude!"

Espeon stuck up her nose.

"You would to if you were this strong."

Erika didn't dignify that with an answer

"Victreebell go!"

Victreebell materialized with a scream. Then she caught sight of your Espeon and back away.

Erika put her hands on her.

"I know she's big but I believe in you!".

Espeoen laughed.

"Are you just goign to try the same thing with a different Pokemon?"

Erika's eyes narrowed but she addressed her own Pokemon instead.

"Victreebell grab onto her paw!"


With more speed than either of you would expect, the Victreebell took two hops then leaped at your Espeon. Espeon would likely have been able to easily dodge if she was being more careful, as it was Victrebell clamped on to Espeon's left leg.

Espeon lightly shaked her paw, looking annoyed rather than hurt.

"Is that supposed to hurt?"

Victrebell strayed on her.

Espeon wasn't impressed.

"What's this supposed to do. I can-"

Erika called

"Stun spore!"

Victrbeell complied, firing off a haze similar Vileplume. The powder spread over Espeon, her legs, then body twitched. She gritted her teeth.

"Ugh I feel so stiff..." She moved her other leg, but it responded slower than she expected.
Erika siezed the moment.

"Giga drain!"

A field of energy built off the top of Victrebell's head and struck Espeon. Espeon still looking irritating rather than hurt. She tried to shake to her leg to throw Victrebell off but it wouldn't respond. And she could feel those teeth pushing against her skin.
113211223211112311311211121.title: This one also wasn't meant to be 2 parts

1132112232111123113112111211.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: You leave the city
Something stops you
Wild card option
1132112232111123113112111211.content:
Between the Victreebell clamped to her paw and the stun spore making every movement much more difficult, Espeon was getting more and more exasperated.

"That's it I had enough!"

Her gem glowed and she grew even larger. Gasps filled the air. She grew a lot quicker than usual, perhaps Espeon usually liked to savor and enjoy the process, but now she was rapidly filling the gym, almost immediately doubling, then tripling in size.


She wasn't going to wreck the gym was she?

"Espe-" You start to say

"I know!" Her thought speech already sounded louder."Be careful! I'm not going to break the gym. Not that I'm not tempted." She grew until her head reached the roof and her body filled most of the arena, Erika gasping at the sight, then looked down at the comparatively tiny Victreebell, that looked little more than a very large thorn stuck on her paw.

"I just want this off me!"

Victreebel's eyes widened in clear shck, but it still remained on. Esepon gritted her teeth and violently shook her leg, flinging Victreebell off. Espeon's body was still shaking and her movements were slower, even growing hadn't stopped the effects of the powder, she gritted her teeth, clearly fighting her way through it.

She glared at Victrebeell, the plant pokemon looking positively terrified at the light purple wall in front of him.
Espeon's gem flashed and her aura surrounded Victreebell, and she unceremoniously flung the plant into a wall. The victrebell dropped to ground, . Espeon forced another smug smile, even as she struggled to make the motion.

You expected Espeon to continue to toy with Victreebell, but Espeon seemed unusually serious. Getting hit with that powder must have rubbed her the wrong way!

Erika was momentarily lost for words. She reached for her third pokeball but stopped.

"I concede."

Espeon took a step towards Erika and stuck her nose in the air.

"Afraid?"

Some of the crowd were booing, some at Erika and some at your Espeon with one or two shouting "Bully!"

She shot them a look.

"It's a gym battle! I'm supposed to fight to win!"

This didn't silence her critics.

While it was clear Erika had her own set of fansYou did wonder if Espeon had been overdoing it. Serge at least had an attitude problem, but Erika wasnt that bad.. other than her temper.


Despite their size difference Erika stood her ground, craning her head to look

"No. But despite your grating attitude, I acknowledge I can't beat you, and I don't want to put another of my pokemon through that.. Take my Rainbow Badge."

Erika tossed the Rainbow Badge at your feet

Espeon looked particularly smug, but the saw you and some of the disapproving crowd in the corner of her eyes.

"Well I admit this stun spore did hurt. I didn't expect you to use your Victrebell that way.. I have to admit it was a clever tactic. I couldn't dodge that powder at that range."

Erika relaxed a little.

"Well... it was good of you to say. You are a very strong pokemon."

While they were talking, you searched through your back pack for a parlyz heal. You run over and spray it on her. She purrs, then moves her hind legs around, happy to see they were responsive again.

"Ahh finally my legs are
working right again! Thank you." She bent down and rubbed her head against you.

Erika looked at you.

"You raised a very strong pokemon."

"Thank you."

Her face hardened.

"But you let her run wild and you barely commanded her at all! And a trainer is supposed to have empathy with their pokemon, you just let your Espeon run wild!"

I was true you often didn't understand what Espeon was thinking. And you let her do her own thing because it worked well enough for the both of you. But was this why you couldn't share thoughts with her the way Sabrina could with her Pokemon? Was it also why Espeon sometimes ran wild?

Espeon moved between you.

"Hey! I have my own mind to!"

You answer Erika.

"I knew Espeon wasnt going to do any serious damage or hurt you. I trust her." Though were times liek Safforn, but she did seem to be trying.

Espeon purred in response. Erika was still fuming.

"Well your Espeon has quite an attitude!"

"And you have quite a temper!"

Hmm you had to admit she a point. Both oo

"Espeon is as confident as she is because she is a very strong opponent. We beat the gym leaders in Johto with similar ease."

Espeon stood proud.


"See? I can back it up! And that was only a fraction of my power, if I went all out this entire city block would be rubble! Oh and your perfume stinks!"

Oh boy she went there. Erika's face reddened. For a second you imagined you could see steam off her. You wondered what she was going to go

"Get out!

"Fine!"


Espeon stormed off and you followed after her. A fair section of the crowd was booing your espeon, though some seemed in awe of her. Espeon paid them no heed. As she exited the battle arena, She shrank down to be just small enough to move through the corridors and quickly left the gym, with you struggling to follow after her.

You caught up with her and found Espeon was now the size she was before you entered the gym. She's silent for a while but then you hear her again

Espeon spoke to you in private thought speech.

"I don't get it I wasn't that cruel."

"Well she apparently has a fair amount of fans around here and you did anger them. It's one thing to put on a show but they thought you were bullying her and she really didn't do anything to deserve it like Surge."

Espeon rolled her eyes

"Would she prefer I just use Psychic three times and move on?"

You remember a few of your gym battles ending with Espeon knocking out each Pokemon with one hit. It was boring for everyone involved.

"Maybe it would be better to toy with them a little, but don't mock the trainer unless they actually deserve it."ed.

Espeon titled her her head.

"I suppose. Her fanclub did think I was bully.. though I suppose increasing my size didn't help."

"Or the outburst about destroying the city-block."

Espeon laughed.


"We both know it's true. Even at my smallest size I could take that gym apart if I wanted to."

You search for the right words to say.

"Even if it's true, it's not the best thing to say to someone. Think about your image."

She paused in her tracks.

"Hmm that is a good point...... So think about how I come across, put on a show but do not tease a gym leader unless they've earnt it and put on a show but keep my cool?"

"Yeah."

Espeon was quite for a moment then smiled.

"Got it. I think I know what to do for our next battle. So where to next? Fuschia city?"

"No I'm thinking we should go to Cerulean city."

"I was going to circle round and go there after Pewter City but I suppose that makes sense." Espeon's smile widened till it stretched from ear to ear. Now do you remember what you promised."

"Oh yeah." You wanted to see it yourself truth be told. "But you should get far away from the city before you do it."

-"And shrink down before we reach Cerulean city, I know."

She grew a little larger.

"Hop on my back, I can't wait to leave this place behind!"
1132112232111123113112111211.title: Victory?

11321122321111231131121112111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: You agree
You don't
Wildcard option
11321122321111231131121112111.content:
Espeon ran quickly, eager to leave the city behind. You were worried that as she run through the city with her increased size she may cause another accident, but she was surprisingly agile, skillfully weaving around the citizens, not stopping as they stared at her, and gracefully leaping over traffic.

Before long you had exited Celadon. Espeon eagerly looked to you

"Now?"

"Not yet, you're too near the city."

She looked behind.

"I suppose you're right. I don't want a repeat of Saffron."

Espeon kept running and looking behind herself. You were surprised at her stamina, you have been travelling and fighting for hours and she was still running at full steam?

After running a fair distances, Celadon now seemed a small sight just over the horizon. and you were out in the open without anyone around. Espeon kept looking behind her, clearly eager to reach the point where she could let loose with her growth.

"Mmm I think this is a good spot, don't you?"

You could barely see Celadon behind you. Espeon was probably correct. Though you're surprised she didn't get further away. You suspect she also wanted Celadon to see this.

"Yeah but hit the ground too hard this time or anything."

"I know I know. Be careful! I get it!."

Her gem flashed and her eyes glowed. At first you didn't notice anything, then a few seconds later you felt your seat shift. A few second later you felt it shift again. She was barely any bigger, but you could tell this was a just a warm up

"Taking it slow this time huh?" You say.

You felt another spurt.

"MMm yes. I love this feeling." She purred. "I might as well enjoy it. Would you like to observe from the ground to better take me in. I promise not to step on you." You nod. She lifted you phone and moved it front of her. " This is going to make some great photos!"

She shuddered and grew again. And again. Each spurt was adding several feet to her impressive size and each spurt was getting larger.

You craned your head up, she was more than twice as tall as you and growing every couple of seconds. Another two spurts and she at least three times your height, then other spurt and you only came up to her knee, with her stretching body already beginning to fill your view.

She beamed down at you, while spinning your phone around herself and taking shots.

"Enjoying the show?"

You nod.

"Good human." She patted you softly, her paws easily big enough to cover your head and shoulder then gave you a lick.

She did a few more spurts before stopping.

"Now to cut loose!"

Her gem flashed again and her body glowed and she grew faster than before, almost doubling in size in a instant. She leaned back her head and exhaled

"Mmmmmmmm" Her voice was getting louder as she grew. In no time at all you estimate she was about the size she was in Vermilion, but This time you were on the ground and could appreciate just how large she was. A single paw could easily flatten a car and look up she was already so big you couldn't entirely take all of her in, her enormous face seemed so far away, and her body stretched across several blocks.

She applied more slow spurts, her body taking up more and more of the land, until almost everything you could see was your enormous Espeon.

"And now!"

Even from down here you could see the flash of light from her gem. Her body expanded out rapidly, filling the area, the entire land being filled with purple. You stood on her paw, figuring it the safest place to be, she was so huge that looking you struggled to see more than her great pillar like legs.

When she was done you estimated she was the size she was about the size she was in Saffron city, though with little to compare it to you couldn't tell. But standing on her paw you felt almost microscopic.
"Ahh this feels so good!"

She lifted you up to her face.

"What do you think?"

Her face was bigger than a street of buildings, you struggled to take it all in.

You weren't sure what to say.

"Wow. You do know how to put on a show."

Her smiled widened.

"I do, don't I?"


She placed you on top of her head. Her fur was a thick, each individual strange was taller than and you could feel yourself sinking into it. But it was soft and relaxing

"I feel great!! Perhaps this what humans feel when they change out of tight uncomfortable clothes."
You walked around her head.You don't remember her fur being quite this thick, or her ears being as long as that...

You approach the gem on her head. It's definitely bigger than you compared to last time. And you know you're sinking deeper into her fur, which itself feels thicker.

"Espeon, you've gotten even bigger than before!"

You feel the ground move as she shifts her head. Her enormous eyes are looking at you

"So you noticed,"

But wasn't she at her maximum size at Saffron? Wait. Of course it made sense.

"You're powers are growing because of all the attention you've been getting."

"Mmm so you figured it out. Though it's not the only reason i do it, i really do get a rush."

Looking up you notice she was still spinning that comparatively tiny phone around, though she was holding it further away, presumably to try and fit more of her in the frame.

"And this gym challenge-"

"I am doing it for you, and because it seems fun... but I also realised I could get what I want as well."

"What do you even want with this power? I don't even think a legendary could beat you at this size."

"Wonderful of you to say. Hmm I don't know. Maybe to take over the world?"

You pause. That was a joke right?

"Kidding. I could already do that if I really wanted, who would stop me? But I wouldn't have a clue what to do with it anyway."
You really hoped that was a joke. But you couldn't actually imagine attempting to run it and as far as you knew she had virtually everything she wanted."What do you plan to do when we've done this?"

"Hmm I still don't know. But I am curious how far I could push abilities. I'm already curious what I could do with my other abilities, I wonder if their growing with me."

You felt some fear and some fascination.

"Would You mind if I test them out?"


What would she do if you said no? Would she even listen? It was clear she curious and she had been practicing in secret. Still you were curious and you believed her when you said she wasn't going to abuse it. Though if she really wanted to you would have no way of stopping her, even before her growth power.

And you were curious and eager to see what she could do.
11321122321111231131121112111.title: Growing power

113211223211112311311211121111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: You reach Cerulean
Along the way
Wild card option
113211223211112311311211121111.content:
"Sure go ahead."

"Excellent" she concentrated. The land around you turned, the soil and all the trees for a distance around you, then red, then she settled on a glistening gold. You were surprised at the area she could affect. Espeon was clearly delighted.

"Ohhhhhhh. My powers really are growing!"

"Let's see....."

She concentrated and bent down to inspect her work.

After a while flowers started blooming from the ground! She could create things to?! Though on close inspection (which was really only possible when she bent down given how high up you were) it didn't look fully.
"hmm intriguing though I see those need work. Lets see what else I can do."



"Wonderful!" Espeon admired her work for a few seconds. "Would you mind if I test another of my powers on you?"


"What do you have in mind?"



"A surprise!" She beamed. "I promise it's safe and it won't hurt."



"How can you be sure?"



"I've been practicing. And have I ever hurt you before?"



"Well-"



She bent down and looked you in the eyes with an oddly pleading expression.

"Do you trust me?"


You think for a second.


"Ok, give it a shot."



"Excellent."



You suddenly felt strange, as though everything was rushing away from you. Espeon's fur suddenly seemed even taller and thicker than before.



She lifted you onto her snout at first you thought Espeon was growing even larger, her face seeming bigger than a skyscraper, but then you looked down and the ground you were didn't seem any further away in relation to Espeon. She was shrinking you! She seemed positively enormous and looked like she was growing by the second. You struggled to take in her two immense eyes focused on you



She shook with glee, you struggled to maintain your balance and fell back, but fortunately her fur cushioned your fall.



She levitated you, lifting you just a little bit to give you a better view. Her face took up almost your entire view and her body seem to stretch on forever.



""awww cute!"" She beamed at you. "So what do you think?"



You were lost for words.



She inspected for a while. Whether it was because she was amused to see you at this size or just admiring her work you couldn't be entirely sure



Was she going to keep you this way?.


"Don't worry I said i wouldn't abuse my powers, i just wanted to see if I could do that." IN a flash you were back to normal, and she put you back down on her snout. Wow was that a coincidence or did she read your mind?



"But you also said you wanted to conquer the world."





She laughed, her laughter booming all around and rocking your seat. You clutched onto her fur.




"If I was serious about that would I really say it outloud? Instead of just doing it?"





"True. So did you read my mind."



"No but that would be a neat trick. I am curious about that, I've heard physic Pokémon trainers are able to do that with the right training. Try sending me thoughts or something."



You do so.



"Anything?"



She scrunched her face up in concentration, becoming more and more focused, then looking frustrated. "Gah why won't this work!" She stamps a paw in frustration, and the ground around her shakes."



"Careful!".



"Oops I forgot how strong I was." She didn't seem entirely displeased at the result, gleefully inspecting the massive imprint left by her paw. But then she looked at your face and put her aura around her paws again.



"Maybe it would help if we tried to use thought speech?"



"Hmm that's an idea. Ok try to say something without moving your lips."



You do so.



"Did you hear that?"



"No! What am I missing!" She stamped her paws in frustration. Even with the aura around her paws, the ground shook.



"Maybe we should get further away from Celadon."



Espeon looked over her shoulder.


"... That might be an idea."



She walked away swiftly, yet carefully. Though still scowled.



"Why isn't this working?!"



"You don't handle failure well do you?"



She snorted.



"Well I don't fail too often. What do you think is missing?"



"Maybe we need a bit understand of each others feelings?"



"Hmmm perhaps. But I’m surprised we don't have that already. I wasn't keeping too much from you."



“Well if it’s any consolation I’m sure you’re stronger than a legendary Pokemon now.”

Her smile slowly spreads to a grin from ear to eat.

“Mmm that does gladden my heart, thank you. I think I’ll practice making objects again.” She made more flowers, placing them nearby you. What would you need to do to get a thought link? Would it require more conversation? Battling together? Spending time together? Maybe you’re next gym battle would show you.

And how were her powers increasing like this? How could social media let her do this? Then again Espeon’s evolved through friendship, perhaps it was related to that?
113211223211112311311211121111.title: Practice doesn't quite make perfect

1132112232111123113112111211111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Continue
Continue
Continue
1132112232111123113112111211111.content:
Espeon makes quick progress, each step covering a lot of ground, and she cut through the wilds that a lot of trainers stay away from. She seems so focused on making objects that she seems to have forgot about her earlier bad mood. And her objects were getting better, looking more and more realistic.

Even at the pace you were going at, you were able to take in the incredible views, and all the people starring up at your Espeon. Though for once, Espeon was too deep in concentration to be taking notice.


Not too long later you could see Cerulean city in the distance. Espeon paused to inspect the view, then starts shrinking, before you ever get near.


“Well that was fun. We’ve got a badge to win and fans to meet!” You held on as your seat began to shake. When she stopped shrinking you notice she was still bigger than she was in Celadon. You estimate she was nearly as big as she was in Vermillion.

“Are you going to get any smaller?”

“Maybe...But I can tell Cerulean City has a lot more open space.” It was true, Cerulean was much less densly populated than the other cities you had seen in Kanto. “Which is great because I hate being confined! Though I suppose I’ll have to get smaller when we enter the gym itself.”

Despite her excitement she approached the city slowly and with surprising caution. Well Espeon could be stubborn and prideful, but she did seem to learn. As she got closer, you could feel her reluctantly shrink a little at a time. By the time you reached Cerulean, Espeon was about the size of the buildings, which weren't as tall as those in Vermilion.

A group of people had gathered at the entrance of the city. Some looked scared and shocked, but plenty looked happy and some were excited. A short distance behind them an officer Jenny watched. For a second you thought it might be the same one, then you remember an unusual quirk of this region. Maybe they were sisters... or clones? Perhaps her sister had told her about your Espeon.

Espeon flashed her usual winning smile You could guess Espeon had sent the message out while you had been travelling, and perhaps the fact she was slowly shrinking reassured them.

“Ah my adoring crowd! I’m happy to see you to.” She posed for photos, though shifted slowly enough that you wouldn’t be thrown off. “Don’t worry I’m not here to cause any trouble just to put on a show!”

She let fans stroke her and pose with her, and answered most of the questions they had for her. As the energy died down and the novelty of her appearance wore off.

“I’m glad you’re all enjoying my presence. Would you like to watch me take on the gym leader? I’ll do my best to put on a good show!”.

She got some cheers and a few people chanted her name.

“Then lead the way!”

She followed the crowd and you soon found a tall, round building, though not as large as the others you had come across.

“Huh I thought it would be bigger.” She said to you privately, not hiding her disappointment.

“Maybe everything seems smaller when you’ve been the size of a mountain.”

Espeon purred.

“Nice of you to say but I don’t think I've been quite that big... yet. Well maybe a very small mountain” She stared off whimsically for second, before quickly heading to the gym.

What would be her upper limit when she was done? Mountain size? City size? Or would she stretch across most of Kanto? That would be sight to see.

As your reached the gyms double doors, Espeon shrank down, settling on around your height again. You dismounted and entered.

The gym attendants seem momentarily surprised by your Espeon and the crowd she brought, but quickly recovered their composure.

“Welcome what brings you to our gym?”

“We’re here to battle!”

“Oh a talking Espeon! And so big.”

She smiled.

“Don’t worry I don’t bite.”

“Ahem anyway right this way.”

You and the crowd followed after.

Whereas Erika’s gym looked like a garden, this looked like an aquarium, with numerous tanks filled with various water pokemon. You came to a wide-open pool with 2 platforms. It took you a second to realize this was an arena

Inside was a red headed teenager wearing suspenders on her shirt, and a pair of shorts who almost seemed to be waiting your arrival.

“Excuse me we’re here for a gym battle do you know where the gym leader is?”

“I’m right here!” Her voice was lower pitched than you would expect from her appearance.

She wasn’t surprised your Espeon talked? She didn’t even stare for a split second.

“Really aren’t you a little young?”

Oh boy.

“Aren’t you a little tall for an Espeon?”

Espeon smiled.

“You have no idea.” She flashed a smile then looked serious. “Forgive me, I suppose if trainers leave home young there’s no reason they can’t be gym leaders.”

It wasn’t often Espeon apologized to anyone other than you. It was rare for her to apologize to you.

“Fine. We’ll battle 3 on 3.”

“Very well.”

No speech about how she was going to sweep her team?

“Go Starmine!”

As it came out if its pokeball, it spun in the air.

“Star!”

Espeon smiled and awaited Misty’s first move.

“Starmie Bubblebeam!”

A blue, bubbly beam fired from the top of Starmie. Espeon as usual wait till almost the last moment to dodge out of it, twirling out of the way as though she was dancing.

“Again!”

Espeon danced out of the way again, this time settling on a waltz.

Misty clenched her teeth

“Gah she’s too quick!”

Espeon purses her lips. You’re guessing to avoid saying anything too smart alacky.

“Starmie swift!”

Starmie formed several small white stars and launched them at Espeon. Again Espeon waited, trying to dance out of the way, but to her surprise, the stars followed her and crashed into her head. Espeon didn’t look hurt but did look a little annoyed.

Misty smiled, raising a fist into the air.

“That’s it! Keep at it!”

Espeon quickly slid to the left, but the stars still found their mark. Misty ordered another barrage and after trying to dodge well in advance and failings so , Espeon changed tactics. She was actually running at Misty’s Starmie now.

Misty seemed surprised at how fast your Espeon was moving. You’re guessing Starmie was surprised? It was hard to tell with the lack of a face. Misty yelled to her Pokemon.

“Starmie use swift and get out of there!”

Starmie fired another round of swift then jumped through the air. Espeon didn’t even bother to dodge, running straight through them instead. Even though Starmie had tried to get away, Espeon closed the gap and slammed it with her paw.

Although Espeon didn’t hit as hard as she could, Starmie was still sent flying. Misty gasped, surprised at the force of the impact

“Starmie!”

It spun in the air, trying to slow its fall, but still landed awkward.

Misty ran over to her Pokémon. “Starmie are you ok?”

It nodded.. Or at least its top limb made a nodding like motion.

“That Espeon is fast... but I have a plan! Starmie use recover!”

The gem on Starmie glowed, and in a flash it looked as good as new. Espeon was mildly annoyed, but started running at it again.

“Now Starmie jump into the water! There's no way the Espeon will be able to keep up with you in there!”

“We’ll see about that!”

“Star!”

Starmie jumped into the water and spun through the water, moving almost as quickly as it did on land.

You Espeon wasn’t afraid of water, but neither of you had gone swimming to often. Misty could see her annoyance and siezed upon it.

“Espeon can’t reach you here, keep pelting it with swift!”

“Hmmph.” Espeon pretty much ignored the swift barrage being shot at her, and dived into the water after Starmie, running through the shallow part with little trouble, but immediately starting to sink in the deeper part in the center. Espeon flailed around her limbs, desperately trying to swim or at least stay afloat.

While Espeon often liked to make a show of being graceful, her lack of experience showed, as she awkwardly bobbed around in the water, still flailing in an attempt to stay afloat, let alone having to chase down Starmie. She didn’t even seem to notice the continuous barrage of swifts, as she tried to balance herself.

Despite her best efforts, she started to sink, gurgling. Misty glared at you.

“If your pokemon is going to drown get them back to their pokeball! Right now!”

You weren't worried, but this only infuriated Misty all the ore.

“I mean it! What kind of trainer are you?! You’re Espeon is drowning! Are you just going to leave to drow-”

Misty was cut off as Espeon’s head pushed through the water, larger than before.
1132112232111123113112111211111.title: Battle of Cerulean part 1

11321122321111231131121112111111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Continue
Continue
Continue
11321122321111231131121112111111.content:
(This is the 2nd part if you haven't read part press previous chapter)

Espeon spat out some water she had swallowed. Then you could see Espeon neck, then her lower back. Espeon shook herself off, though her fur was still soaked. But she looked a lot happier. Given her relaxed movement, you’re guessing she had grown till her feet touched the floor

“Wahhhhh?!” Misty blustered. “Can Espeon’s do that?!”

“This one can.” She shot a smile to the crowd, not caring that she was still being barrages with swifts. She tried to run at Starmie, but her movement through the water still slow, even with her makeshift doggy paddle.

“Hmm maybe I’d do better if I was sea monster sized!” Espeon started making herself bigger, in seconds the water came just above her stomach.

“Starmie get closer and use Bubblebeam, Espeon can’t dodge in the water!”

Starmie spun through the air and fired. She struck Espeon on the face, but Espeon only looked annoyed.

“Ugh its like getting hit by a hose. On a low setting.”

“Again!”

Another bubble beam struck, Though Epseon did little more than turn her head slightly. THen her gem flashed.

Suddenly a purple glow filled the gym, and bound Starmie.

“Starrr” Starmie tried to fight against, but couldn't move at all.

Espeon lifted it high into the air and twirled it around the gym, first holding it above the pool, then over misty, then over the crowd, then let her grip go.

Starmie fell through the air, and spun, trying to recover its balance. Before it could spin away again, Espeon clutched in her telekinetic grip. This time she spun it round and round, each rotation faster than the last, before lowering it a little then finally slamming it into the ground.

“Starmieeee.” It tried to strand, the light on its chest glowing on and off, but soon fell off.

“Starmie!” Misty ran over to it, checking it for injury. She returned it and looked at you grimly.

Espeon jumped out of the water and shook herself off, though her coat was still soaking wet..

Misty gaped at Espeon, still trying to process what happened.

“Your Espeon is powerful .l....”

“I know.”

Misty glared and Espeon feigned humility

“I mean thank you for noticing.”


“You’re big but you’re not the biggest around!” She reached for her next pokeball. “Go Gyarados!”


The sea dragon appeared with a roar, towering over Espeon.

Espeon looked up, still wearing the same smile.

“What do you think of that?” Misty said proudly.

Gyarados roared again but Espeon simply shrugged.

“Eh.”

Even the Gyarados seemed annoyed Espeon wasn’t taking it more seriously. Or maybe Gyarados always looked angry, you weren't quite sure.

Misty was frustrated but not as much as you would have expected.

“Oh yeah?” Misty hit her armband Gyarados forehead glowed. Wait... was there a gem on Gyarados’s forehead?

Light filled Gyarados, the fins on its head grew much longer, the scales on its back lengthened and thickened, and a2 large dorsal fins grew out of Gyarados back.

Mega evolution?! You weren’t expecting to see that in Kanto.

You could hear the crowd behind you chattering excitedly but Espeon took it in stride.

“Well that’s a little impressive.” Though Espeon didn’t sound that impressed. Truth be told you weren't worried either, but Misty looked a lot more confident

As usual Espeon waited to see what they would do, showing mild curiosity. Misty seized the moment.

“Gyarados use Rain Dance!””

Despite the fact you were indoors, it started to rain. Espeon was still as lax as ever.

“Now use Twister!”

A surprisingly larger tornado came at Espeon, reaching ot he top of the gym. She leaped at the last second, narrowly avoid it, though some of her fur was blown upwards.

Even though you were sure Espeon would easily win, her Gyarados did seem strong. Stronger than of the gym leaders pokemon you had seen in Kanto and almost all of the ones you had seen in Johto

Misty pumped a fist into the air

“Hydro Pump!”

Espeon jumped out of the way as a surprisingly large burst of water hit the spot she was standing on.

“Again!” Gyarados shot another that Espeon also dodged with ease, making a show of her foot work.

Misty thought for a second. “Gyardos fire another twister than spray your Hydro Pump across the gym”

Another twister swept towards Espeon. SHe no trouble dodging it, but the Hydro pump was another matter, she tried to sidestep away while also avoiding the twisters, but it soon caught her dead on.

She gurgled, clearly sounding irritated.

A psychic aura engulfed Gyardos and it was flung back into a wall. It roared in pain and anger, but got itself up and fired off another Hydro Pump. Espeon dodged to the side. The rain was starting to subside, but Gyarados roared and another showed started.

“Lets even things up.” Espeon said, she glowed and grew to the same size as the Gyardos.

Misty gasped

“Just how big can she get?!”

Espeon grinned

“I’m not sure you want to know.”

Even the gyardos seemed bewilded.

“Twister!”

This time Espeon didn’t bother to dodge, she leaned back her head and acted as though she was being buffeted by a hair dryer.

“Hmm I could use this after that swim”

“Ahh!” Misty tensed up. “Gyarados use crunch!”

Gyarados flew at her, his teeth barred.

Espeon waited veered of the way ever so slightly and smacked the Gyarados across the face with her paw. He reared back and tried to take another bite only to get smacked again. Gyarados bent down his head and tried to ram Espeon, only for Espeon to duck. As Gyarados flew past Espeon, Espeon grabbed it and started wrestling it. Gyarados tried to bite Espeon, but she kept him back, Gyarados tried to break free of her grasp, but he was held tight.

Misty looked dismayed but still determined.

“Gyardos used Hydro Pump!”

This time Espeon seem to be expect a point blank attack and veered her head away.

“Twister!”

She couldn’t entirely dodge the blast of wind, and was blown back but still clinged to Gyardos, dragging her along with her

Espeon gritted her teeth in annoyance as he twister buffeted against her. She stayed on top of gyardos and slowly brought it to the ground, enjoying seeing the Gyarados struggling against her superior pyshical strength.

Gyrados thrashed around trying to break , but Espeon held on tight. Then you noticed Espeon slowly getting bigger. SHe had been about Gyarados’s height, but was now a clear head taller, then a head and a half. Her paws were taking up more and more of its body, and though it was wriggling ever more frantically, Gyarados was moving less and less by the second.

“Hydro Pump! Twister! Crunch!”

Espeon didn’t even bother to doge the stream of water, simply raising her head so it would bounce off her chest. ANd she hardly reacted when the Twister buffeted her again. Before it could try to bit her again, Espeon leaned, her larger body easily pinning the gyarados. She approaching twice its size and growing by the second, looking in the eyes, as its flailing becae more and more frantic.

She rested on top of it, enjoying as more and more her body covered it. SHe looked down at the Gyardos and smiled, like a cat toying with their prey

“1, 2, 3 pinned!” she said, Gyarados looking like it would be flattened if this went on much longer. Her body fast disappearing under Espeon’s.

Misty stared open mouthed, then looked at you.

“How big can she get?”

“Bigger than this gym. A lot bigger.” Espeon said, still growing. At this point all you could see was Gyarados’s head and finns, the rest of it was buried under Espeon.

Misty quickly returned Gyarados to it’s pokeball. She stared at it again, not sure what to do. Espeon quicker her growth, rapidly filling the arena, her head approaching the ceiling. Espeon had deliberately positioned herself so she would be casting a shadow over Misty.

Misty gave one more look at the wall of fluff in front of her and sighed.

“I really don’t think I can take on a pokemon that big... you win.”

Espeon lowered her head, partly s she wouldn’t hit the ceiling. “Thank you. I must admit your pokemon gave me more trouble than most gym leaders.”

“Uh thanks?” She looked at you again. “How did your Espeon do that?”

You weren't sure how to answer but Espeon was prepared.

“ONe part natural talent, one part my wonderful trainer. “ She put a paw on you, then looked to her crowd with a wink “One part my adoring fans!”. A small part of the crowd gave a cheer.

Misty handed you a badge shaped like a tear drop and your Espeon began to slowly shrink.

“Can I have a towel? I think I need to dry off. When I’m smaller obviously.”
11321122321111231131121112111111.title: If you think this came out of nowhere, check SUMo

113211223211112311311211121111111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Continue
Continue
Continue
113211223211112311311211121111111.content:
The two of you left the gym.



“Hmm..” Espeon mused. “It does feel good to leave the gym with everyone in good cheer.”

“A little consideration pays off.”

“True. I suppose it’s easier to put on a good show if everyone is enjoying it. Thank you, I had forgotten that.”

As you step outside you both the sky was reddening.

“It’s almost sunset? How long have we been doing this?”



You hadn’t stopped to think about it before, Espeon had walked many miles.

“We’ve traveled to half the gyms in Kanto, are you not tired?”

“Oddly no. I suppose whatever is making me so strong is also keeping me energized? But I imagine you must be.”

Perhaps everything that happened had distracted you, but you suddenly realize how hungry you are.

“You want to get a bite to eat?

She licked her lips.

“That would be nice. I’d love to sample the food around here! Lets go!” She levitated you onto her back. “I hope we can find an all we can eat!”


Espeon stopped.

“Wait we don’t know our way around this city. Maybe I should ask one of my fans for recommendations. Though we could try a couple of different places if need be.” She licked her lips at thought.

It was rare to see Espeon enthusiastic about food. Although she had a sweet tooth, she almost never indulged it, fearing she might put on some pounds and spoil her “perfect figure”. Perhaps her new abilities made her less worried, or growing so large made her hungry.

“Are you going to get any smaller?”

“Maybe. But I’d prefer to try enlarging my food. Hmm I wonder if I could re-flavour food?” She thought about it for a moment. “Anyway.”

Espeon chased after a fan, running so fast you thought she had forgot you were on her back for a second.

“OK lets go!”

She was still running at full speed.

“You seem hungry today”

“Or I’m looking forward to the experience.”

You come to a nice looking place.

“Well this looks promising.”

Espeon took a sniff off the air.

“Its smells promising to!”

She dashed through the doors, quickly shrinking so you would duck under the door, the lifted you off her back and shifted back to her previous size. Was she getting quicker at this? It did seem to be coming naturally to her. She took another whiff of the air and walked up tot the server.

“All you can eat for two!”

You pay up, while Espeon skips along.

You reached for a plate, though Espeon was already ahead of you, levitating plate around and her and loading up on at least one of everything on offer. Fittingly for the locale most of the available food was seafood but there was other stuff to. Espeon was normally slow and deliberate when it came to picking up food but not today.

When she was done, her food was stacked high, and the tower was wide enough that If she wasn’t holding it in place with her power, it would fall apart and drop to the ground.

She lifted the plate just above her and concentrated. After several seconds the plate and the food multiplied in size! It was big enough that it might not fit on the table A few people stared and gasped but for once Espeon didn’t care, licking her lips as she looked at it. She turned to you and smiled.

“Well that’s another trick to add to my *ahem* growing arsenal.” You suppressed a groan. “Now lets see how it tastes.” She lifted a sushi roll and chewed it slowly, spinning it around her mouth to savour it. “Mmmm! I mean.. it is good.”

“That’s a lot of food.”

“I’m a-”

You cut her off before she could make the obvious remark.

“Growing Pokemon”

She frowns, clearly annoyed you beat her to the punchline.

“Yes. And I feel like cutting loose today.”

“Could you do mine? Though not quite as much.”

“Oh sure.”

She concentrated and yours plate and food doubled in size.



Espeon ate unusually slowly, take one piece at a time and chewing it far more than needed, sometimes making little noises of pleasure. You tried to eat yours, but her display was distracting.. and somewhat intriguing. She had previously approached meal times with a utilitarian approach but today she was letting down her… fur? It was amusing watching her enjoy her meal like this, at first she was self conscious, making a show of eating in a very dignified way, but as she went she became less self conscious and more focused on enjoying herself, savouring each bite and letting each piece rest on her tongue before swallowing

“Mmm.. I feel like a world I have missed out on has been opened to me. Now I would like to try this thing called “alcohol.”

You pull back against your chair and look at her.

“Are you sure that’s a good idea?” You’ve never seen a Pokemon drunk before, let alone one like your Espeon. Considering how powerful Espeon was that could be down right dangerous. Would she be able to properly control her powers?

“Oh relax I’m not going to drink that much. And I’m a big, strong Pokemon, a little liquor isn’t going to send me out of control.”

“If you did go out of control I’d have no way of stopping you, aside from sending you back to your pokeball. And I’m not sure it could hold you if you didn’t want it to.”

She growled.

“You think a little alcohol would turn me into a raging beast?!”

“No but it can make people forget themselves. And I don’t know how it would affect a Pokemon.”

Espeon thought for a second.

“Humph if you’re that worried, I’ll start with a small amount and see what it does. Garcon some of your finest wine.”

They hesitated, unsure if they should serve a pokemon. Espeon looked at you expectantly.

“It’s fine, she can handle it. “

They brought over a bottle.

Espeon enlarged the bottle and glass but only in proportion to her size and took a cautious sip. She pulled back her head and stuck out her tongue.

“Ugh such a strange taste, why do humans drink this stuff?”

“I think its takes a while to get used to the taste. Though people don’t just drink it for the taste.”

She took another sip and recoiled again.

“Enough of this!”

She lifted the glass and chugged it down. She looked around, waiting for something to happen. She scowled.

“So what now? Am I suppose to feel something?”

“It’s supposed to take time.”

“Or I’m a lot tougher than a human and need something stronger”

Espeon got a second round of food.

“That’s it I'm still not feeling anything. Garcon your strongest alcohol.

“Wait Espeon-”

“Relax, I’m not going to drink enough to go out of control, I’ll drink what’s brought before me, and if that doesn’t do it, I’ll put this idea behind me.”

Before you could protest further, the server came back with a small glass. Espeon scrutinised it and frowned.

“Such a tiny glass.”

Espeon telekentically lifted the glass, and in a flash of light, the glass enlarged it till it was at least 10 times its size. Before you could say anything she drained it in an instant.

“Espeon!”

“Oh relax I didn't feel anything from last one.”

She paused and waited.

“And still nothing. As if your puny human drink could affect me!”

She went back to her food as though nothing happened. A few seconds later she rapidly growing, doubling in size by the second.

“Espeon?”

She let out a roar and swung your head. You jump out from your seat.

“Espeon stop please!”
113211223211112311311211121111111.title: An Espeon's night out

1132112232111123113112111211111111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Continue
Continue
Continue
1132112232111123113112111211111111.content:
She caught you in mid air with her telekinesis, and brought her paws down. Just before impact she stopped….. then burst out laughing, rolling on the floor.

“Ahahahaha you really thought I’d lose it that easily? That some wine and a little glass could do that to me?”



You glared. You didn’t want to admit but your heart was pounding.

She shrank back down to her previous size and rested a paw on you, still laughing but trying to stop herself from doing so

“I’m sorry, I didn’t mean to give you as much of a fright as that. But you should know I’d never hurt you. You should have seen the look on your face!”

You weren't sure what to say.

“Don’t worry, I’m not going to drink anymore, it’s obvious I’m immune anyway.

She eventually finished off her her plate, only to get up and get another. You would have expected her to be full after even eating half of that, but she was making and even bigger tower of food then her first set. She enlarged it again and got to work.

A few minutes later she had a sudden growth spurt. Not as much as before, but she was at least a foot taller.

“Woahhh now I'm feeling it.”

“Espeon you’re not going to jump scare me again are you?”

“No no- this time I think it’s working!”She grew another foot or so and laughed, but it’s not her usual laugh, its higher pitched and off tune.

You shifted back in your seat, unsure of what she was going to do.

“Dun worry, I told you I wouldn’t be a rampaging beast!” She had another growth spurt and gave that same laugh. “Wow this feels good! Now I see why humans do this!”


“Espeon why are you growing again?”

“Huh?” She looked behind her, apparently surprised she was growing.

“Oh wow. Maybe it’s just cause I feel happy!” She had another growth spurt, then concentrated, though it seemed to take her more effort, before shrining down to her previous size. You could see a goofy smile and her cheeks had reddened and not from embarrassment. “I lost track of things for a second.”

“You definety shouldn’t drink anymore.”

“Oh relax!”
Without warning she pounced on you, pinning on your back. She hugged you and nuzzled her face against you.

“Has I ever told I love having you a trainer?”

“Uh thanks?”

She wasn’t pressing against you very hard, but it was enough to stop you moving. You could feel her fur coat against your body

She nuzzled against, not caring who was watching. She was also getting bigger again, her body pushing away your table.

“uh Espeon. You tried to point behind her at the people watching, though you had trouble moving your hand.

She glanced at them quickly but didn’t care.

“Mmm.” She continued nuzzling you

“Espeon I think you had enough.”

“I dunno I feel gooooddd.” She gave another strange laugh.

Well at least she wasn’t an angry drunk.

Hmmm since she was drunk she would be less guarded Maybe you could get her to talk. You weren't sure about some of the answers she gave on your ride to Cerulean, and she would be much less guarded now.

“So why are you doing?”

“Cause it feels good!”

“I mean collecting fans, collecting power.”

She looked at you like you were stupid

“Yer like I said it feels good!”

“What do you plan to do after?”

She swung her head back then shrug.

“I dunno? Get big? Get really big?” She stretched out her paws and laughed again, also growing bigger again. “I don't make grand plans I just want to keep doing this because its fun!”
“And you were joking about taking over the world?”

“That again? Course! What would I even do with a world? Not like I know how to govern!” She laughed.

You breath a sigh of relief. You’re pretty sure she’s in no condition to lie to you.

She glared at you, though had trouble maintaining a focused stare.

“What’s with all the questions? I thought we were enjoying ourselves!”

“Yeah I just wondered what comes next. “

She jumped off you and back to where she was, though she landed in an awkward heap and with a loud thud.
“I dunno, lets just worry about next when it comes next!” She further enlarged her food, though it shook awkwardly. You suspect her grip on her powers was loosening.

She ate a more quickly now, though still stopped to enjoy and savour some of it, but was a lot less deliberate now. Though she seemed to be having even more fun now, wearing that relaxed, goofy smile, and casually stretched herself out instead of sitting in a dignified way.

As fun as this was to watch, you were afraid of what might happen if she stayed this drunk. Although she clearly wasn’t a mean drunk, you wondered what would happen if she decided it would be funny to grow to the size of an office building or larger and staggered around

You ordered several pints of water and encouraged her to drink it, in the hopes it would sober her up.

Espeon casually drained each glass in between bites, and after she finished her second plate, she got up for a third, though she momentarily struggled to lift herself.

“Aren’t you full?”

“Just a little more…”

She bought her plate around and enlarged it even further. It clearly took some effort for her to eat it but she still pressed on. You could see her belly starting to push out.

“Don’t you think you had enough?”

“Don’t tell me when I had enough!” Ironically she was sounding a little more like her hold self.

It took her a lot of time and effort, but eventually she emptied her plate and let out a content sigh.
You had never seen her eat anywhere near that much, even adjusted for her size. She placed some paws on her belly, which brushed again the floor. She let out a belch and quickly covered her mouth and looked sheepish.


“Excuse me!.” She purred, rubbing her stomach. “I never knew how good food could taste. We should do this more often!”

“You ate like a-”

She lifted her head and glared at you.

“Don’t you dare say Snorlax!”

“I was thinking giant.”

She purred.

“Mmm.. I suppose I did.”

You tap her belly.

“Aren’t you worried people are going to see that when you grow really big?”

The colour drained out her face. She frantically looked around. Fortunately for her, most people had cleared out. It had taken Espeon so long, that it was almost closing time

“NO!I better get rid of this!" She was sounding more like her old self now, though you could still her some of the sing song quality in her voice she had before. She concentrated and tried to move it around. “Gah. I’ll have to figure this out in the morning .. maybe I just need some time to digest this.” She jumped up and tried to run but was much slower.

“Ugh NOW I feel tired. Can we go somewhere to sleep?”

“Are you thinking of a hotel?”

“How about we sleep under the stars? There’s something I want to try.”

"Isn't it cold?”

“Yes, but I have an idea to keep you warm.”

“I guess we can give a try.”

“Great, lets get out of here.” She lifted you on her back and bolted for the door, though she was a lot slower and wobbled a bit. She levitated you off her back

“Don’t ride me for a bit, I think I need some time.”

You walked out together.

“Ugh I really did eat too much.. I wish I could manipulate my digestion.”

“You cant?”

“I dunno but I don’t want to try right now, my heads still spinning and what if I mess up something inside of me?”

You give her a teasing smile.

“I thought you said you were immune to alcohol.”

She growled.

“Fine even I have my limits, lets just get out of here!”

She tried to run ahead, though right now you had little trouble keeping up with her.

“Where are you going?”

“East of Cereuluen I saw a clearing without too many people, lets go there. Give me a moment first.”

She sat down.

“Give me a moment, then I’ll get us out of here.”

A couple of minutes rest, she let you on her back again, riding through the city, though also trying to avoid being seen by too many people. Fortunately for Espeon, Cerulean was quiet at night.

Even slowed as she was, it didn’t take her too long to get you out of the city, and once a safe distance from it she grew about as tall as a house and carried you down route 9, which was deserted at this time of night. At least you couldn't see anyone.

Route 10 was particularly sparse, continuing little more than stone pillars and a lake

“This looks like a good spot, right in the middle of nowhere!”
1132112232111123113112111211111111.title: Whoops this chapter broke when it wasn't supposed

11321122321111231131121112111111111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: You wake up to some shaking
You both sleep peacefully through the night
Something happens
11321122321111231131121112111111111.content:
She found a spot and plopped herself down.


You took a deep breath. The sea air was relaxing but the cold night air brushed against your cheeks.

“Yeah but its cold.”

“Don’t worry I thought of this. If I an get myself together.” She put a paw against her forehead. You suspected she was rethinking some of her life choices.

She gritted her teeth and concentrated. A purple woolly looking blanket formed over you.

“There what do you think?”

You felt it. It was rough, but thick, and you figured it would do well against the cold. Not bad for a first attempt.

“It looks good, thank you Espeon.”

“You’re welcome. Would you like a pillow?”.

You nod. She started shrinking down, settling for around twice your height. You wonder why she shrank down instead of just making it? Was it easier for her or something?

She concentrated and a big pillow formed, resembling the one she liked to use at home, though not as well. She lay across and looked satisfied. You looked confused but this only amused her.

“Mmmm you’re wondering where you pillow is?”

“Yeah.”

“Come closer.”

As you did she sprang up and pulled you down, holding you against her chest., she lifted the blanket over you.

“There, this should keep you warm.”


“And I hope I make a good bed. Perhaps ill make m fur thicker.

“What if you roll over?”

“If I hold with my paws you should be OK

She wrapped her paws around, you could feel their weight and the softness of her fur..

“Ha I remember when you slept with me like this when I was an Eeeve.. how the tables have turned.”

“You do make a surprisingly good bed.”

“Thank you.”

“Especially with the soft belly.”

She glared.

“Don’t make me “accidently” roll on top of you.”

“You wouldn't.

“Well I wouldn’t crush you, but…” she rolled over so we was on top of you. You could feel pressing down on you with increasing force. It wasn't enough to hurt but it felt tight and was worsening by the second.

“I might press down on you until you say sorry.”

“Sorry Espeon.”

She rolled back into her previous position.

“That’s a good trainer. Night night.”

Neither of you had trouble getting to sleep though you wondered what tomorrow would bring.
11321122321111231131121112111111111.title: Good night Espeon

113211223211112311311211121111111111.author_name: Just here for the poke story
choices: Breakfast ahoy!
Something happens
Something happens
113211223211112311311211121111111111.content:
You are jostled awake by some shaking. Her paw is covering more and more of your body and you realise she’s growing rapidly. But why? You look up. Espeon’s eyes are still shut but you could hear her Mumbling, purring? She was getting larger by the second. You first instinct was to shout her awake but you were curious. Maybe you could learn something about what she was thinking, and you wanted to watch. You wiggle free of her grasp and find a spot where you can get a full view of her face, without being smothered by her growing body.

The purring she makes is a little unclear. You wonder if you’re hearing her say more? But you’ve never heard her use her mouth to talk. She was bristling around, clearly excited. She raised her head then her paws. Her growth was speeding up, she was more than double the size she was when you slept but it was only gaining momentum, she double again, then again, her body crashed through the stone pillars around her, but some how this didn’t wake her either.

You wondered if you should stop this before she was too big too hear you, but you couldn't bring yourself to do so, besides there wasn’t much around here.

She rose higher and higher, soon she was the size she was at Saffron, then the size she used to travel from Caledon to Cerulean which you assumed to be her max size but she was still growing!

Just how big could she get? She had already towered over every building you come across. You ran as her body smashed more of the surroundings. She was rolling around, clearly excited..

“Mrrrr!” Her growth tapered off and stopped, but she had grown this much in hours? Whatever was happening to increase her powers seemed to be happening more and faster. She rolled around a little then finally her eyes opening.

“Mmm.” She looked around, clearly confused. At first she actually looked disappointed. Presumably she was even bigger in her dreams?! Then she smiled. she looked at her paws and let out a shriek. Shifting herself and searching frantically for you.

You ran over to her “Espeon it’s ok I’m here!” She didn’t hear you at first so you shouted again, as loudly as you could. She still searched for you. You were smaller than a flea compared to her so it wasn’t that shocking, though so far she had been able to hear you regardless of size.

“Trainer? Where are you?” You hear her though speech. Despite her size she isn’t bothering to “boom” her voice.

She blinked.

“Did I just feel you?”

He head swings in your direction. Even bent down her head towers high into the sky. She lowered it slowly.

“Espeon I’m right here!”

She looked at you her pupils widening, then she relaxed and breathed a sigh.

“I thought I-”

She rested her head against the ground.

You run over to her and place a hand on her.

“It’s ok Espeon.”

As she calms down she suddenly looks embarrassed.

“I thought-” She breathed another sigh. “Sorry I didn’t hear you, I have to concentrate to hear people at this size.”

“Its ok I got out of the way when you started growing.”

“Good.” Her ears twitched and she looked away from you. “You didn’t hear me talking in my sleep did you?”

“Don’t worry I don’t speak Espeon.”

She chuckled.

“Ha ha I suppose not. To you it would just sound like I’m saying my name over and over again.”

“Well it actually sounded more like purring.”

“Hmmm.. I guess that makes sense.”

“What were you dreaming about?”

“Uh-” She paused for a second.“Well.. hmm I suppose you can guess I had dreamed of being bigger. And I admit I wondered what it would be like to be admired by cities, or perhaps regions at a time.”

“Anything else?”

She turned her head away.

“No-”

Was she lying? She was definitely keeping something back. You held your gaze and she relented.

“Well maybe there was a little more… but Its embarrassing. I’d like to keep it to myself for now.”

“Eating more delicious food?”

She looked sheepish.

“….. Maybe." I did enjoy myself last night.

You wondered what else she was dreaming of but you didn’t know how much you should push. She stood up slowly, her head so high up that you struggled to even make out her chin, while her body seemed to stretch forever.

“But check out these gains!” She boomed her voice again, the sudden loudness almost knocking you over.

She took a step back. You could feel the ground shake as she moved, even very slowly, and her body stretched for what seemed forever.

“I must be at least a mile long, maybe two!”

You stare impressed. She lifts you with her telekenesis, allowing you to take in just how larger she is. A single strand of her would be many times larger than your entire body. You couldn’t even take much of her in at once, all you could see was an endless wall of pink.

She places you on top of her head, by her building sized ears. You looked down and felt a rush of dizziness at how far away the ground was. When you recovered your bearings you asked her.

“So you think your powers are increasing at a fast rate?”

“Yes! I bet I’ll be even bigger tomorrow! I feel like nothing can stop me.!” She shifted slightly, but at her size you feel, though her soft fur cushioned your fall.

“Careful!”

“Sorry I’m still not used to this. Give me a chance to practice… before I get even larger!”

Once the feeling of awe wore of, you couldn’t resist a chance to tease her.

“But what about your belly? From up her everyone for miles must see it.” You could imagine her enormous eyes widen, and felt the “ground” you were standing on shake as her mouth fell open.

She lifted a paw She felt it and her face reddened. Everything around you shook as Espeon rapidly shrank down, eventually removing you from her back and shrinking down to normal Espeon size.

“Excuse me.”

She bounded off at a speed you rarely saw her reach.

Espeon sometimes disappeared in the morning and at other ties for… less graceful moments. Even with you she liked to keep a certain mystique

About half an hour later she came back, looking thinner, though there was still a small bulge around her belly.

“There.”

“What did you do?”

She glared.

“Never you mind.” Her expression softened. “I’m sorry I woke you from your sleep and I’m sorry I lost control. I really did drink too much.” She clutched her head. “I think im understanding this thing humans call a hangover.”

“Drink lots of water?”

“I was already doing that. It’s one reason I- Never mind. Do you think a full heal works on a hang over? Maybe an antidote?”

“It’s worth a try.”

You take out a full heal and spray her. She gives a moderate smile.

“Better, but it’s not completely gone. But good enough. I’ll have to watch what I drink next time.”



You both look up. The sun had barely, the first rays of morning filling the sky. It was earlier than you were used to being up and you were fighting the grogginess of sleep. Espeon however showed no signs of tired, looking as alert she did yesterday afternoon and pacing on the spot

“Don’t you feel tired?”

She jumped around.


“No not at all. In fact I feel bursting with energy!”

“Huh…”

“Yes I probably need less sleep like this… but dreaming is such fun. But I suppose you're feeling tired.”

You rub your eyes and nod.

“Yeah.”

She was silent for a moment.

“Well I am thinking, we could get some breakfast, then I could walk slowly to Fuchsia city, making my body a good bed for you. Maybe you could gt some sleep along the way? I’ll try and walk slowly so not to wake you.” Her lips spring into a smile. “I’m more than happy to savor the view at my current maximum size.”

You weren't sure it would work but you figured it was worth a shot.

Espeon grew to around twice your height, place you on her back and sprinted for Cerulean.

“Wait if my growing woke you up, why didn’t you wake me? I would have stopped.”

You shrug. Espeon laughed

“Ha, did you want to watch the show?”

“That might have been it. Or I was curious what you’d do.”

“Hmm how interesting.”

“Wait, would anywhere in Cerulean be open now?”

“Eh we’ll find something.”



It doesn’t take long to reach Ceruelean. It was quiet, but not completely dead, apparently there were people who went to work at this time. After some searching you find a pancake house that Espeon likes the smell of.

“This looks good.”

She lifted you off her back and just a little taller than you.

“Aren’t you worried about putti-”

“Don’t say it.” She sighed. “I’ll pace myself better, at least till I get better at shaping my-” She cut herself off, not even wanting to say belly. “I just got carried away yesterday, I’m so used to watching my figure. But if I’m careful I should be fine.”
113211223211112311311211121111111111.title: Good morning Espeon

choices: Stay around the house, relax with her for now.
Go out, maybe to the park
11321122322.content:
Espeon's gem glowed quite brilliantly, almost causing you to shield your eyes as you looked at her. You squinted as you started to notice that the things in your peripheral vision looked...odd. Your pokedex started to feel heavier too. Just what was going on? As your vision adjusted that's when you took notice around you. The room was expanding out around you...as was the pokedex in your hand, which was now as large as a thick, full on box to you. Startled, you dropped it, it starting to get too heavy to hold onto anyway. As you looked forward at the couch, and Espeon lazing on it with her flowing gem, it started to dawn on you how big SHE was looking.

"Espeon, are you shrinking me!?" You said startled before her voice chimed in your head. "Yup I am! Remember, you agreed!" She seemed quite pleased with herself as you looked around at your stuff as the shrinking started to slow. The table across the way rose as if it were a grand cathedral, your shelves looked to be tall buildings you'd see in the city, and looming above you, in her full glory, your Espeon was a living monument.

Your jaw almost dropped as you looked at her, and that's when you felt yourself lifting up as she used her psychic to bring you towards her, her form even more impressive and imposing looking as she held you in front of her face. You looked at her, and she at you for a moment or two of silence before she spoke telepathically once again. "You're so small and adorable!" She seemed enthusiastic as she nuzzled you with her power against her cheek. You opened your mouth to speak, only to find that all you accomplished was getting thick, lilac covered fur in your mouth. You internally wondered just how this was possible. You knew your Espeon was powerful. Stupidly, absurdly powerful, but this was on another level...she could SHRINK living things. That was absolute insanity! As you thought this, you were pulled back in front of her face, smiling at you as you took the moment to think on your words.

"Espeon...you can shrink things now..." You said, somewhat in awe as she nodded. "And grow them too! Though I didn't want to destroy the house, so I opted to do this instead! Cool huh?" She said and you rubbed your hand to your chin. At least she wasn't keeping you entirely immobilized in her psychic grip.

"It's certainly impressive." You said, not entirely sure how you felt about the implications of this yet. If what she said was true then there wasn't a shadow of a doubt in your mind, she had to be the most powerful pokemon out there. "Though i'm on the fence on if I like it or not..." You said, entirely unsure.

"I said you wouldn't at first though, just give it time!" It was then that she shifted and adjusted you and placed you down near her belly as she reclined. Seeing her from this angle truly made you feel insignificant...you gulped as she looked at you.

"Oh don't worry, I wouldn't dream of doing anything to you! You know that!" She said, as if she sensed how you were feeling. You nodded as you decided to take in more of your surroundings...wow, your TV looked like it was practically a movie screen at the local theater.

The idea thrills you could find at this size was tempting too.

"Say, why don't we go out and about? Maybe to the park?" Espeon asked hopefully.

"Like this?" You asked and she nodded.

"Totally! I can only imagine what it would be like! And i'm so tired of being cooped up..." She asked sadly. The idea was interesting, and Espeon hadn't been out for a while...it might do her some good to get some fresh air, maybe play at the park. As powerful as she was, she tended to be pretty friendly with others outside of battle. Though the hazards for you at this size were something to consider too...

It ultimately didn't take you long to come to a decision.
