And he messed with me first...but no, you want to ruin my life over this, make me a doll...I’ll be your doll for as long as I last like this, and I won’t speak to ANY of you!’ He thought bitterly behind his smile. Buneary looked at him dejectedly. “Azurill...” She said
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: A doll

choices: Azurill cracks
He maintains his silence
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Azurill...please talk to me...you can't live your life like this, can you?" She asked and he still didn't respond. She sighed as she walked over to her bed and set him down. "If you want to act like a doll, i'll treat you like one then!" She said, half cheerfully, half menacingly. She reached into her toy chest and grabbed some frilly dresses. She giggled as she put them on him.

"You must feel so embarrassed, right~ But you're so cute~" She said giggling as she looked at him, expecting him to at least be trying to take the dress off.

No response. "Um...alright, what about this then!" She said as she picked him up and started to spin around the room. "Dizzy time Azurill! Try and be quiet now!" She challenged, and he had to mentally admit, this one was tough on him...he squinted his eyes but maintained the smile...'You won't crack me...this is the only defiance I have left...I won't be beaten. I at least still have my mind as a sanctuary.' He thought bitterly as soon she stopped spinning and flopped back onto her bed, still holding Azurill. She was panting and quite dizzy herself as she looked at Azurill to see...the same expression.

"Oh come on Azurill! Are you really intending to do this!?" She was getting frustrated now, she was about ready to quit when.

*GROWL*

She heard something rumbling. What was...?

*GROWL*

It wasn't her own stomach, she had a nice lunch with Celebi, Braixen and Zorua, so it must be..."You ARE hungry!" She stated, but he didn't respond.

"...fine then, i'll be right back." She said as she set him on the bed. 'Stay strong Azurill...stay strong...' He thought to himself, but soon Buneary returned with...a plate. It had crackers, cheese, meat and veggies on it. She casually set it down on her lap. "You know, it's a shame there isn't anyone else around that would eat this with me, just a little Azurill doll to keep me company, oh well~" She stated as she made a small cracker sandwich of the meat, cheese and veggies and started to eat it.

*GROWL*

'No Azurill...don't give in...don't...' But he couldn't deny it...he was starving. And if he didn't eat eventually, then his stint as a doll would be short lived, right? But this ISN'T a life! He kept telling himself that, but it didn't fill up his stomach...soon enough he heard her talking.

"Last cracker and slices Azurill." She said as she slowly raised it to her mouth and...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Silent defiance

choices: "...Okay... If Zorua truly changed... I guess I can forgive him..."
"N-No way! I can't forgive him! I can't believe he changed!"
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
His stomach howled in hunger.

Azurill tried to resist, his lips shaking, he couldn't hold the smile any longer.

And, when Buneary was about to bite the cracker sandwich she made, Azurill exploded.

"Gimme that! I'll do anything, just let me eat!" he shouted, getting up and running up to Buneary, who smiled and lowered the cracker to the blue pokemon, who hungrily started munching on it.

"Recital's over, huh tough guy?" Buneary said with a smirk a she watched Azurill eating his giant meal.

The blue mouse ate like never in his life, before finally backing up, filled... although he barely left any mark on the sandwich, Buneary noted.

She picked it up and ate it, before turning to face Azurill.

He was crying.

Azurill cried. It was over. He lost everything he had, his size, his life, his dignity.

At this point, whatever Buneary did to him, he didn't care. She could eat him for dessert for what mattered.

However, he discovered by glancing sideways, the bunny giantess was staring at him with a smile.
"You were hungry~" she chimed, picking up Azurill to hug him.

He sighed in exasperation.

"Buneary... stop this... why are you doing this...?" he meekly attempted to make Buneary sympathize with his situation. If she did, she could convince Celebi to give him his size back...

Though, he knew, that would mean that he had to keep his mouth shut about Zorua...

"... Zorua..." he seethed at the thought of the dark type fiend who got him into this mess. And, while the fox was in the sweet hands of Celebi, Azurill was there, with Buneary, living hell.

"... I'm doing this because I'm trying to be friends with you..." Buneary sincerely responded as she laid down on her bed, keeping Azurill in her hug.

"But... I don't want to spend my life as a doll! I don't want to be here!" he cried in despair.

Buneary frowned.

"You should have thought better before blackmailing Celebi and Zorua, Azurill. He really changed, and she really likes him, that's why she shrunk you." she told.

Azurill cried in exasperation.
"Zorua didn't change! He wanted to eat me! He stopped because of a stupid bottle of soda! Why can't you realize that?! Why can't Celebi realize that?!" he yelled, tears rolling down his cheeks.

Silence.

Buneary waited for the blue pokemon to calm down a bit. She used one of her paws to wipe the tears from his eyes as gently as she could, but he kept crying.

"... Because that's not true Azurill..." she responded.
"Zorua became really nice. Celebi... she broke his leg at some point." Azurill gasped upon hearing the words that left Buneary's mouth.

She nods.
"Yeah... she was able to heal him, she made him change. He even apologized to me for the prank he pulled on me! If you want an advice, Azurill, you should forgive him and apologize too." she said.

Azurill looked enraged.
"APOLOGIZE?! NEVER!" he shouted.

Buneary shrugged.
"Suit yourself Azurill. But keep in mind, the sooner you apologize, the sooner you're getting your size and life back." she said him.

Azurill sniffled. All he needed to do was apologize...?

"And of course, you'll have to keep Zorua's size a secret. Otherwise, Celebi isn't going to be so pleased with you... she'll either leave you with me forever..." Azurill cringed.
"Or worse, she'll shrink you even more and leave you on your own... your choice Azurill."

Azurill sniffled again.

It was simple... apologize to Zorua and Celebi... keeping his mouth sealed was harder to accomplish.

Zorua destroyed his doll, the last gift he received from his deceased mother. He couldn't simply forgive that... but, be assumed, if he didn't, he'd be stuck this size forever... with Buneary.

The mere thought made Azurill shiver.

Sure, he could always apologize, only to tell everyone about Zorua later on... but Celebi and Buneary were clear about the consequences of such choice, and he didn't want to experience them.

After a while of thinking, Azurill finally replied to Buneary,
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Lost dignity

choices: “Sure, fine...go home Azurill.”
“It’s...still too risky to let you go...sorry, really.”
“What? No, we said this was for life!”
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Azurill has a lot to think about. Celebi...broke his leg? That was a far cry from the way she was just treating him, right? Buneary was pranked hard by Zorua too, and she had forgiven him...he apologized to her...maybe...he didn’t talk to Zorua much beyond them threatening each other and bickering last night, and like it or not he was stuck like this with his only potential out being to make peace. Azurill sighed. “You and Celebi...you’re so sure he’s changed...maybe...I was hasty in threatening him...maybe I should’ve handled it differently...” He muttered and Buneary’s eyes lit up. “You mean...you’ll apologize?” She said and slowly he nodded. “Yeah...I’ll talk to him at least...apologize for threatening him...” He said and suddenly he was squeezed to her chest.

“That’s great! Don’t worry, once you and Zorua make peace i’m sure Celebi will let you go home! We’ll Go tomorrow!” She said enthusiastically and he desperately hoped she was right.

-

Buneary was standing outside of Celebi’s, holding the very nervous Azurill. He was going to apologize...to Zorua. He shook his head, maybe pokemon can change...he needed to at least make this effort. “Ready Azurill? I’m going to knock now...” She said and slowly he nodded. Buneary knocked and within a minute Celebi answered the door. “Oh, Buneary and...Azurill. Did he try anything?” She asked frankly and he gulped. Buneary shook her head. “No, Azurill is here because he wants to say something.” Buneary said as Azurill hung his head. “I’m sorry...I’d like...to apologize to you and Xorua for being too hasty...I shouldn’t have threatened you or Zorua...even if I didn’t know the extent of the situation...that was wrong of me.” He said, Celebi looked at the tiny child standing in Buneary’s paws, and slowly she smiled before petting his head with a finger. “What do you say we head in and wake that lazybones up you two?” She said gently.

-

“Zorua~ Out of bed~ Rise and shine~” He heard from the same annoyingly wonderful voice...or wonderfully annoying, it was one of the two. “One day of sleeping in...one day...” He muttered before a finger prod. “We have visitors~” And slowly he opened his eyes to see...Buneary and Azurill. “Oh...you.” He stated. “Life as a doll treating you well?” He asked mockingly as Azurill bowed his head. “I hated you Zorua...I truly did...what you did, what you took from me...it was the last...the last thing my mom gave me...I’ll never get it back...you took that from me...” Azurill had tears in his eyes. “But even then...I threatened your life...said some heinous things to you myself without knowing...you had your leg broken...badly according to Buneary...and she says you’re nice now...didn’t deserve me threatening you...so what I’m trying to say is...I’m sorry...I’m sorry for trying to blackmail you.” Azurill said, looking at the ground crying, he felt a gentle force patting him...Celebi. “I’m proud of you Azurill, and I’m sorry too, what I did to you...what WE did to you might have been rash as well.” She said smiling. “Now Zorua...what do you have to say?” She asked and Zorua sighed, rubbing at his ear. “Look Azurill, your doll...if I’d known it was that important then maybe...maybe I wouldn’t have destroyed it...I...probably still would have though so...I’m sorry. I am...so fine...peace, I forgive you...” Zorua said, earning a hug from Celebi. “Celebi...Azurill really wants to go home. What do you say?” And Celebi nodded, smiling. “I’m okay with it. What say you Zorua?” She said smiling and Zorua closed his eyes, thinking for a second before responding.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Apologies

Azurill is still down
There's a knock at the door

"Azurill...I appreciate the apology, I do. And I did mean mine but...this is too quick and I don't necessarily know if I can trust that you'll be quiet yet. It's too risky to just let you go right now, sorry...really." Zorua said as he looked at the younger pokemon's face fall. Celebi considered this before sighing. "Sadly Azurill, I see Zorua's point. But listen! If you're genuine about this, then that'll...reveal itself in time, and then we can let you go!" She said cheerfully, hoping the younger pokemon didn't start crying, or yelling, or freaking out. Buneary looked at the blue pokemon on the bed, he looked like he was shaking, but soon enough he let out a shaky sigh.

"...I don't want to spend the rest of my life like this..." He eventually said, using his tail to try and wipe his eyes. "Kid...you probably won't unless you do something bone headed stupid again like the other night. Let's just...start over, alright?" Zorua said walking towards him. Celebi wiped Azurill's eyes gently since he seemed to be struggling to do it with his tail.

"...Buneary, do you need to do anything today?" Celebi asked and the bunny shook her head. "I was just gonna do this, and then depending on what happened...go home..." She said and Celebi nodded. She brought her face in close to Azurill, it surprised and...still intimidated him, but she was trying to give a gentle smile to him. "Azurill...do you maybe want to get to know us better? I'd like to know you better." She offered to the kid, but he didn't respond right away. Slowly, he nodded. "Fine..." He said, but he seemed to be going through the motions more than having genuine enthusiasm. He had meant his apology, and his hopes soared when Zorua apologized back...maybe he was different, he wouldn't tell about the dark type but...they were still gonna keep him like this anyway?

Celebi scratched at the back of her head, noting that he seemed glum, she got an idea though. "Zorua, i'm putting the bow on you." She said and Zorua glared up. "You had best never let your guard down around that bow because the second you do it's gone..." He said and she just giggled as she picked up her tiny boyfriend, pecked him on the cheek and grabbed the bow "Such a tough guy you are~" She said as she put it on him, him struggling the whole time before setting him down in front of Azurill. Azurill got a look at him looking annoyed with the cute blue bow and started to snicker a bit. "Yeah yeah, yuck it up kid. Hey Buneary, how'd your dress up sessions go with him? Well?" He asked, hoping to strike gold.

"When Azurill was having a tantrum last night I put a pink dress on him~ It was so cute~" Immediately Azurill stopped laughing only for Zorua to start in on it. "Oh yeah, that's what I was hoping to hear! Please tell me you brought it Buneary!" He said grinning as Azurill glared at him, before his face seemed to change.

... Braixen?
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Zorua watched as Azurill's facial expression changed into a small smile.
"Nice bow." he teased.

Zorua sighed.
"That's Braixen's line - I mean, go put on some pink skirt, will ya?" he quickly retorted.

Azurill stuck his tongue out.

"See? You two are bonding already!" Celebi happily chimed, before looking at Buneary.
"Hey Buneary, wanna hang out together? So, these two can bond and we get to have fun together~"

Buneary beamed.
"Sure!" she exclaimed in excitement.

Zorua scratched his head as he walked towards the bed.
"Good. Have fun, you three... I've got a bed to return to." he said, lazily walking across the room, wanting nothing more than get to sleep again.

However, Celebi had other plans.

She smirked and bent to grab her tiny boyfriend from the floor.
"Don't even think about it, Zorua. You're coming along, whether you want it or not." she said.

He glared.
"... Don't I get to have a say in the matter?" he asked, annoyed by Celebi's possessive behavior.

But... he chose that life himself he guessed.

"Nope~" the fairy responded cheerfully.

Zorua frowned.
"... You can't force me Celi. Let me down." he told, hoping that an imperative approach would work.

Big mistake.

Celebi smirked deviously.

"Come on Zorua, let's go! It'll be-" Celebi interrupted Buneary with a movement of her paw.

"... I can't force you, you say?" she asked innocently, fighting back a giggle.

Her mouth moved dangerously close to Zorua, and Celebi spun around.
"... Really?"

Before the fox could complain, the fairy pecked him twice, before pulling back to enjoy the reaction. Which filled all of her expectations.

Zorua was blushing furiously.
"Of all the girls out there... why you?" he mumbled to himself.

Celebi giggled and turned around to see Buneary and Azurill staring at them, shocked.

"... Kids, you saw nothing!" Zorua desperately tried.

However, it was too late.

"... You two - together?!" Buneary cried in excitement as she skipped towards the couple.

Celebi blushed and merrily nodded her head.

--

"Since when? How? Thatissocute~!" Buneary cried as she merrily skipped around Celebi while they headed into a random direction.

Azurill felt sick as he was being carried by the overexcited bunny; Zorua, on the other hand, was in a state of deep embarrassment, between having to wear the bow and hat, having to deal with an overexcited Buneary blabbering about him and his girlfriend and having to keep an illusion over himself and Azurill to make the two of them look like actual dolls.

Seriously, if Azurill didn't tell about him, Buneary would be the one blowing his cover though.

"Remember the other night's sleepover?" Celebi responded to the bunny's question.

"Ohh~"

"Yup... will ya stop talking about it, now? Seriously, this is as risky as it is embarrassing..." he told, causing Celebi to giggle.

"I actually do think that it's nice... you two seem to like each other a lot..." Azurill chimed.

"And you're right!" Celebi responded.

Zorua blushed.
"You're a doll kid. Act like one." he told while Celebi pecked him on a cheek.
"You're adorable when you act like you aren't just a little doll in my hands yourself~"

Zorua sighed.

Why couldn't he resist the power of Celebi's kisses? He could be still in bed, sleeping...

"Aren't ya too big to carry pokedolls? Just let me go home..." Zorua huffed.
"Nope~"

Celebi and Buneary kept walking down a casual road, occasionally stopping to glance into shops.

"Speaking of, Buneary, did you tell Braixen or your mom about Azurill? I mean... I know you're pretty close to them..." Celebi said at some point.

The bunny shook her head as she skipped forward.
"No... I simply went out when Braixen came to call me... I don't know, did you try to contact mom, Azurill?" Buneary asked to her tiny passenger.

He shook her head... 'forgetting' to mention that he thought about it.

Celebi nodded, before deciding to change topic.
"I should buy some gloves to match the hat, Zorua~" Celebi chimed happily.

To her surprise, Zorua snickered.
"Waste of money, Celi~ no hands~" he retorted as he held his paws out, happily thinking that he finally found an accessory that Celebi couldn't buy.

Buneary giggled as Celebi sighed in defeat.
"I'm still buying you something else - and I swear you'll have to wear it." she responded playfully.

"You know, I did the same with Azurill... couldn't use the gloves on him though..." Buneary recalled, the quiet mouse in her paws blushing.

"Buneary... that's humiliating..." he told in embarrassment.
"Nope~ it's cute~"

Zorua snickered.
"Get used to it kid~" he chimed.

Celebi looked down to scold her boyfriend... when she suddenly bumped into someone.

"Oh... sorry..." she said, stepping back, noting that she actually bumped into...

Were things fine right now?

"...I kinda like scary movies...Wigglytuff doesn't let me watch them though..." She heard Azurill mutter and she kinda smiled a bit at the small pokemon.

"It was so cute of him - oh, hey, we're here!" she said as they approached the movie theatre.

Immediately, Braixen stared with sparkling eyes at the poster of a purple bat with four wings and a black cape.

‘Count Crobat’ it read.

"Braixen, seriously, Azurill and Buneary can't watch this..." Celebi meekly said.

"Oh, I can watch it!" Zorua chimed.

Celebi sighed as Braixen moved to the ticket booth.
"Let's buy three tickets." she said excitedly.

"Three? Don't you mean five?" Azurill asked.

Braixen smiles.

Zorua sighs.
"Kid, dolls don't usually watch movies."

--

"Your blood is mine!" the Crobat flew towards the Jynx, who started running across the room. She opened the door and ran, the purple bat chasing after her.

Jynx kept running through the castle, many Zubat coming out from the shadows to try and bite her. However, she managed to evade them all and ran towards the exit.

At some point though, she tripped over her own skirt and fell face down on the hard, stone floor.

"Run Jynx, you can make it!" Buneary shouted as screams erupted around her and the others.

"She won't!" Braixen chimed.
"Not with the Count right behind her!" Zorua said excitedly, eyes glued to the big screen. He turned around to face his girlfriend, whose lap he was sitting on.
"Whaddya think Celebi?" he asked, noticing that she had her paws over her closed eyes.

"Is it over?" she asked. Zorua snickered.
"Yes~"

Celebi slowly removed her paws to see Jynx hiding in an apparently quiet, dark room of the castle. She looked around in darkness, before spotting two yellow eyes staring at her from the shadows...

Then, before she could think of screaming, Count Crobat flew forward, his fangs sinking into her neck.

Screams of fear erupted inside the movie theatre. One of them belonged to Celebi,

"I HATE YOU ZORUA!"

The fox found himself being hugged hard to her chest, while the screen displayed rain falling down from the sky, thunderbolts enlightening the dark forest around the castle.

Zorua smirked.

Perfect moment...

--

"That was so cool!" Braixen and Zorua said in unison as Celebi stumbled out of the movie theatre, followed by the small group.

The fairy glared at her boyfriend.
"... No more Count Crobat for me..." she says, trying to shake off the images of what she just saw.

"And more for me!" Zorua chimed.

"It was... ehm..." Buneary tried to say.
"Horrible. But so cool!" Azurill chimed in excitement.

He was genuinely surprised at how much fun he had. Wigglytuff didn't let him watch that kind of stuff, and he truly enjoyed every second of it.

"You're talking, kid," Zorua snickered.

"Honestly, did you see how he avoided sunlight by covering himself with his own cape? It seemed like people were going to kill him... and he escaped! He actually did!" Braixen chimed with sparkles in his eyes.

"And when Mr. Mime tried to attack him but got bitten and turned into a Zubat?" Zorua asked, rising his paw and high-fiving Braixen.

"Please stop talking about it... I feel - hey!" Celebi said as she looked at Zorua, taking notice of something odd.

Zorua grinned.

"Weren't you wearing your hat and bow? Where are they?" Celebi asked.

"Oh, must've lost them~ told ya to not let your guard down~" Zorua said.

Celebi stared at him in silence for a moment.
"You know I'm simply replacing those, right?" she said.

"Why? Have you got money with ya?"

Celebi quieted down for good. She had spent all her money for the ticket... a total waste.

"Celebi?! Outsmarted?!" Braixen stated in shock, causing Zorua to start snickering.
"Nobody can outsmart ME!" he self-praised.

Celebi glared.
"Just wait until we get home... I swear the next bow I buy you is going to be pink." she said.

Zorua simply shrugged.
"It won't last long anyway~" he said cheerfully as the small group started moving again.

--

"So? Had fun Azurill?" Buneary asked as she slipped home.

"Yeah! It was amazing!" he chimed happily.

He had to admit, yesterday he wouldn't have even wanted to reply to Buneary... and there he was, enjoying her company.

The bunny giggled.
"Glad to hear that~" she said, opening the front door of her house.

"Mom~ I'm home~" she said cheerfully.

"Hi honey! Enjoyed your day?" Lopunny asked her daughter, who nodded gleefully.

--

"See? Was it hard Zorua?" Celebi asked her boyfriend.

"Getting rid of the bow and hat? Nope~" he snickered from her paws, causing the fairy to frown.
"Very funny." she said, glaring daggers at him.

"... And no, I meant bonding with Azurill." she continued, deciding to let it slide... for now.

Zorua shrugged.
"No, I suppose... kid's fun to be around when he isn't being a brat." he responded.
"Same goes for you~" Celebi sang, smiling again, causing her boyfriend to blush.

She leaned down to peck him... without noticing a pokemon coming their way.

Luckily, Zorua did.

Celebi opened her eyes... to find herself kissing a pokedoll while Smoochum walked in her direction.

The pink pokemon blinked a few times, while Celebi blushed as she stopped.
"Oh, Smoochum... hi there. How are you doing...?" she asked, hoping that the pink pokemon didn't see anything...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Movie time

choices: "...I don't think we should let Azurill go back to that creep."
"...We can't keep him prisoner forever, can we?"
"...we should tell Azurill...it's the right thing to do."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"I'm okay..." Smoochum said, looking at the older pokemon and her assumed pokedoll. "Aren't you a little old for those...?" The Smoochum asked curiously, putting her paw to her chin.

"Oh...heh, some things you just don't grow out of." Celebi said as she laughed and the Smoochum looked confused for a second before laughing too. "I guess not, huh? Oh, Wigglytuff!" She said excited as Celebi turned around to see the pink rabbit approaching them, smiling. "Smoochum! There you are, and...oh, Celebi? Hey there!" He greeted cheerfully as he approached. "How are you kids doing?"

"Fine..." Celebi muttered, hugging Zorua closer. "Hmm? A pokedoll. Ha! A bit old for that, aintcha?" Wigglytuff said playfully as Smoochum went over to him.

"We should get going girl, it's getting late!" He said and Celebi thought of something. His disposition seemed...odd? Didn't it? It hadn't changed but...Azurill was missing and Wigglytuff was his current guardian, correct?

"Um...Wigglytuff, have you seen Azurill lately? I noticed he isn't around..." Celebi said, wanting to see his reaction. Smoochum looked like she was about to cry hearing that. The pink bunny stopped in his tracks and sighed. "Is Swinub still telling pokemon? Azurill...he...they found his body yesterday morning, Swinub is going around telling people that he's missing but...i've been trying to keep it quiet around the village, for the kids sake, but he's going around making a fuss...need to have another talk with that kid..." He mumbled and Celebi blinked. What...?

That didn't line up with...anything at all.

"Anyways, it's getting late for you too, right Celebi? You oughta head home too! Have a great night!" Wigglytuff said cheerfully as he took Smoochum's hand to lead her away, her looking far more down than before.

"...i'm following him, I don't know what the hell he's on about, but I gotta know." Zorua stated quietly and Celebi looked down. "Seriously? You're tiny and he could take you out easy."

"Grow me back, i'll mask myself with illusions. I'll be back at your place soon." Zorua stated and Celebi bit her lip before setting him down and growing him up. Zorua disappeared almost instantly to her, but he figured he was on the move. "...In the meantime then..." Celebi smiled a little, she was going to her stash of money at home and heading to the pokedoll shop. "A nice bright pink...that'll do nice~" She thought as she went off.

-

Zorua for his part was following the two pokemon back to his house. A nice little two story abode with multiple rooms for kids to share. 'What a nice little house ya got...freak.' Zorua thought as he saw it, holding back a gag. Wigglytuff opened the house, going in and Zorua narrowly squeezed in himself, being careful not to touch either pokemon or the door. Wigglytuff sent Smoochum up to bed before he looked around to make sure things were secure.

He then got on the phone and dialed a number, tapping the table impatiently. "Hey...yeah? Yeah it's me...the fake has been found? They bought it? Good! Good! I'll head down tomorrow to grab your cut then!...Can't believe they say don't get life insurance for kids, that's leaving money on the table when you raise so many!" Wigglytuff chuckled and Zorua's mouth hung open.

'That...that...!' Zorua thought before shaking his head. He needed to get out of here but...Wigglytuff would notice the door opening and closing right? "Look...I gotta go, gotta go talk to Swinub...brat won't keep his yap shut. Yeah, kids...seriously. Anyways, later!" Wigglytuff said as he hung up and went up the stairs. When the pink bunny was out of sight Zorua made his exit.

"You're a piece of slime Wigglytuff!" He shouted when he was out and he made himself visible, running back to Celebi's place.

-

Zorua was running when he realized something. "Wait, her mom!" but he was relieved to see Celebi walking towards him from her house, smiling. "Celi, you're not going to believe it!"

"Neither will you Zorua! They were out of blue!" She said as she held up a bright pink bow.

"...I'll play this game as long as it takes until you're broke Celebi...okay, wait, not the time! Wigglytuff faked Azurill's death!" Celebi blinked. "W-what?"

"Yeah, he took out a life insurance policy on the kid and when he went missing, capitalized on it! He's already told all his kids that Azurill is dead!" Celebi's mouth hung open. "Well...if you want to think about it in another way, I guess we COULD'VE kept him at that size forever and no one would've been the wiser..." Zorua mused before shaking his head to see Celebi moving past him.

"And where are you going?" He asked.

"To Buneary's." Celebi said, an edge of anger in her voice.

"...that's a bad idea Celi." And she didn't stop moving.

"...Celebi, that's an ACTUAL bad idea!" And she stopped to turn around and look at him. "What, do you want me to grow Azurill back in a few days, none the wiser, and send him back to Wigglytuff saying 'surprise!' only to find out his friends thought he was dead and Wigglytuff faked his death for money!?" Celebi said, mad.

"So you plan to tell the kid NOW, after a day like today, where we made peace?" Zorua said and Celebi bit her lip. "Wait on it...hell, maybe don't grow him back, I don't know."

"What!? And how would he react to that!?" Celebi said and Zorua sighed. "How about...we wait on it until another day, it's late, okay? We can discuss it later...rationally." He couldn't believe he was being the voice of reason right now and she sighed.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Faking it

choices: "... Let's go to Buneary's... we've got to tell Azurill..." Celebi said
"We'll tell him tomorrow... let's just go home..." Celebi said
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Celebi sighed. Never in the four days of dating Zorua she had thought he could be the voice of reason... at this point, everything was possible.

"And so? What do we do, Zorua? We can't let Azurill go back to that creep! He's... He's an evil beast that makes money by using his kids!" Celebi shout in indignation and anger.

"Shh! D'you want the whole neighborhood to think find out?!" Zorua shushed her.
"And yes, I know that we can't let him go back to Wigglytuff... but we can't set him free either!"

"And what do we do then? There's no choice Zorua, I'm sorry to say, but we've got to grow Azurill back and free him immediately..." Celebi said.

Zorua sighed.
"Celi... what do ya think will happen if we set free a kid whose corpse they found in the woods and whose decease was publicly revealed?" he asked, trying to make his girlfriend reason.

Celebi stared at him in silence for a while, trying to see his line of thinking, but failing to do so.

Zorua sighed.
"Questions Celebi. A lot." he told.

"I don't follow."

"Think, Celebi, think! They'd ask him all sorts of things! And he'd be forced to say where he was for two days and why he was there! Then... I'll let you guess the rest." Zorua said.

Celebi stared at him, mouth hanging open.

He was right. About everything.

And if such things happened...

Celebi gasped, the bright pink bow falling from her paws... and Zorua 'accidentally' made it disappear with an illusion, though Celebi was far too deep in thought to notice.

If the things Zorua said happened, she wouldn't be able to dress up hi- to be with her boyfriend anymore because Azurill would reveal who shrunk him and why! She couldn't allow it.

"Zorua..." Celebi said dejectedly as she hugged him.
"You got it... it'd be over, Celebi. I would be thrown out of your house, and your mom would most likely keep you cooped up... we wouldn't be able to be together, there won't be any ‘us’ anymore... Is that what you really want?" he asked, horrified by the thought that he could seriously lose his girlfriend and home if she grew Azurill back to his original height.

Celebi sobbed, burying her head in his fur.
"No Zorua... you're right... we can't grow Azurill back... damn it, if only he never discovered you!" she cried in frustration.

He hugged her back.
"I know... but you won't grow him back, right?" he asked.

Celebi pulled back.
"No... no..." she said dejectedly, shaking her head as if trying to shake off a hideous scenario: her roomie and boyfriend. Gone.

Zorua sighed.
"Good. Though we still have a problem, Celebi..." Zorua said, making Celebi open her eyes.

The dark type nodded.
"... We've got to tell Azurill and Buneary now... how to tell them that he's got to stay with her permanently, tiny and helpless, without telling him why we're actually doing this? He'll think that I just changed my mind and he'll go straight back to hating me..." he said with a groan.
"Arceus, why do I keep ending in these situations?"

Celebi looked at him, pondering something.

"Well... maybe we could tell him... or no... I don't know, we'll see... for now..."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: A reason to be tiny

choices: "Kid...Wigglytuff isn't who you think he is, he faked your death"
"...Let's go Celi"
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"...We've got to tell him...the longer he thinks i'm going to grow him back, the harder it'll be to tell him i'm not..." Celebi said and Zorua sighed. "Yeah. You're probably right about that...let's get this sorry business over with." He said as Celebi shrunk him down and picked him up. She looked around. "The...bow?" She said and Zorua gave a bit of a smile. "I haven't the faintest idea what you're talking about." He said, making Celebi, for the briefest of moments in this, giggle a bit. "Guess I do need to be careful..." She said as they started off the Buneary's.

-

"That is kind of impressive Azurill." The bunny giantess was watching him slowly roll around on his tail, he looked like he was intensely concentrating, with his eyes squinted and tongue slightly hanging out of his mouth. "Heh, tha-whoa!" He fell off of his tail as it rolled out from under him and landed on his back on Buneary's bed. She started giggling. "Well...I HAVE done it for longer!" He boasted as he got up, embarrassed by his tumble before they heard Lopunny talking from out of the door. "Just keep it brief, Buneary needs to go to bed soon."

"I will ma'am." They heard Celebi say as the door opened. She was giving a polite smile as Azurill quickly started to pretend to be a doll because of Lopunny. The door was shut and the 4 pokemon were in the room as Celebi's smile slowly turned sad and she looked at the tiny blue pokemon who got up from his position. "Hi Celebi! Hi Zorua! It's a bit weird seeing you two again so soon~" Buneary said as Azurill hopped closer to Buneary and the two other pokemon in the room. "Yeah, I know...we just...have something to say to Azurill." Celebi said and Zorua nodded. The blue pokemon looked confused. "What's up...?" He asked, with a little trepidation. He saw Celebi smiling sadly.

"Kid...we can't grow you back." Zorua stated, figuring it was better to not beat around the bush. Azurill looked scared. "W-wha...?" He seemed surprised, but Buneary was the first to talk. "Why not Zorua!?" She asked, a little bit more passionate than the two had expected. Zorua sighed. "The situation...is a lot more complex than we first thought, and if Azurill grew back it would come back to us for sure." He said and Azurill looked up.

"B-but I won't tell...I thought we were friends, and-and-" He was panicking. He did NOT want to be like this forever! "Kid, we are friends...listen, it won't be so bad, we can have more days like today, an-"

"Bu-but I want to see Wigglytuff again, and Swinub, and Magby, and Igglybuff! I want to go to school, I-I-why!?" There was desperation in Azurill's voice now and Celebi set Zorua on the bed as he went over to the kid. Azurill however started to bounce away. "Stay away from me!" He yelled as he went to the end of the bed and turned his back to the group, flopping on his side. "...I shouldn't have been dumb...why did I think you would change..." Azurill said, they heard him sniffling, he seemed to be fighting back tears. Zorua looked at him. Buneary was looking between Celebi and Azurill wondering why things were falling apart so soon after making peace, eventually Zorua spoke.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Breaking the news

choices: Buneary carefully explains the situation...
Meanwhile, with Celebi and Zorua...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Seeing Azurill like that, Zorua understood that there was nothing he could do... either they waited for him to calm down - and it wasn't possible because he and Celebi had to leave soon - or he decided to simply hear them - and it was improbable because Azurill didn't look like one who's willing to listen.

Zorua sighed deeply as he turned around to see his girlfriend, staring at the blue mouse while biting her lip.
"... Let's go Celi." the little dark type said dejectedly.

"B-But..."

"Celebi, dear, it's our dinner time, I'm afraid... but feel free to come back tomorrow~" Lopunny's voice rang from outside, interrupting her.

Celebi looked at Zorua, who nodded.
"Yes ma'am, I'm leaving!" she responded, picking up the dark fox.

"See you Buneary..." she mumbled dejectedly as she walked to the door.
"See you around, kid... kids..." Zorua said in a neutral voice as his living perch opened the door.

But Buneary quietly pulled Celebi back.

"Celi... Zorua, why won't you give Azurill his size back? He... he just wants to go home..." she said.

Zorua sighed.
"I know. Thing is, he can't." he said frankly.

"Why?"

Celebi spoke up,
"Wigglytuff... he faked Azurill's death for money... if we grow Azurill back and set him free, the village will want answers. Answers that would force me and Zorua to..." she stopped to give the fox a dejected look, which he returned.

Buneary quietly nodded, mouth hanging open. She thought that Wigglytuff loved his kids!

"I understand..." she said, looking at the whimpering Azurill, and in reality not understanding at all.

Again, Celebi bit her lip.
"Buneary, tell him why he can't go back...me and Zorua will come back tomorrow, okay? Now, good evening." she said.

Buneary smiled, shook her paw, pecked Zorua's cheek and let the fairy take her leave.

--

"And so that's how it went... poorly..." Zorua bitterly sighed.
"Kid hates me again..."

Celebi smiled dejectedly.
"Don't be like that... I told Buneary to explain the situation to Azurill... he'll understand..." she said, before giggling.
"In the meantime, something in our bellies and a good book will cheer us up~"

The sentence had the power of making Zorua feel even worse. And Celebi quickly realized her mistake.

"... Did I say book? I meant, lime soda and hickory chips~" she said, making him turn around and smile at her, tail wagging.
"This girl knows me!" he cheered, causing Celebi to smile... before she grinned.

"Yeah... oh, and the shop is still open..." she said, eyeing a shop.

Zorua turned around... his eyes widened.

"No!... Stay away from there... I refuse!" he cried, but was silenced by one of Celebi's fingers as she merrily made her way into the pokedoll shop, seeking for another bow... one that Zorua wouldn't get rid of.

"Come on, quit whining you~ I'll even let you pick which one you want~" Celebi sang.

Zorua stopped for a moment to pretend to be looking around the store.
"Okay... I pick... NOTHING!" he cried, causing Celebi to laugh.
"Wrong answer~ I'm picking for you~" she remarked as she started looking around.

Zorua grumbled.

Celebi's eyes fell on a tiny green bow. She smiled as she picked it up.
"This~" she said cheerfully.

And Zorua instantly knew he wasn't going to get rid of that.

It reminded him of his girlfriend.

--

Azurill laid on Buneary's pillow, crying.

Zorua and Celebi didn't want to grow him back... didn't want to let him go home... he thought he had made peace with Zorua, but he must've had second thoughts... there was no other explanation!

The door of the room opened as Buneary quietly walked inside.

"I brought you something, Azurill..." he heard her say... and his stomach growled in approval.

Sniffling, the blue pokemon turned around to see the bunny giantess setting some cheese and bread on the bed, before sitting down.

Well... at least Buneary was being friendly, he thought as he started biting into the giantess food.

"How are you feeling, Azurill...?" the giantess asked.

"W-" Azurill swallowed.
"... Why? Why don't they want to let me go home... I don't want to remain like this forever... I-I..." he started crying again.

Buneary gently picked him up and hugged him to her chest, his tears rolling down her brown fur and onto the cream part of her body.

"Azurill... there's a reason why you can't grow back... Celi and Zorua told me..." Buneary gently says, hugging tighter.

She couldn't believe that Wigglytuff did something such as faking a kid's death... it was monstrous! An action worthy of hell's worst demons!

However, Azurill couldn't possibly know.

"... Is it that dumb Zorua? He changed his mind, didn't he?! I told him I wasn't going to tell anybody and he-"

"It wasn't Zorua... or Celebi. It was Wigglytuff, Azurill..." Buneary revealed with a sigh, instantly silencing the blue pokemon.

Wigglytuff...?

"W-What about him...?" Azurill timidly asked.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Letting go

choices: The next day, Buneary attempts to call either Celebi or Braixen
Buneary spends the day with Azurill, attempting to get to know him better
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Wigglytuff..." She sighed. 'Celi, Zorua...why are you having me do this...?' She thought sadly before continuing. "Wigglytuff...probably thought you weren't coming back after a bit...and he...instead of looking for you or anything like that...decided that he would...make the most of you disappearing." She said gently and Azurill only got more confused. "He...didn't look for me?" Azurill said, almost like he didn't believe it, he tried to look up, but a gentle force stopped him as she cradled him to her with one paw and used the other to pet him.

"Azurill...he...he didn't no. I don't know what he was thinking, but it wasn't of you. He...faked your death Azurill, he made money off of it too. That's why Celi and Zorua told me...that they can't let you go back. Not only do they assume you aren't coming back...but the questions would expose Zorua...then the entire village might be after him the way he is now...he'd go back to living with no one...back to his old self, maybe." Buneary said sadly and Azurill looked down.

"There's no way...Wigglytuff...he-he loves me! He wouldn't do that! He couldn't do that!" Azurill said shaking his head as he cried, and he felt wetness hit his head. "I'm sorry Azurill. I really am...I know this doesn't seem fair...and it isn't fair for you...but please try to understand...after today, Celebi and Zorua wouldn't want to hurt you, they don't WANT this for you...it's just the best option right now. Azurill..." She said as she cried on him. He looked down.

"Are you sure that...m-maybe Zorua and Celebi didn't misunderstand or something? I just..." He trailed off, sniffling as Buneary gently rubbed his head, wiping her tears off of him.

"Azurill...I promise, we'll get a definitive answer for you." She said, already knowing what it would be.

"I don't want to be your doll forever Buneary..." He muttered, still sniffling as she looked at him. He felt a warm softness on top of his head as he looked up. She had leaned down to kiss the top of his head.

"You're not my doll Azurill...you're my friend...let's not worry about the nastiness of it all okay? You and I...should get to know each other better right? You're not trying to avoid me right now, or having tantrums, and it's just the two of us right...tomorrow, you and I, let's play and talk, okay? We can have fun like this...you'll see." She said, attempting to cheer him up.

"...Can't you call Celebi...to maybe find out for sure...or...or maybe have Braixen find out! Get her opinion on it..." He wasn't processing the information well, that was clear. "Tell you what Azurill...let's sleep on it, okay?" She said gently as she set him down on the bed, and went to turn off her lights. She then got back in bed and Azurill felt a gentle warm force grab him and pull him up against...a warm, soft wall. Buneary was cuddling him. "You'll feel better about it in the morning. Good night, Azurill." The gentle voice of the giantess rang out. "...Kay...night..." He was too tired to say anything else he realized, as he dozed off, the world around him fading to darkness.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Explaining

choices: "Go out to the park! You and me!"
"Play lots of games inside!"
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Azurill slowly opened his eyes to see that sunlight had invaded the room. He tried to move, but found it to be a fruitless effort. 'I can't even get out of bed on my own...' He thought as he looked up to see Buneary's sleeping face. She was so...so...gigantic, huge, big, intimidating...all of it.

"You're not my doll Azurill...you're my friend."

How could she even think that looking at him...how small he was. He was already in a negative mood as he simply rested against her...waiting for her to wake up. 'No way Wigglytuff would do that to me...he wouldn't...' Azurill thought sadly. He didn't really know how long he waited...minutes...hours...but soon enough the environment around him shifted as he heard the giantess stir.

"Mm...morning Azurill..." She said sleepily, happily seeing that he was awake as she stirred. She gently set him down as she stretched, him looking at this giantess extend her limbs.

'She also...kissed me...' He thought, he was processing this bit of info differently than the rest. It's true that he had seen her at school...but he was always too shy to really make friends there, and Buneary...he shook his head. None of that mattered right now, and she certainly had no clue about him, she was just trying to reassure him with that kiss, nothing more.

"So Azurill...feeling better?" She asked gently, interrupting his chain of thoughts, he looked down. "I don't know how I could Buneary...it's...a lot that you're asking me to accept..." He muttered as she nodded. "I know it is..." She gently pet his head. "But today, we're not going to worry about that, okay? Today is a fun day!" She said enthusiastically as she hopped off of the bed, making Azurill bounce a bit with her mattress.

"We're gonna..."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Waking up

choices: She manages to calm him down
Azurill is inconsolable
There's a knock on the door, Braixen is visiting
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"We're gonna go out to the park Azurill! You and me!" She said excitedly as she leaned in to look closer at him. He slightly backed away, slightly put off by the sudden closeness of her face. "Why...what can I even do there? Aren't you worried about taking me out in public anyway..." He said dejectedly and she got a serious look on her face. "We can do lots there Azurill, you'll see. This size...you don't need to let it get you down okay! We're going to have fun!" She smiled at him as she rose up from looking at him. "I'll be right back...okay?" She walked away, leaving Azurill on the bed as she closed the door.

He sat there for a bit. 'I can't do this for the rest of my life...' He thought. He looked at the window, before shaking his head. It was a hard position to be in...he had grown to like Celebi, and he thought he liked Zorua...Buneary...he sighed a bit before sitting on his tail. Soon Buneary returned and looked happy. "So um...my mom gave me a little bit of money too, so we can get a treat as well!" She said excitedly as she picked Azurill up, and saw the look on his face. "Please...let's just...try and have fun, okay?" She hugged him to her chest as she went to leave the room. He put on his best doll face as they passed Lopunny. "Be careful honey, and have fun!" He heard her call. "I will, thank you again mom!"

-

"Buneary...I can't do anything here..." Azurill whispered from her chest as they approached the park. "Of course you can! We just need to find it." She looked around before her eyes landed on something. "Imagine how fun a slide would be for you right now Azurill?" She said, trying to get him into it, as she approached it. He gulped. "S-seems...a bit dangerous..." He muttered, but she gently kept him to her chest with one paw as she used her other paw to help her climb the ladder. "Of course not, I have you safe and secure little guy! Just wait, I bet it'll be a blast!" She said as she approached the top and Azurill looked down...he felt like he was on top of a giant city building right now. It was...dizzying. "No, really Buneary, I don't knoo-aaaaaahhHHHHHHHHH!" He was cut off as he went down the slide with Buneary giggling as she went down it with him. They landed almost as quickly as it began with Buneary laughing and Azurill breathing very heavily.

"Wasn't that fun Azurill?" She smiled down at him. "...it was TERRIFYING!" He yelled before she shushed him. "We're in public...please don't attract attention..." She said, he nodded. "...but...yes, I did think it was thrilling too..." He said and her smile grew wider. "See, we can find stuff to do."

-

She had less success finding other stuff besides the slide, which they did a few times. She did get on the spinner with him, but all it did was make him nauseous and uncomfortable so she opted to not revisit it. "Hmm...we shouldn't be out too much longer...listen, let's go get an ice cream cone and head home, okay Azurill?"

"...sure..." He said from her chest, he wasn't trying to talk much, if to respect Buneary's wish to keep quiet. He didn't think seeking attention would be to his benefit, even if he didn't quite think Celebi would shrink him to nothingness if he tried to get it at this point. 'I don't think I want to rat them out but...I want to go home...'

"So...i'll let you pick the flavor, if you want?" Buneary said gently as he looked down. "Sherbet..." He said as she smiled. "I like that flavor too~" She giggled as she went to approach the stand. He put on his doll impression while she was buying it, and soon enough they were sitting on a bench. "Go ahead Azurill." She said as she lowered the cone to him, it was...huge. He took a few licks, then she raised it up and did the same. "See, isn't this nice?" She said as she lowered it again. "I guess...kinda..." He said after he finished licking it another time. They say there for a little while, going back and forth until...

"Swinub, you need to accept it. It's hard for all of us...but..." Wigglytuff's voice rang out.

"No! I just can't believe it...I can't..." Azurill's eyes started to water, and Buneary took notice. 'Oh no...' She thought, but she didn't know what she could do.

"I...saw him today Swinub, before they cremated him...please Swinub...you're making this harder for everyone, we have to accept it and move on. It's what Azurill would want." The gentle voice was like a vice grip on Azurill's throat. 'I'm here!' He wanted to shout, but he couldn't form the words as he felt a dizzying rush come and go through his head. They were...telling the truth, the whole time. Zorua, Celebi...that meant...Wigglytuff had really faked his death and...he was hyperventilating at this point and Buneary gently held him as she set the cone down. It was almost gone anyways and she had more pressing things to think about.

"Swinub...here, we need to go home, you need to consider how your actions and constantly bringing up Azurill makes you and our family look in public..."

"But...but..." Soon the voices faded as Wigglytuff led Swinub away, them having never seen the tiny Azurill.

"I can't imagine Azurill...I really can't, I need to ask you to stay quiet, it's a selfish request I know, but...it's better for you too." She whispered but the words didn't even register in Azurill's mind. He wasn't making any words anyway, Buneary gently got up as she held him close to her chest and went home.

-

"Azurill, please..." He was wailing in her room, absolutely streaming down tears all over her bed. "W-why? It's true! He-he-" Azurill was hiccuping at this point as he flopped face first down onto Buneary's sheets. He didn't want to see anyone, he didn't want to talk to anyone, he didn't even want to be. "This is scary! I want to go home! I don't want to be small! I want to play with Swinub! I want to talk to them again! I want to ask Wigglytuff why he did it! He must've had a reason!? A mistake!?" Buneary bit her lip. This was far worse than any of the previous tantrums he had...she found it hard to blame him for feeling the way he felt though, but all the same her mom might hear him if he kept this up.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Park revelations

choices: "...Let me take him for a bit, my parents aren't home much and I can help him"
"I believe in you Buneary...you can take care of him"
"I'll go talk with Celebi and Zorua, there's gotta be a better solution to this"
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Buneary was at a loss of what to do before she heard her mom calling. "Buneary, Braixen is here! Is it alright if she comes in for a bit?" Buneary looked at the crying mouse and closed her eyes. Braixen was going to find out about this anyway...and maybe she could help calm him down enough to not make a fuss. It wasn't ideal but..."Yeah mom, i'd love to talk with her!" She shouted back, not opening the door, knowing if she did the chances of Azurill being heard were much, much higher. Soon enough the door opened and Braixen was standing there with a smile as she came in. "Yo bun, I came to-" She cut herself off as she heard the sniffling and crying coming from the bed and saw the sad look on Buneary's face. "Please shut the door Braixen." And she did before she came over, arms folded.

"Alright, what's going on?" She asked as she looked at Azurill on the bed. "Why is he still small?" Braixen asked and Buneary looked back at him then back to Braixen. "News hasn't spread to you then huh?" And Braixen raised an eyebrow. "Azurill died. They found his body and Wigglytuff had it cremated..." Buneary said and Braixen just looked confused. "What are you talking about? He's right-"

"That's the story according to Wigglytuff...for a life insurance policy on him..." Buneary looked at the ground sadly. "Wait...what?" Braixen's eyes widened.

"Wigglytuff faked Azurill's death when he disappeared, assuming he wasn't coming back...he did it for money...Azurill just heard the truth himself straight from Wigglytuff and..."

Azurill for his part wasn't even paying any attention to the two giantesses or their discussion, his head was still buried in Buneary's sheets as he cried into them. He had no home to go back to, he wasn't going to be grown back, he was going to be...a doll? a pet? a friend? something of a mix maybe, but he had lost his life twice now. First his mom and now...

"So what's the plan for Azurill then?" Braixen said.

"Celebi and Zorua...they were the first to find out. If we grow him back then that'll raise a lot of questions...questions that link Azurill to Zorua, and will get him..."

"Discovered and either torn apart at his size, or tossed back out into the forest where..."

"He might become bad again." Buneary murmured and Braixen sighed. "That's...a terrible situation." And Buneary nodded.

"Do you have any ideas?" She asked hopeful and Braixen moved over to the bed. "Beat Wigglytuff senseless comes to mind, but right now..." She gently reached down and picked up the tiny mouse. He was still crying as she turned him over in her palm and he was staring up at the giant face of the purple fire fox. She was giving him a kind look and she reached a finger from her free hand forward to wipe away some tears, she was also humming something...it sounded nice...

"Hey Azurill." Her voice was quiet and calm...something about it soothed him. She started humming again and again it calmed him, before...

"...That tune." Buneary said before Braixen smiled at her.

"Yup, I put you to sleep with it when you were being unruly as a baby." Braixen said before looking at the sleeping mouse in her hand.

"Thank you Braixen...but he's gonna wake up and..." Buneary looked down. She was at a loss on how to calm him down for a longer period of time.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Braixen finds out

choices: Azurill looks down. "I just want to be normal again..."
Azurill looks up. "Maybe...it can work..."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Let me take him to my place for a bit...my dad's on his trip and my mom works all the time. At the very least, no one will hear him that shouldn't..." Braixen said holding the sleeping mouse in her paw. Buneary looked at her.

"Should I come with you?" And Braixen shook her head. "Nah...if he's away from you, maybe he'll think about things differently. I have a hunch..." Braixen said smiling at the young bunny pokemon, who just weakly nodded.

"When he wakes up...tell him I said sorry..." Buneary mumbled and Braixen looked at her. "What for?" and Buneary was going to respond, but wasn't sure how to word it. "I'm sorry for...what he's going through." And Braixen gave her a small smile. "I'm sure he knows you're not trying to hurt him...but i'll let him know." Braixen patted the young bunny's head with her free hand as she went towards the door.

"Swing by tomorrow bun, i'm sure things'll work out fine...Azurill...needs perspective, that's all. He already lost so much but...if his life was shaken up once, then I think he can adapt again...I hope at least."

"I...hope you're right." Buneary said as Braixen walked out her door, using one hand to cradle the small mouse to her chest.

-

"....and it's an upset! Sawk lands a decisive blow! Machamp hits the ground!" These words were the first to enter Azurill's ears as he started to stir. The room he was in...was dark, with a dim light emanating from the corner of his eye...a TV...a giant TV. He groaned a bit as he started to get up and he felt a gentle force touch his head, the TV was muted at that point he noted. He looked around to see...Braixen, and her finger stroking his head. "Hey..." She said gently and he looked down. Memories started to enter his head, one after the other until...he started to tear up a little and Braixen kept stroking his head. "I know Azurill...it sucks, right?" She offered and he nodded. "I should have kept walking...none of it would've happened if...if I just ignored Celebi that night..." He sniffled. "Even Wigglytuff...he doesn't..."

"Look, you can't blame yourself for what Wigglytuff did. As for what happened that night...what you did...is in the past, it's regrettable but you made peace with Zorua and moved on right? Dwelling on it...it'll only make you feel worse." She said and he tried to look her in the eye. "But it caused all of this...me being tiny...my friends thinking i'm dead...my life...it's ruined."

"Hey now, none of that. You still have your life...you friends...i'm sorry about that. If they knew what happened to you...it would be bad for all of us. That's not fair, I know, but it would be bad for you too. Zorua though...Celebi, me...and Buneary too, we're your friends, aren't we?" She said and he looked down again.

"Do you hate us for all of this? It's a big change, what you're going through." He sniffled but smiled a little. "I don't think I do..." He had fun the other day with them all, right? And today at the park...he supposed he had a little fun too, but...as if reading his thoughts Braixen answered.

"It's a very different life, what we're asking you to live, but you can find happiness, right?" She said and he thought about it. "What you went through...your mom...then this, it's a lot I know, but trust me, Buneary cares about you, she wanted to say sorry for what you're going through..."

"Wigglytuff said that once...when my mom..." Azurill mumbled and Braxen shook her head. "We wouldn't dare do what he did to you in these past few days. None of us would."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Waking up

choices: Braixen brings Azurill to Buneary the next day
Braixen keeps Azurill for a few days
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Azurill looks up to give the purple fox a dejected smile.
"Maybe... Maybe you're right Braixen... It could work..." he bitterly admits.

Braixen smiles.
"See? Your mood is improving already!" she chimes, gently petting Azurill with a finger.
"Agreed, you shouldn't have provoked Celebi that night... but you'll see how sweet she can be... Zorua and his bow can agree on that~" she snickered, making Azurill laugh a bit.

"They seem so... I don't know, odd? I mean, they're together, but they've haven't got one thing in common!" the blue mouse said, and Braixen snickered again.
"That's what you think... It sounds weird, I'll admit, but you gotta agree those two are both smart and funny... you have to get used to Zorua's sense of humor..." she said.

Azurill rolls his eyes.

"But let's stop talking about the bookworm and the scoundrel, let's just watch this!" Braixen chimes as she turns on the volume again.

And the room was filled with the sound of a Hariyama and and Ursaring fighting.

--

Several hours later, Braixen finally switched off the TV and yawned, before picking Azurill and standing up from her armchair.

"... Let's go to sleep, Azurill, whaddya say?" she asked, and he nodded tiredly.

Braixen had been watching her movie for three hours. She had given him a berry to eat, and she had been trying to comfort him throughout the night. He actually had fun... especially when Braixen started teasing Zorua and the fact that Celebi liked to dress him up as a doll.

But now, the blue mouse was tired out.

Braixen reached her humble room and gently pulled back to be blankets, sliding beneath them and placing Azurill on her pillow, which could be compared to a bed to the small mouse.

"Good night Azurill... see you in the morning." Braixen says gently as she starts humming a familiar tune.

The same one that put Azurill to sleep earlier today.

He listens to the purple fox humming, feeling quite relaxed... until he eventually drifts off to sleep.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Accepting a new life

choices: It was...just Buneary here
It was...Zorua and Celebi visiting
It was...Zorua, Celebi, Espurr and Gardevoir visiting!
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Azurill was out in the park, running around with all of his friends, smiling, laughing. "Careful kids, don't wander too far." The gruff voice of Wigglytuff rung out, but they seemed to be ignoring it. Farther and farther Azurill ran, laughing the entire time before he looked back to see the others had stopped.

"What's wrong?" Azurill asked before he seemed to realize something.

"You're leaving...you have to, right?" Swinub said, looking at him sadly. Azurill looked down. He knew what this was now.

"...If I could let you know Swinub, see you again...all of you again, I would. If I could send you the message that i'll find happiness again I would...but I can't...I have to go. I'll miss you." Azurill said, as they seemed to be getting further and further away.

"We...won't forget you Azurill...even if you're with your mom now..." Swinub said. He wasn't sure if Swinub could see him, if this was reality, a dream...or if somehow they were sharing a dream...

"My mom..." Azurill smiled. "Yeah...i'm always with her Swinub. Take care, okay?" He turned around to keep running, towards a flash of light. What was in it...he wasn't sure.

-

Azurill slowly opened his eyes to see that he was facing the giant sleeping face of the older pokemon he was staying with. "Braixen..." He muttered before he thought about his dream again. "Bye guys...i'll be okay...you might never know it...but I will be." He muttered. He sat up, seeing light creeping in through Braixen's window and he waited for her to wake up. He enjoyed the quiet of the morning, using it to gather his thoughts.

He was going to live with Buneary...he'd have to be still when her mom was around, but he'd manage. She was kind...and sweet...and pretty...and...he shook his head. Okay, he would make his peace with Zorua and Celebi too. No one could have predicted what Wigglytuff would do...they probably would turn him back if they could but...as it stood, he'd make friends with them. And Braixen...he figured he'd be seeing more of her as well. She hung out with Buneary often, right? From what he gathered they seemed close, almost like sisters despite Braixen being quite a bit older than her.

So...4 friends, right? Okay...none of them had done anything to hurt him at least...well, Zorua threatened to eat him, but that was a more hostile situation between the two.

"Yeah...i'll be okay..." He said more sure of it this time before he heard the fox behind him stirring. He turned to see her stretching her arms up and yawning. 'So big...' Azurill thought before her eyes fell on him. "Oh...morning Azurill...come on, I said i'd swing by Buneary's with you right? Let's grab some breakfast and head over." She said grinning.

-

Azurill was doing his doll impression as Braixen knocked on the door, in case it was Lopunny that answered, though it was Buneary who was at the door. "Oh...Braixen! Azurill! Don't worry, my mom is out, you can stop pretending!" She said and he let out a sigh. "Feeling better?" Buneary asked and Azurill, though he looked away for a sec, slowly nodded. "I've...come to terms with it. I don't begrudge this..." He muttered and he found himself being handed to the giant bunny before she pulled him to her chest in a hug. "I'm happy...don't worry, i'll take care of you Azurill." She said kindly as she went into the house, Braixen following. "So...how's it going bun?" Braixen asked before they reached her room to see...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Back to Buneary's

choices: The group hangs out for the day
The group parts ways
Lopunny is coming back
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
When they entered the room, they saw that Celebi was there as well as a normal sized Zorua who nodded to Celebi when he saw Azurill. Celebi's eyes glowed and Zorua found himself shrinking down as Buneary and Braixen entered the room. "Hey Celi, squirt." Braixen said and Zorua huffed. "You don't need to keep calling me that...but hey Braixen." He grinned up at the giantess.

"Hey Braixen...hello Azurill." Celebi said as she nodded to the young pokemon in Buneary's grasp. "About what I asked..." Zorua said and Celebi sighed. "You sure you want to handle this alone?" She said and he grinned. "Totally! Buneary..."

"It...should be okay Celebi, I think..." Buneary said and Braixen and Azurill looked confused. "What's going on?" She asked before Celebi grabbed her arm. "Zorua wants to talk one on one with Azurill...it was his request." And Braixen nodded. "Ah, I get it...we'll be back I guess?" She said shrugging and Buneary set Azurill down on the ground before she looked down at the two. "We'll be in the next room, okay?" The giantess said as she departed to room as well.

As quickly as he'd shown up to Buneary's he found himself alone in the room with...

"So I know things went to hell in a hand basket last time we talked...didn't they?" Zorua said and Azurill looked down. "Zorua...I..."

"You heard it from him, right? That's what Buneary told us." Zorua said moving closer to the young pokemon.

"Yeah...I did...sorry about the other night..." He muttered before Zorua sat next to him.

"I don't blame you for what you said then, it's...a tough pill to swallow right? But you don't hate me again, right?" Azurill shook his head.

"No...I don't hate you. It isn't your fault what he did...or Celebi's." Azurill said and Zorua nodded letting the moment remain quiet before he started.

"Neither of us could've imagined this is how it would turn out...I suppose in a roundabout way though in the end I did win...you're a doll." Zorua gave a wry smile. "Probably for life."

"I know..."

"But y'know...no one ever said that has to be a bad thing, right? I mean, it's kinda what I am...by choice, but hey, giant hugs, you don't need to stress about the outside world much, all you can eat..." Zorua grinned. "Dumb clothes..." Azurill finished and Zorua laughed.

"That's the spirit kid. Dresses for days for you." Zorua joked and Azurill chuckled a bit, before sniffling.

"You gonna be okay?" Zorua asked and he nodded. "Yeah...yeah, I will..." Azurill used his tail to wipe his eyes before he felt Zorua's paw pat his back.

"Good. And hey, if you need anything then i'm here, as are those girls in the next room. Buneary, she'll take care of ya...Braixen too, she'll probably let you get away with more than Wigglytuff ever did...and if you want to torture yourself Celebi told me to tell you that she'd be willing to lend you books or teach you." Zorua shivered at this and Azurill chuckled.

"That's...nice, really Zorua...though I can't help but be curious...you and Celebi huh?"

Zorua scratched at his ear. "Yeah, she and I hit it off after I pranked her and she almost killed me. What can I say, i'm an endless well of charm."

Azurill laughed a bit at this.

"Won you over, didn't I?" Zorua grinned. "Come on kid...I wanted to talk with you one on one, make sure things are cool...and hey, if you want to hang out, you and me...i've got your back, when they go back to school too...i've got ya." Zorua grinned at him. "You need a best bud, right?" Azurill looked down.

"Never would've imagined this..." He mumbled, but when he looked up he saw Zorua had moved, he was walking towards the door. "Things are good!" He yelled, and soon the room was populated by the three giant pokemon. Celebi picked up Zorua and Buneary picked up Azurill.

"Glad we've got that sorted." Celebi smiled. "Did you extend my offer?" She asked and Zorua nodded.

"He said whenever I want to torture myself just go to you." Azurill said and Zorua looked at him, with a look of mock betrayal. "Oh really? That's fine...Zorua, I brought something..." She said grinning as she pulled out a frilly hat.

"Azurill, pro tip, don't rat me out like that. Another pro tip, pay attention to me if you ever need to worry about making pokedoll clothes disappear." Zorua said as the hat was placed on him. "Because this thing won't last." Braixen and Buneary laughed at this and Celebi hugged him a bit closer to her chest. "We'll see." She said.

Azurill found himself laughing. 'This...yeah, this could work.' He thought as he felt the warmth of Buneary surrounding him.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: A solid group

choices: Someone manages to find Azurill...
Azurill manages to win...
Azurill suddenly falls in a hole, ending in Zorua's underground cave...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"And now that's settled..." Braixen said with a smirk.
"Let's hang out for the day!"

"Agreed!" Celebi said cheerfully. Zorua looked at her.
"Celi, grow me back." he told.

"... Why?" the fairy asks.
"Just do it."

Celebi nodded her head and gently lowered herself, placing the tiny fox on the floor before cupping her paws together. Slowly, the two paws parted, a cyan ball forming in between them.

Celebi gave the ball a gentle push as it hovered towards Zorua, who closed his eyes, his body assaulted by a pleasant feeling as he grew in size.

Once he was back to his height, Zorua opened his eyes, got a grin and removed the now normal sized frilly hat from his head. He looked at Celebi defiantly as he dropped it on the floor and unceremoniously kicked it under Buneary's bed.

Celebi glared as she went to look under the bed... only to find that the hat was gone. She sighed.
"You know I'm going to replace it, Zorua, you'll have to give up sooner or later." she said.

The dark fox snickered, before turning his attention to Buneary. More specifically, to the still small pokemon Buneary was holding.

He took a step forward.
"Give him here Buneary... I'll show you how much fun we can have, kid, even at that size." he suggested, gently snatching the blue mouse with his muzzle and launching him in the air.

Azurill landed on top of the fox's head after a short flight.

"Aw..." the three girls cried in unison.

Zorua blushed, but grinned.

"Hang on tight kid."

--

The group quietly walked down the road, Azurill riding on Zorua's head.
"Let's go to my forest," the fox suggested at some point, glancing back to the girls following him.
"We can have fun there... whaddya say ki- uh?" Azurill was missing, he noted when he looked up. His red tuft seemed to be shaking.

"You again? When will you understand that you're not welcome here?"

Zorua groaned as he looked forward to meet the always-hostile gaze of Wigglytuff.

He instantly felt hatred growing, but decided to play it cool... for Azurill's sake... and, more importantly, for the sake of himself and Celebi.

"... Go choke on a carrot, will ya old, overgrown rabbit?" he retorted, earning a death glare from the large pink and white pokemon.

"Why you-" Wigglytuff stepped forward, but stoppe as Celebi flew in between him and Zorua.
"Wigglytuff..." she started calmly, fighting the urge to shrink the rabbit to a speck... there he was, publicly menacing her boyfriend, after what he did to Azurill... thanks to him, Azurill had no more life. The thought of shrinking him and crushing him was really tempting... or better, let Zorua pick a proper fate for him - his devious mind never ceased to surprise her...

... No.

Wigglytuff was a jerk, and an evil fraud, but he still raised kids... even though it turned out he didn't care about them at all.

"... Let us continue, Wigglytuff. Leave us alone." she warns.

Azurill peered through Zorua's black fur.

Wigglytuff forced a smile - getting on Celebi's nerves wasn't very wise.

"Oh, you can continue Celebi dear... but Zorua, I just want him to understand what he does is wrong..." Celebi clenched her fists, her eyes started glowing menacingly.

But the fairy was soon pulled back by Braixen, who started pushing her forward without saying a word, but giving Wigglytuff a gaze of pure hatred. Buneary followed the fox, Zorua walking behind them.

He too glared at the pink pokemon, who glared back.

"Scram." he said venomously.
"... Make sure you lock the door tonight," Zorua told as he started to walk away.
"Or ya might find one nasty surprise tomorrow."

--

"He didn't even talk about me..." Azurill told dejectedly.

"Forget him kid - he ain't worth it." the fox he was riding on told, indignant.
"I still can't believe it... he seems so nice and is such a... a..." Celebi couldn't finish her sentence, her teeth gritted in rage.

"A monster who only cares about money." Braixen finished, Buneary nodding timidly.

The group quieted down for a while.

Then, they finally reached Zorua's forest. The dark fox grinned.

"Tell y'all what... let's forget that piece of-"

"Zorua!"

"... And let's play!"

--

Azurill peered through a bush.

"Ready or not, here we come!" the voice of Celebi cried. Soon, the ground started shaking as the girls and Zorua spread to find him.

They had given him twenty minutes to hide.

Determined to win the game, Azurill waited until the area was clear before starting moving...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Getting over and bonding

choices: "It can't hurt to let you keep it I suppose..."
"That thing is way too dirty and ripped up to let you keep."
"I...may know someone who can mend it."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Azurill closed his eyes as he felt the tremors around him. 'I think i've got this...' He thought when he bounced back a little bit into the bush only to find that he had lost his footing. Startled he wanted to look down only to find that he was sliding into darkness. He stifled a scream as he didn't want to give his location away just yet and he found himself tumbling down until he landed on his face in what appeared to be...a hollowed out tunnel.

"Whoa..." Azurill said as he peered down the tunnel. To a normal sized pokemon it'd probably be a tight fit to crawl through, but for him...he could easily walk down it if he wanted, he looked in as his eyes adjusted to the low light to find...discarded wrappers, cans...whoopee cushions, tacks, paints, all kinds of things to...

"This must be one of Zorua's tunnels..." Azurill muttered as he felt himself stepping further and further into it, he couldn't help but be curious. He looked back to see that the hole he had fallen down into was...way too steep and high up for him to climb on his own. "Welp, if I can't get out that way...I can wait here until they find me or give up." He said to himself cheerfully as he told himself that excuse to let his curiosity take over.

He continued further and further in, the darkness getting stronger as he walked past all kinds of torn up toys, or various discarded junk food wrappers. "Man...this guy really didn't care to clean up after himself..." Azurill muttered to himself. He kept walking, it getting darker and darker before he saw something that made him gasp, and nearly made his heart stop.

There it was...tattered...torn...half falling apart but...there it was.

His Azumarill doll. His mom's doll that she gave him.

"My doll..." He said, almost not believing it before he ran towards it, it was hard to see with the low light but...it had stuffing falling apart, bite and claw marks from where Zorua ripped it up in front of him...dust and dirt, all of that. His doll was in a sorry state...he also noted that it was bigger than him now. He ran himself into it, trying to hug it and bury his head in it, he was sure he got stuffing in his mouth doing it but he didn't care.

"It's my doll!" He cried into it happily, laughing. He was thrilled in the moment to have found it. If nothing else, he was sure that Zorua would at least give it back now, right? He stayed there for who knows how long...it could've been minutes...it could've been hours, he didn't know...he almost felt himself drifting off with the comfort of his doll until...

He heard a muffled voice above him.

"Azurill!...okay, we give up! You can come out now!" It was Celebi, sounding slightly worried.

"Azurill! Please show yourself..." It was Buneary.

Azurill remembered what was going on, if he wanted out he needed their help right?

"I'm down here! I fell into a hole!" He yelled out, not sure if they'd hear him. There was a moment of silence before he heard a response.

"I know where he is! Hang on kid, i'll come get you!" It was Zorua's muffled voice. About a minute later Azurill felt tremors below him, he hugged his body closer to his doll before he saw Zorua's face smiling at him, his eyes piercing the darkness. "Hey kid, how'd you find this pl-" Zorua cut himself off as he saw Azurill clinging to his doll. He let off a sigh. "I still had that huh?"

"You don't seem to clean up very well..." Azurill said shakily. "But...I found it...and I want it back." Azurill said a bit more firm and Zorua's face softened. "Well it was yours in the first place...here, get on my head...i'll bring it back up with us, okay?" Zorua said as Azurill reluctantly broke his grip from the doll and hopped over to Zorua's giant head, climbing onto it. Zorua picked up the doll in his teeth and slowly crawled back out into the daylight.

-
