"I don't think that thing is very sanitary..." Celebi said. She was gently trying to dissuade Azurill from it, but he wasn't budging.

"I don't care! It's my doll!" Azurill said back and Celebi sighed. "It can't be good to keep around Buneary's house...if Lopunny sees it she'll throw it out." She said and Buneary nodded. "She definitely would."

"Look, it's his doll right? Just let him have the thing."

"You're only saying that because you feel guilty about what you did to it. Which is a nice sentiment, but all the same I don't think it's a good idea."

Zorua had no words to offer at that.

"It can be cleaned up Celebi. Or fixed, you really want to just toss it? After you shrunk him down and said you'd grow him back, and then let him know you can't. He finds his doll and you're gonna say he can't keep it." Braixen crossed her arms. And Celebi looked down.

"Low blow Braixen..." She mumbled before her eyes landed on the doll on the ground that Azurill was clinging to, as if his life depended on it. "It was my mom's..." He muttered and she sighed.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Finding what was lost

choices: "Of course i'll take in the little dear~"
"I'm afraid that I can't Celi~"
"Have you asked him yet~ I think he should decide~"
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Celebi looked at the tiny mouse pokemon clinging to the doll. That thing was probably diseased, or something but...could she really tear something else away from the kid after all of this? She sighed and her look softened as she crouched down to pick up the doll, he clung harder to it. "I won't let you take it..." He muttered shakily and she reached forward to pet his head with a finger. "That thing is dirty and destroyed...but I might know a pokemon that can fix it, okay?" She said gently as she picked him up and handed him to Buneary. "You know someone that can fix it then?" Zorua said and she nodded.

"Who is it? Gardevoir? Espurr?" He asked and she shook her head.

"You haven't met her."

"Is it-"

"It isn't anyone from school Braixen, she's...someone who owes me a favor. She enjoys her peace and quiet, and I ask...that you all respect that." Her eyes fell on Zorua with that.

"I ain't gonna do anything..." He said as he picked up the doll in his teeth. "Zorua, don't use your mouth for that thing." He just rolled his eyes at her statement as he flipped it into the air onto his back. "Lead the way then."

"Also...you can't tell any village pokemon about her...okay? She doesn't go there much and when she does it's only to-"

"Fine! Fine! We'll keep the existence of your mystery friend to ourselves, what, is she a shut in?"

"...No, she's actually very sociable, she just...look, she just needs her quiet." Celebi said as she took the lead.

"...Odd." Braixen said as she shrugged, and the group followed.

-

"Daaaaaang, she must be loaded." Zorua said as they looked at a mansion.

"Hmm? Oh, that's Espurr's house." Celebi said simply as Braixen and Buneary passed it, Buneary looking surprised. "Wow, she lives in a nice house..." She said as she held Azurill to her chest. They kept walking until.

"This is where she lives." Celebi said simply to the giant mansion with the music note statue in front of it. Zorua's jaw dropped. "Wh-wh-you know all these loaded pokemon!?" He said and Celebi rolled her eyes with a smirk. "I don't visit her often, like I said, she enjoys her solitude...she just happens to owe me a favor." Celebi said as she approached. "Um...should I hide Celebi?" Azurill asked and she smiled. "Nah, she won't say a word about you or any of this." Celebi said as she knocked. "If anything she'll be happy to meet you. She probably wants to know who she's helping." They waited for a few moments before the door opened.

"I wasn't expecting visitors...oh, Celi~" A melodic voice called as the door opened to reveal Meloetta. "And friends?" She finished as she saw the group behind her. "Meloetta...can I ask you a favor?"

-

"I think I can fix it~" She said as she saw the torn doll. "But I need to ask...just what happened~" Meloetta said seeing the tiny Azurill, the infamous Zorua, and the torn doll with Celebi. "It's a long story...and not one that I want to get out much..." Celebi said and Meloetta smiled.

"You know you can trust me to keep a secret~" Meloetta said as she got materials. "Okay...i'll explain as you work." Celebi said and Meloetta looked at the group and smiled. "Let me show you all something while you wait~" She said as she got up to lead them somewhere.

"Jeez...this place is fancy..." Zorua commented as they walked through the mansion.

"Definitely...it puts Espurr's place to shame..." Braixen muttered as they followed Meloetta who opened two double doors to reveal...a giant indoor pool. "You're all welcome to it if you want~" She said as the group stared in awe at it...except Celebi. "I'm gonna stick with you for now Meloetta...I do want to let you know what's going on..." Her gaze traveled to the tiny Azurill in Buneary's grasp. "I...have another thing I want to ask you too..." She said. It was an idea she got as they were walking to Meloetta's but...the more she thought about it, the more she thought it may be for the best...for everyone.

-

"Seriously, that tail is way too convenient." Zorua said looking at the tiny Azurill who was lounging on his own floating tail in the pool. "Oh please, the trade off isn't worth it...I have no paws..." He said and Zorua scoffed. "Until you're a Marill when you get to have both."

"I'll be too big for my tail then!"

"Not that big..." Zorua remarked with a smirk and Azurill gave him a deadpan look. "Really?" He said, unimpressed.

-

"I see...you found a boyfriend Celi~" Meloetta said as she worked on the doll. "Good for you~"

"It has been nice, but..."

"It leaves Azurill in a pickle, doesn't it~" Meloetta said and Celebi nodded. "The kid came at us and...I might've overreacted in shrinking him down like I did. I was going to grow him back when he apologized but..."

"Hmm~ The fake body and Wigglytuff...that's just depraved." Meloetta didn't seem to say that in her usual tone as she frowned slightly and looked up.

"I think I know what you want to ask me, am I right~" Celebi looked away.

"You...like kids. It's why you have your profession, right? And you can't...have any either...Buneary can't keep him forever, Lopunny might find out, and there's the matter of her going back to school in a few months...he'd be cooped up in her room all day most likely, or Zorua would keep him company but...here...he'd have a degree of freedom, no one would bother him...I can't grow him back, but I want him to move forward with his life. You're the best one I can think of to help him with that."

"I see~ Hmm hmm hmm~ done~" Meloetta said as she held up the good as new Azumarill doll. "As for the other thing~"
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Meloetta mends

choices: "I-I... I want to stay with Zorua... with my friends..." Azurill says
"I... If it's not a problem... Can I stay?" Azurill asks
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"You should talk to Azurill about this first, Celi" Meloetta chimed as she adopted a serious tone. Nonetheless, the smile remained on her face.
"He should decide."

Celebi leaned back on her perch of Meloetta's couch.
"You do have a point... but, what about you? Are you fine with this?" she asked.

Meloetta gave a bright smile.
"You already know the answer, don't you~?" she asked.
"I'll be more than happy to take care of the little dear~"

Celebi smiled.

"Wonderful! Let's go see him!"

--

"H-He- stop it!" Zorua cried as he was splashed with water from the tiny Azurill... and from Buneary.

"Kids, you're stopping this instant!"

Braixen snickered.
"Play along tough guy." she said as she carefully avoided getting splashed herself... a fire type didn't like water too much.

Zorua glared at her, before wearing his characteristic grin.
"I'll show y'all tough..." he mumbled as his eyes glowed briefly.

--

"Azurill~ we're don-"

Celebi stopped in mid sentence as she noted Azurill and Buneary, startled, looking at Braixen, who was pointing her staff at Zorua, and Zorua, who was standing on his hind legs, surrounded by a dark aura.

"What's going on here?" the fairy asked, Meloetta looking confused beside her.

"He almost drowned us!"
"It was a fake."
"Cheap shot dude!"
"You started it!"

Celebi face-palmed, embarrassed, while Meloetta simply giggled.

Then, she turned to Buneary and Azurill and moved closer.

"I believe this is yours, no~?" she sang as she held the restored doll close to Azurill, who looked at her with sparkling eyes.

"Thank you miss!" he cried as he leaped to the doll and hugged it. Meloetta smiled gracefully.

"Azurill..."

The mouse's gaze went to Celebi, who approached gently.
"Listen, I actually had an idea... in a few months, school will start, and you'll be left alone all day when Buneary, me and Braixen go..." she said gently.

"I don't follow... Does Zorua go to school too?" Azurill asked, and Zorua perked up.

He looked at Celebi with a grin.
"Yeah, Celi, there's me! I'll keep the kid company! Oh yeah, this is gonna be fun!" he told as he grinned at the blue mouse, who smiled.

Celebi sighed.
"Shut up Zorua..." she said, and he snickered.
"Boring sis!" he said as he started running, an annoyed Celebi chasing after him.

"C'mere you!"

Braixen snickered, Buneary giggled, Azurill laughed.

"Azurill..." Meloetta approached the tiny mouse and gently picked him up, holding him in front of her white face.

Her kind eyes stared straight into his.
"What do you say if... if you come here with me? This was Celebi's idea..." she revealed.

"What?"

"What - no!" Zorua cried as everyone looked at him... noticing he was tiny and in the paws of a smirking Celebi.

"Caught you~... why not?" the fairy asked him.

"We were just getting along!" Zorua replied.
"Hm..."

"Azurill..." Buneary mumbled, and Braixen started patting her head gently.

Azurill looked sad, but Meloetta gave a smile.
"It's your choice to make, dear kid~" she said gently.

"Kid, don't lea-" Zorua's protests was silenced by Celebi's paw on his mouth.

The fairy sighed as she looked at him with a smile and shook her head, before looking at Azurill.
"Go ahead and make your choice Azurill... without Zorua trying to manipulate you." she said as she looked at her own paws again.

Beneath her hand, Zorua smirked.

Azurill focused back on the giantess holding him. He opened his mouth, but no sound came out of it.

"So, Azurill?" Meloetta gently asked.

Azurill looked down.

It was hard.

Leaving his new friends, Zorua... but Meloetta fixed his doll, was giving him an opportunity to keep it without issue...

Zorua and Celebi stared at the blue mouse.
"See? He wants to stay with us! And you're making him choose, that's cruel!" Zorua whispered to his girlfriend.
"And you want him to be cooped up until the next summer, Zorua, that's egoistical!" Celebi retorted.

"I said I'll take care of him while y'all are at school!" he repeated.

Celebi opened her mouth to speak, but was cut off by a faint voice speaking up. She turned to look at Meloetta and Azurill.

The mouse had apparently made his choice.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: "Have you asked him yet~ I think he should ...

choices: Follow Zorua and Celebi
Follow Azurill and Meloetta
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Azurill was at a crossroads he realized...Celebi said Meloetta was more or less alone, and she chose to be that way. But she offered to take him in...she seemed really nice, but he had just made peace with Zorua, with all of them and had fun today, and the day they all hung out. But...he thought back to when he didn't like them, when he was just cooped up in Buneary's room. Aside from him being bitter and mad...he was bored, he was trapped and he didn't like it. Sure he could hang out with Zorua, that would be nice too, but...every day? There was also Lopunny to consider, if she came in the room to clean it for a long while if Buneary was at school...when Azurill needed to go to the bathrom, or got sick...and Zorua wasn't around, what'd happen? He shook his head and looked at Meloetta's eyes. Something in them...reminded him of her. He looked down. He knew his choice.

"I-I'm sorry Zorua...what Celebi is saying...makes sense. I'm out of the way this way right? And I can...live my life in peace like this." He said and Zorua looked down.

"Kid, I don't want you out of the way anymore." Celebi was letting him talk now.

"I...If it's not a problem...can I stay?" Azurill asked Meloetta who closed her eyes and hugged him. "Of course dear~"

Now it was Buneary's turn to look down as Meloetta turned her attention to her and Zorua. "You're welcome to visit, when you'd like~ He's a friend right~" Meloetta smiled and they looked up.

"...I might." Zorua said, indignant.

"He will." Celebi smiled. "He's just being pouty."

"I will too." Buneary smiled. "It's...okay Azurill, I understand. You're still my friend though." She said as she approached Meloetta and she handed Azurill to him. She hugged him to her chest and he flushed red.

"Thank you Buneary..." He said to the giantess, and she hugged him tighter.

"That's nice." Braixen smiled and Celebi nodded.

"...I guess." Zorua sighed and smiled a bit. "Though you still need to hang out with us outside of this place from time to time! Got it!" He said to Azurill and Buneary broke the hug to let him talk. "...Yeah." He said smiling as he was handed back to Meloetta.

"As I said, you're all welcome here~" Meloetta smiled.

-

"Maaaan, this sucks." Zorua was normal sized and walking with the girls away from the mansion. Buneary was riding on his back. "It's what's best for him...and for us. No one will bother him out here, or find him. He'll move on better this way...Meloetta can help him find peace, and we can...keep the narrative that he's dead safely going thanks to that jerk Wigglytuff." Celebi finished.

"I can't be the only one that also pieced together why Azurill did it, can I?" Braixen casually said her arms folded behind her head as Buneary and Zorua turned to look at her.

"...Kid loses his mom, loses his mom's doll. Nice young pokemon fixes doll and gives off crazy powerful maternal vibes. It isn't that hard." Braixen said and Celebi nodded. "Another reason why this was a good decision." She smiled and Zorua sighed. "Fine...i'm still gonna hang out with the kid and bring him out on occasion when you're all at school."

"And my offer to him is still on the table." Celebi smiled as they got further and further away from her mansion and saw Espurr's.

"...We could visit her too." Celebi smiled as they saw her mansion.

-

Meloetta was sitting at a small studio desk as she hand wrote a few things while she had Azurill sitting on the desk with his doll. "What are you writing?" He asked and she smiled at him.

"Just some new ideas for my next book~" She said as she turned back to it.

"You're an author?" Azurill said and she nodded.

"Yes~ I don't have my name put on it, I use the pen name Melody though, so I doubt you've heard of me~" And Azurill looked at her shocked.

"Melody!? That means that you write-"

"Children's books~ so you have read a few of mine then, yes~" She smiled at him again and he looked at her with a wide smile.

"My mom used to read them to me when I was really little! Of course I know them!" He said happily and she pet him a bit. "I've been writing for about 8 years now~ Probably when I was around Celi's age actually~ I'm always happy to hear kids talk about how much they enjoy my stories~ Usually through letters~" She smiled before she returned to her work and Azurill tried to look. "No peaking~" She said gently and he stopped. "I'll read it to you when i'm done with it though okay~" She smiled sweetly and he nodded, instead leaning against his doll. He felt himself drifting off with it...into a pleasant nap.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: A parting

choices: "Let's just go home." Celebi said
"Let's hang out... some sort of date! It might cheer us up!" Celebi said
"I've been thinking... Are you up for a prank? To Wigglytuff..." Celebi said
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Come inside." Espurr's voice came before she even opened the door.

Which opened shortly after to reveal the small psychic type, eyes wide open as usual as she stared at the group in front of her house with her usual deadpan look.

Zorua smiled.
"Espurr!" he chimed as he went to hug her. She happily returned the hug.

Her mind briefly went back to the sleepover at Celebi's house... if Zorua hadn't picked the fairy...

Annoyed by the attention Zorua was giving to another girl, Celebi moved forward and pulled his tail.

"OW!" he made a leap, before angrily looking at the fairy.
"What was that for?!"

"Nothing. Let's go inside." Celebi responded a she grabbed his paw and hurried to follow Espurr inside, dragging the confused dark type along.

Buneary giggled, while Braixen snickered as they too entered Espurr's house, closing the door behind themselves.

"They're at ‘jealousy level’ already..." Braixen commented to herself with a snicker.

--

"... I still can't believe it." Zorua told dejectedly as he gave off a sigh.

"You're just sad because you were starting to befriend Azurill and he was taken away, or given away..." Espurr told, deadpan, as she brought tea to her guests.

The group had opted to keep quiet about it, but she obviously discovered about Azurill thanks to her mind-reading powers. Hiding things from Espurr made as much sense as a Rhyhorn trying to hide behind a lampost.

"I know... Kid was starting to become fun to be around..." Zorua mumbled.
"You're right... I won't be seeing him to school now more..." Buneary told dejectedly as a cup floated to her paws.

Celebi bit her lip as she saw her reflection in the tea.

If only Azurill hadn't noticed her talking to Zorua that cursed night... he'd be still publicly alive... he wouldn't be forced to be cooped up in Meloetta's house for the rest of his days... and all because of Wigglytuff...

For a moment, her mind screamed hate to the big rabbit, her paws started shaking in rage as she held her cup, which started spilling tea.

"Celi..."

The fairy opened her eyes.

Everyone was staring at her, Buneary looked startled.
"... Sorry, sorry... I'm just disappointed with Wigglytuff..." she said glumly as she sighed.

"‘Disappointed’ is quite extenuating in comparison to what you're truly feeling..." Espurr chimes, causing Celebi to sigh as she put up a mental block. Espurr smirked.

"Do you think... Azurill will be fine...?" Buneary timidly asks, and Celebi nods.
"He will for sure... Meloetta's profession has a lot to do with kids..." she admits.
"Plus - she's loaded! Have you seen that house? And that pool!"

"... Which you used to scare the hell outta us!" Braixen told indignantly a she pulled a shivering Buneary closer.

Zorua snickered.

"So that's who lives in that house..." Espurr quietly tells, before smiling a bit.

"I'm sure Azurill will be fine..."

--

"And so... here we are, alone again..." Zorua told to his girlfriend as they walked down the street. They had parted ways with Buneary and Braixen - the first had to go home to have lunch with her mom, the other had a ‘super cool new movie I gotta watch!’ much to Zorua's excitement and Celebi's exasperation.

Celebi sighed.

"Yep... I can't stop thinking about this Zorua... and I feel guilty..." she admits.

"For what?"

"You two were getting along so well... and I've suggested he went to live with Meloetta... all because of that jerk Wigglytuff..." she said.

Zorua smiled softly.
"Celi, don't feel guilty - you've done much for me... too much. I mean, new home, life, friends and..." he grinned.
"... You. Azurill... he was nice to be around after all... and if you didn't shrink him, this all wouldn't be happening but... let's just say, the life you took from him, you gave me. You're one good pokemon." he said.

Celebi looked down... before glancing back at her boyfriend with a smile.

"Sweet talker." she said, leaning forward to peck his cheek.

He blushed as he snickered awkwardly.

"... So? It's just me and you now... what do we do?" he asked.

Celebi thought for a moment - what could she and him do now that they were alone?
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Moving on... trying to...

choices: They leave Wigglytuff to his night in the pit successfully
Wigglytuff gets out sooner than they expected
Wigglytuff says something that sets Zorua or Celebi off
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"I've been thinking...I know this is normally your territory but..." Celebi started as she looked at Zorua. "Are you up for a prank? On Wigglytuff...I can't let this go." Celebi finished and Zorua smiled, then he grinned, then his entire face contorted into a sinister smile as he laughed. "Aha! Oh, oh yes! Yes I would love to do that Celi! I've wanted to do that pink bunny a solid one for a loooong time, and these past few days have only fueled my desire even more."

"Wow...you're into it." Zorua's face calmed into a mere grin as he snickered. "Oh, yes I am. I'm into it more than I have been for a while. This ain't just for me, and this ain't just for you, we do this for the kid too...and boy, i'm going to enjoy every second of it."

-

"I always hated this part..." Zorua muttered as the sun was descending and he was digging a hole. "You sure you don't want me to get Buneary?" Celebi said from up top and Zorua shook his head. "Look, i've done this plenty of times Celebi! And we're bonding right now! Just us!" And Celebi rolled her eyes but smirked. "Aye aye prank master." She said with a mock salute as he kept digging and she watched, sipping an iced tea.

"Just don't pull a muscle..." She said smiling as he continued to work. He had been at it for a while, and she had to admit he was pretty speedy in digging the hole. "How do you get out of this after you dig it anyway?" Celebi asked, and he answered without turning. "I had a ladder system or something similar that I could disassemble before my victim fell in. This time I figured...I dunno, you'd levitate me out?" He said.

"Ah, I gotcha, so you're relying on me to get you out then...seems wise." She teased and he looked at her as she took an innocent sip of her tea. "...Why you..." He muttered as he kept digging.

-

The hole itself was located not terribly far from Wigglytuff's home, but it was in a relatively isolated area, the location of it was vital. "Why the rock and paint?" Celebi asked at the giant boulder Zorua requested and the bucket of black paint. Zorua started snickering. "I gots an idea~" He said in a deviously sing song voice and Celebi smiled at him. "You're enjoying this way too much." She said and he smiled back. "You want to nail him too, it was your idea. Trust me, you'll think this was worth it when we get to tell Aurill." Zorua said as they started towards his house. "Okay, now we get quiet...i'm going to be pulling some serious work with my illusions on this, i've got you covered there, you just need to do your part." Zorua said and she nodded before Zorua used his illusions to make her invisible to the naked eye. She floated up to the window to see.

'Wow, Zorua was right on the money...' She allowed herself a small giggle at her terrible pun as...she saw Wigglytuff counting money at his desk. She waited for her opportunity...and waited...and waited, until. "Yeah, i'm coming..." She heard his muffled voice from the other side of the window before seeing him get up and leave the room. She gently opened the window just a bit before she levitated the money away from his desk and to the window, holding it in place. Zorua saw this and nodded to himself, so far so good...

They waited until he came back in, and it took him a moment to notice that his money wasn't at the desk. "What the..." He saw the window and Celebi immediately made her move as Zorua masked her aura to make it seem like...wind was carrying his money out the window, bill by bill. The look on Wigglytuff's face was one of pure horror as he ran for the door and soon slammed the front door of his house open to chase the money.

'Got him!' Zorua thought, smiling, as the money was leading him right to his little hole in the ground, that Zorua had masked over with a green tarp to match the grass. At night and in a panic, Wigglytuff would have no hope of telling the difference.

Celebi and Zorua silently followed him, and soon, they heard the crash as Wigglytuff fell into the pit. Zorua nodded and the money unceremoniously fell into the pit with him. Wigglytuff was in a frenzy as he ran to each bill, picking it up and collecting them all, barely noticing his predicament until he had them all. He sighed in relief before...

"...What the hell? What is this?" Wigglytuff said before he looked up to see...an absolutely devious looking Zorua. "My my, I knew you were fat, but the ground collapsing beneath you? Maybe you should eat more carrots." Zorua grinned and Wigglytuff started fuming, before starting in an ice cold voice.

"You...you've made the biggest mistake of your life you piece of-"

"Oh, I don't know if you can call me that bunny boy, ya see, I might be a piece of...work, but you, oh you take the cake. And with that...i'm going to bid you a fond farewell in your little hole." Zorua gave him a mock look of sadness before turning away.

"GET BACK HERE RIGHT NOW YOU-" Wigglytuff was cut off by a rumbling as the rock was moved by Celebi's psychic force over the pit, essentially trapping Wigglytuff down there and leaving him in darkness.

"WHEN I GET OUT OF HERE, YOU'RE THROUGH ZORUA! THROUGH! I'LL HUNT YOU DOWN IN YOUR FOREST! I'LL GET A GROUP! YOU'RE GOING TO REGRET THIS FOR EVERY SECOND YOU HAVE LEFT OF YOUR MISERABLE LIFE!" Wigglytuff kept going as Celebi bit her lip, Zorua whistled a happy tune as he grabbed the paint brush in his mouth and wrote out on the boulder.

Here lies Wigglytuff

The ground could not support his massive generosity


Zorua put a paw to his chest and bowed his head in a mock display of grief before he started rolling with laughter and started to walk away from the pokemon that was STILL hurling out insults and threats. "Nighty night~" Zorua said in a sing song voice.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Prank time

choices: Wigglytuff makes for the forest to find him
Wigglytuff heads to either Braixen or Buneary's house
Wigglytuff heads to Celebi's house
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Celebi looked at the tombstone and started to giggle. "Wow Zorua..." She said as he grinned. "Always gotta have a nice finishing touch." He said as they walked away from the cursing pokemon.

Wigglytuff for his part was fuming...but he started to think something...this boulder, the trick with the money...he wasn't out here alone, was he? He couldn't have done this alone. "I'LL FIND YOU! I WILL! YOU AND WHOEVER YOU'RE WITH! YOU SCUMBAGS!" He yelled.

Both Celebi and Zorua stopped and turned to look and glare at the rock before Celebi shrugged. "It's just words." And Zorua grinned. "Good luck with that one tubs! Find a carrot first!" He yelled back and he heard screaming from under the rock as he whistled and continued on his merry way.

-

"...Think he's down there?"

"Dad! Are you okay?"

The children had woken up confused before they set out to try and find their dad. They found...a crudely made tombstone that had a tiny black pawprint under the epitaph on it. They were sure it was the prankster Zorua.

"...He said he was done with this...guess not..."

They got a sudden response.

"Kids! Go get Diggersby! And Dugtrio! Swinub, help them out to dig me out!" The kids traded glances before they took off to find the pokemon.

-

"It was Zorua! Zorua and a friend of his!" Wigglytuff gritted as Diggersby scratched at his head and handed Wigglytuff a water bottle, who greedily accepted it.

"Dang...he's at it again huh? And in the village..." He grunted before taking off.

"Don't you want to help me look for him?" Wigglytuff asked and Diggersby and Dugtrio both looked at him.

"We got work Wigglytuff."

"Yeah...we can't...good luck though. To be honest I wouldn't want to go in that forest after the kid..." Dugtrio said and Wigglytuff looked down. He figured that was the response he'd get.

"Kids...go home...i'll deal with this." Wigglytuff gritted and they all traded glances before going back into the house. Wigglytuff took another gulp of water before considering his options.

Zorua

Celebi

Braixen

Buneary

They were all together yesterday, a happy group. He knew where to start his search.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Wigglytuff's search

choices: "... I'm going to deal with you personally." Celebi hissed
"... Zorua here is going to deal with you." Celebi hissed
"Wait, Celi... I've got an idea~" Zorua chimed
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Zorua howled with laughter as he stared at the makeshift tombstone.

"HILARIOUS!" he shouted.
"I was starting to forget how much fun this was!"

Celebi was biting her lip... She had convinced Zorua to prank someone when she meant him to stop doing that... now, she was the one suggesting that...

She felt conflicted, not wanting to think that this was actually fun... but in the end, she too started giggling. Wigglytuff had what he deserved.

"It was admittedly really fun..." she admitted, and Zorua grinned.
"D'you understand why I do that now?" he asked, holding his paw out as Celebi high-fived him with a smile.

"... Let's go home, Zorua," she then said, glancing at the rock one last time, before climbing onto the fox's back.

He blushed, but smiled a little as he started walking, his girlfriend clinging to his neck...

Meanwhile, into the pit, Wigglytuff was angrily glancing at the stone ceiling of his entrapment.

He was sure he heard Zorua talking to someone... his mind put and two together: Zorua had a partner in this whole thing.

He mentally recalled earlier... Celebi, Buneary, Braixen... they all were walking with him... it must have been one of those pokemon, if not them all.

"HEY! I KNOW YOU'RE WITH SOMEONE! I'LL FIND YOU ALL, ZORUA, YOU AND YOUR PATHETIC FRIENDS!" he shouted at top of his lungs.

Luckily and unluckily at the same time, his voice was heard outside of his trap.

Zorua halted all of sudden with a glare fixed on his face.
"Celi." he said as his girlfriend wore a death glare.
"He just called us pathetic."

Celebi climbed off his back, inhaling sharply as she turned to the large rock that held Wigglytuff prisoner.

"Pathetic huh?"

Her eyes glowed, her paw darted forward as the rock was sent flying in pieces, hit by a psychic blast. The fairy went on the edge of the pit, looking down at its startled prisoner, who was looking up with his arms full of money.

"C-Celebi...?"

Wigglytuff tried to say something more, but he felt a psychic grasp gripping his neck and lifting him up, until he was floating above the pit and in front of the fairy, the bills falling back into the pit as he brought his paws to his neck in an useless attempt to break free.

"Pathetic? We are pathetic Wigglytuff? You're nothing more than a fiend, and all that money comes from the faked death of Azurill!" she cried.

Wigglytuff wore a look of surprise.

"I-I... d-don't know... Azurill... d-dead..." he stuttered, trying to use less oxygen possible.

"Oh no, you fat monster, Azurill is still alive... d'you know who was the last one who threatened us? Azurill himself!" Zorua chimed in with a grin, Wigglytuff's eyes widening... before he started struggling as he urgently realized that he was running out of air.

"Yeah..." Zorua grinned at Celebi.
"And I believe he has the right to know what we did to his beloved Azurill... right Celi?"

The fairy grinned as she moved Wigglytuff on the solid ground and unceremoniously let him fall on his butt. Realizing that he was free, he attempted to scramble to his feet... but, suddenly, he found the world around him growing!

Celebi and Zorua walked closer, and he watched them growing larger and larger until they were gods to him, the two titans barely able to see him.

"Not too small... we need to at least see him... this'll be fun, Wigglytuff!" Zorua's voice boomed from above as the fox took a step, his red paw smashing the ground in front of the now extremely tiny Wigglytuff.

"By the way bug, this is what happened to the poor kid..." Zorua added with a snicker that almost broke Wigglytuff's sensible ears.

The startled bunny tried to get away - tiny or not, he had to get away. Anything was better than facing Zorua and Celebi's wrath.

He'd find help, tell whoever rescued him that the duo killed Azurill and attempted to do the same to him... yeah, that'd work! Celebi would be forced to grow him back and-

Sadly, the microscopic rabbit was psychically gripped and lifted up to the giant eyes of the couple. Zorua was snickering. Celebi was glaring murderously.

" Azurill is fine anyway. Fine and happy... sadly, I can't tell the same about you, Wigglytuff, because..."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Celebi's third victim

choices: "You're going to get what's coming to you!" Azurill said angrily
"Why'd you throw me away like that?" Azurill asked sadly
"But the others still needed him..." Azurill said sadly and confused
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Wait Celi...I've got an idea~" He snickered, looking at the bug sized pink dot floating in front of him. "But we need something to put him in for the night...I think the bed I made for him is too big." Zorua said looking at his hole and Celebi looked to him. "What did you have in mind then for him?" Zorua smiled. "I don't want HIM to know, he can ponder that! For now though...ya got a jar?"

-

Wigglytuff sat in his glass prison that stretched up and up. He whimpered as he curled up and looked around. He was placed on Celebi's desk as the couple laid in bed. Celebi still a god to him...Zorua a mere giant. "So...he's been here then..." Wigglytuff whispered slightly as he tried to shut his eyes. "I gotta get out of here!" He said as he stood up defiantly...only for crushing reality to sink in again as there was no way he'd be able to do anything to the glass no matter what he tried.

He looked to the bed again to see that Celebi was asleep but...Zorua was giving him a devious grin that seemed to pierce through the night. Wigglytuff shivered.

-

"I figure...let him see what ACTUALLY happened to Azurill, and let the kid figure out what to do with him!" Zorua chimed to Celebi as they stood outside of her house, without the jar. "Hmm...that might be a bit much for Azurill though..." Celebi said and Zorua shrugged. "No way, the kid probably wants a shot at him too after what Wigglytuff did to him!" He grinned and Celebi looked down. "It's been a day since we left him with Meloetta...it's kinda soon to shake things up again for him." And Zorua rolled his eyes. "It'll be fine...besides, I want to swim in that pool again!" And Celebi chuckled a bit. "Fine, fine. I'll go grab the bug and we'll head over." Celebi said as she opened her door and Zorua grinned.

-

"Coming~" They heard after knocking on the door to Meloetta's, and soon enough they saw her smiling face. "Oh, Celebi, Zorua~" She said seeing them and she beckoned them in. "Come in come in~" And she happily closed the door behind them before giving them her full attention. "Coming back so soon~ And what's in the jar~" Meloetta asked and Celebi smiled. "Um...that I want to keep a secret for Azurill." She said. She wasn't sure if Meloetta would approve of what she did...or what may happen to the pink dot in this jar.

Wigglytuff for his part was scared out of his wits as the world swirled around him in a cacophony of movement and sound among these gods. He heard the voice of a pokemon he didn't recognize and had no idea what was about to befall him, but he heard the name...Azurill. Celebi had said it. So...this was where Azurill was, he surmised. Which meant...he needed to figure out a way to win the kid over to his side again, should be easy enough. Zorua destroyed his doll and Wigglytuff raised him after his mom died after all, he had no doubt that the two of them could figure this out together.

"Ah, Azurill~ I believe he's in the library reading~" Meloetta said and Celebi's eyes lit up as Zorua looked at the ground. "I gotta have a talk with that kid..." He muttered as Celebi playfully smacked him with a free paw. "Hush you." She said teasingly as they followed Meloetta. They took note that...all the doors in her mansion were open. Probably to give Azurill free access. "So how's he working out so far?" Zorua asked and Meloetta smiled. "Oh, he's a little sweetheart~ He likes to be around me and he loves to explore~" She said as they entered the room to find...he had bounced his way up a chair and up onto a table and was reading a book comically too big for him. He was intently moving down the page with his face to it before he bumped the book with his tail to jostle the next page, and he caught it in his teeth to turn it. "Smart kid." Zorua noted and Celebi's eyes were lit up. "It's adorable." She said, and Azurill heard their voices at this and turned around excitedly.

"Zorua! Celebi!" He said happily as the two giants came over to the table to greet him.

"He sounds...happy to see them!?" Wigglytuff fumed as he felt himself placed on the table. Azurill was a giant to him he noted as well, though still far smaller than the gods that had been tormenting him.

"Reading...really?" Zorua said in mock disappointment and Azurill just smiled. "Yeah, it's a great book!" And Celebi patted his head with a finger. "What's it about?" She asked and he smiled.

"A village is beset by a bunch of Unknown pokemon and a cosmic horror rips their lives apart! It's an anthology horror series!" Celebi's smile faltered a bit and Zorua howled with laughter. "Maybe I SHOULD read sometime!" He said, though Azurill just looked confused as their reactions seemed to swap.

"Um...anyway, we brought someone here with us...if you don't want to talk or confront him that's okay, we can leave and take him with us to deal with ourselves but..."

"I figure you'd want a crack at him, scope out the jar bud!" And Azurill turned his attention to it. He approached it and gasped as he made out...the tiny Wigglytuff that looked horrified at the center of the jar. He was puny...even to Azurill. Azurill slowly closed his eyes and let out a sigh, he opened them and responded...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: A reunion

choices: "Azurill...we're gonna take him and leave, okay? Try not to think about it."
"We'll...talk to him, i'll consider it depending on his responses."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
The reaction isn't what Zorua expected as his grin faded a bit. "My friends still needed him..." Azurill said sadly as he looked at the tiny freaked out Wigglytuff. "What's going to happen to them?" He asked softly and Celebi sighed. "I don't know Azurill..." She said.

"Igglybuff...she's gonna lose her dad...isn't she?" Zorua and Celebi traded glances.

"We'll uh...we'll take him and go, okay kid?" Zorua said, immediately realizing that this was a bad idea as Celebi picked up the jar and they started to leave.

"Wait!" Azurill said and the giants stopped before they looked at him.

"Can...can we talk?" Azurill said with a determined look on his face. "Without Wigglytuff hearing?" He asked and Zorua and Celebi traded glances before they walked back to the table and set the jar down. "Hop on kid." Zorua lowered his head to the table and Azurill complied as they walked away, leaving Wigglytuff on the table to go to another room.

-

They shut the door, more so Meloetta wouldn't hear their discussion since she still didn't know about Wigglytuff and Azurill sighed. "I...I know i'm about to ask for something big...you can't let me go...i'm dead..." Azurill gulped as he looked Celebi in the eye since he was on Zorua. "Please...let him go..."

"What!? Are you nuts!?" Zorua said and Azurill winced. "He knows WAY too much and he'd love nothing more than to destroy me!"

"Zorua...he's much much smaller than you right now, so I don't know if you could see his face...he is scared out of his ever loving mind."

"He's a worm Azurill, he deserves this." Celebi stated simply and Azurill looked down. "Think of what he took from you, think of how he profited off of it..."

"This...isn't about me. And it isn't about Wigglytuff. I know what he did to me, and it hurts...It's about Swinub...and Magby...Igglybuff...I lost my mom, and I don't want her to lose her dad. There's no more painful feeling in the world Celebi. He's scared of you, if you...threaten him. Really instill fear into him, just a bit more, someone like him...would keep his mouth shut. Please, I won't ask you for anything ever again." Azurill said with a determined look.

Zorua gave Celebi a look that all but spelled out 'Don't do it' and Celebi looked at the tiny mouse on Zorua's head.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Devil's advocate

choices: "Y'know... I'm getting hungry..."
"Celi... Looks like we've found ourselves a pet..."
"I'm feeling generous... Braixen would love to deal with him after last time..."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Celebi sighed deeply and loudly as she looked at Azurill.
"Dear, we can't let him go... you have to understand, if we do, me and Zorua will be forced to..." she interrupted herself by biting her lip.

She didn't want to even think about that possibility... Zorua was the only boyfriend she's had so far, and she didn't want to lose him when their relationship was blossoming.

Azurill stared at her silently from his perch on top of Zorua's head.

"... Not only that, this would have legal consequences too... do you really want us to go through all that? If someone finds out what's happening right now, us two are probably dead." she said, shivering at the thought.

Azurill looked sad.
"I... I understand... but the others need him Celi... I don't want you two to suffer because of this though... just scare him into not talking..." he suggested again.

And he was thrown back and forth as Zorua shook his head.

"He'd snitch anyway. If he did, the whole village is going to protect him... I'm sure, he's going to tell that we killed you... sure, we could reveal where you are, but then they'd ask why were you tiny and all... and we'd be back to square one..." the fox reasoned.

The blue mouse sighed. There was no way out of this mess.

The other kids needed him... but Celebi and Zorua were his dear friends, he didn't want them to go through that much...

Azurill felt conflicted... his friends or... his other friends...?

He didn't know.

Celebi bit her lip.
"Azurill... we're taking him, alright? Don't think about him too much... as for the other kids, we'll find a solution..." she said.

"Orphanage?"

Celebi glared at Zorua, before sighing. Gently, she picked the small mouse up. And the door suddenly opened, revealing Meloetta.

"Oh~ there you are~ tea anyone?" she asked cheerfully as she held a kettle. Zorua shook his head.
"We're leaving now... we only wanted to make sure Azurill was fine." he lied.

"Suit yourselves~"

--

Wigglytuff was sitting in his solitary jar, scared.

Azurill... he heard him, he wanted to send him back to his kids... but now, he didn't know what he and his two captors were talking about.

He felt helpless.

Even worse, Celebi and Zorua had somehow found out about what he did. If he ever managed to grow back to his size - improbable because Celebi was the only one showing such prowess as shrinking or growing things and living beings - he couldn't tell anyone about what they did, because the couple would reveal the fraud with no hesitation.

And, frankly, he didn't think they were letting him go.

Zorua wouldn't want to let this chance go, he figured with a shiver.

Then, an explosion echoed, muffled by the thin glass of the jar... but it was in reality the door of the library opening.

Soon, a blue mountain was placed in front of the jar.

Azurill.

The mouse stared down at the pink rabbit with a mix of pity and disgust.

"Azurill..."

"I tried... but you deserve whatever they have in store for you. Goodbye Wigglytuff." he whispered coldly as the jar was picked up by Celebi.

"See you soon, Azurill... please, don't think about it too much... and stop reading..." she made a motion for his open book.

Meloetta giggled behind the fairy, while Zorua snickered.
"Pay her no mind - that's a book kid!" he said cheerfully, causing Celebi to sigh.
"See ya soon kid!"

"Bye you guys!" Azurill told, eyeing the pink speck inside the jar one last time.

Wigglytuff gave him a look of desperation.

"Bye you two~ feel free to come anytime~" Meloetta said gently.

For a moment, Wigglytuff thought he could get her attention and help...

He opened his mouth to scream... but a door was closed before he got the chance.

Celebi and Zorua left the house.

--

"Well... that was unexpected..." Zorua muttered.

"And you possibly ruined Azurill's day."

"Yeah... sorry about that Celi... it was a dumb idea..."

Celebi smiled as she leaned over to peck the fox.
"Though the problem remains - what do we do with this pesky insect?" she asked, giving the jar a glare.

"Hey Wigglytuff - how pathetic are we now?" she asked, starting to shake the jar gently... although hard enough to rock its prisoner back and forth.

"I-I'm sorry!" he cried, hoping to get out of this mess by apologizing, although he doubted the two gods could hear him.

Zorua snickered.
"Oh, now he's sorry... what a coincidence..." he told sarcastically as he grinned at the jar, his canines shining sinisterly.

The pink rabbit gulped.

"... Let's stop in my forest Celi. We'll think about what to do there." the dark fox suggested as the couple walked past Espurr's mansion.

Celebi nodded.

--

The duo sat at the foot of a big tree, the jar placed in front of them.

"So... whatever do we do with him?" Celebi asked.

Zorua snickered.
"We could let him go." he said.

Celebi looked at him questioningly. Wigglytuff perked up.
"Please!" he cried.

"We could let him go, Celi..." Zorua repeated, ignoring the faint cry.

The fairy stared at him for another moment... before she smiled in understanding.
"Oh... we could let him go... but we have no intention of doing so, am I right?" she asked with a grin.

"At all~"

Wigglytuff's world shook as the jar was picked up by Celebi, who put an eye closer to it as she tried to see the look upon the rabbit's face: desperation.

She shook her head.
"Wigglytuff Wigglytuff Wigglytuff... what do we do with you? We could let you go back to your kids..." she said teasingly.
"But first, I want to know what Zorua thinks about you... Zorua?" she asked.

"I hate his guts." Zorua responded, and Celebi giggled as she neared the jar to her lips.

"I think he dislikes you..." she whispered mockingly, before the giant couple started laughing, Wigglytuff feeling terrified instead.

"N-No, seriously," Celebi stuttered, unable to control her laughter.
"What do we do with, him Zorua?"

The fox grinned.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Picking a punishment

choices: Celebi opts to talk to the kids...try to comfort them
Celebi wants to lead the kids somewhere...to Meloetta's
A tiny Zorua is out and about, and a kid sees him
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Y'know...i'm getting hungry..." Zorua said, his voice weighing heavily upon the tiny rabbit who's eyes widened. "No, NONONO!" He yelled as he started frantically pounding on the glass.

Celebi noted this and smirked. "I didn't let you do that to Azurill, remember?" She said. "Buuuut, this isn't Azurill...you earned this Wigglytuff." She said as she opened the top of the jar and slowly started to tilt it towards Zorua's open maw. Wigglytuff saw the pit below him, the giant abyss surrounded my mountain sized teeth. A place he would never return from once he entered. He frantically tried to find purchase on the glass, to find his footing, but he found himself sliding down the glass. Down to the pit. Down to his death.

"I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Please!" He yelled as he slid down, and landed on a wet surface. Zorua's tongue. The opening of his mouth closed as Wigglytuff found himself in darkness. He closed his eyes. "This isn't happening...it can't be happening!" He cried as he felt his world tilt again, and down Zorua's throat he went. With one final cry, he fell to his final rest.

"...Not very filling." Zorua grinned and Celebi smiled at her boyfriend. "I don't know why you'd expect him to be, he was tiny."

"Meh...whatever, let's go home. Or to the library, the kid might've won me over to the wonderful world of reading~" Zorua said and Celebi rolled her eyes. "Fine fine...I want to get a new book too!" She said as they set off.

-

The next few days went without much note. Celebi and Zorua for the most part kept to themselves, not for any particular reason beyond...they just wanted to spend some time with each other. Zorua for his part had been reading more, though with his size being tiny while in Celebi's house, he had issues turning the pages as well. "Azurill had it down to a science...stupid tail of his..." Zorua muttered as he tried to grip just a single page with his teeth.

"I can turn the page for you..." Celebi offered.

"Do it and you have to read with me, such as how the Miltank was evisce-"

"Nope, good luck with that." Celebi said returning her attention to her own book.

"Squeamish." He taunted.

There was a knock on the door. Celebi shut her book to go get it only to find.

"Hi miss...have you seen Wigglytuff..." It was a group of kids that greeted her. Smoochum, Cleffa, Magby, Swinub...Igglybuff. She in particular looked devastated. Celebi bit her lip.

"I...haven't. Is he missing?" She asked and the kids nodded. "Yeah...no one has seen him..." Cleffa said as she looked down. Celebi took to her thoughts. She KNEW this was going to happen. She had opted to shrink Wigglytuff down and once she did that there was no going back. He had deserved his fate, she was firm on that...but...she needed to reign in her shrinking trigger finger. It ended fine for Zorua...on a bittersweet note for Azurill...and on a deserved note for Wigglytuff, but not these kids.

"I...um...why don't you kids come in?" She said, though her mind didn't process what she had just said until it was too late and they slowly trudged past her into her house. They might see Zorua! And then...

...Would that be bad? Of course it would! It could lead to her shrinking them down too and...but then maybe Azurill and them would be fine, but then they'd be in HIS boat...She bit her lip again. She needed to navigate this carefully.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Wigglytuff's demise and the fallout after

choices: Celebi's mom spots the tiny Wigglytuff!
Zorua manages to hide him with an illusion!
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
From inside of his glass entrapment, Wigglytuff watched as Zorua grinned, a horrible, toothy grin distorted because of the glass.

Then, the fox started snickering.
"Y'know, Celi, the first thing I'm thinking about is, ‘I'm hungry’," he told.

The pink rabbit inside the jar paled.

"But..." Zorua continued, smirking at the jar.
"I figured - why just end it here when I can get payback for everytime he stood in my way, even when I was doing nothing?"

Wigglytuff gulped.

He was going to torture him! At this point, being eaten was better!

The rabbit desperately looked at Celebi, hoping that she would be kind enough to oppose Zorua... but, much to his desperation, she was grinning at Zorua.

"... Go on," she encouraged.

Zorua snickered, before getting up and moving to the jar, putting his muzzle closer to the jar, his teeth shining sinisterly through the glass.
"Ya hear me bug? Oh sure you do - listen. You're going to pay for your crimes... by being subjected to the most humiliating thing ever!" he said, his voice making the rabbit tremble in his jar, his words causing his heart to pound the insides of his chest.

The most humiliating thing ever...? The first think Wigglytuff thought about was that he was probably going to be thrown in a toilet...

But Zorua had different plans for him.

"You're going to be our pet!" he chimed, looking back at Celebi.

The fairy adopted a hesitant expression.
"... Our pet Zorua? I dunno... mom could see him in the house..." she reasoned.

"... He's a speck, Celi. And I can mask him with illusions anytime - it'll be fine!" Zorua replied.

"But..."

"Would you rather me killing him right now?"

Celebi shook her head.
"No no... we could... I don't know, leave him here like this?" she suggested.
"... He wouldn't make it to that root over there, that counts as murder." Zorua said.

"... Maybe... we could leave him in proximity of his house and let him fend for himself?" Celebi tried again.
"Yeah, with a bunch of giant careless kids running around and crushing him without even noticing... plus, he could get their attention somehow, I'm not taking the risk." the fox responded.

"Hm..."

Wigglytuff watched the giant couple discussing like his life, which depended on what they decided to do with him, was no big deal!

They couldn't keep him as a pet! They couldn't just leave him here!

That was so... frustrating, he thought with gritted teeth... though he couldn't do anything about it, he bitterly realized.

"... You could grow me back instead! I promise I won't tell anyone about this all!" he tried, seemingly getting Zorua's attention.

The fox laughed.
"Nice try bug... but not a chance." he replied. Zorua then felt something tapping his back.
"Zorua..."

The fox turned around, noticing Celebi smiling.

"About the pet thing... let's do it... he keeps all that kids without actually caring about them. Like pets. So, we're going to do the same to him!" the fairy said, and Zorua snickered.

"Good thinking girl." he praised, moving back to his original place beside his girlfriend. He eyed the pink dot inside the jar with a smirk.
"Your fate has been decided Wigglytuff! You're going to be our pet!" he told in a mockingly solemn voice that successfully scared the pink rabbit.

"Please!" he shouted, but the duo either didn't hear him or ignored him as Celebi got up, grabbing a hold of the jar.
"Now that we decided... let's go home Zorua." she said, before looking at the jar in her paws.
"Hope I don't trip over something you." she warned playfully as she started walking, Zorua hurrying to catch up with the fairy.

Wigglytuff felt sick... and not only because each step Celebi took made the jar he was trapped in vibrate.

Was he going to spend the rest of his life as a pet to these two gods?

Well... he brought that on himself, he sourly realized.

--

The rest of the day lazily went on quite uneventfully... for Celebi and Zorua.

Trapped in his jar, Wigglytuff could only watch as the duo occasionally shook his prison and laughed as they watched him being thrown back and forth within the glass confines.

The pink fairy that was Celebi's mother was off to work, so Zorua had opted to remain to his size inside of the house.

"So we get to have more fun." he told to Celebi, who agreed with him.

And now, the sun had left its place in the sky and was replaced by the moon.

Wigglytuff was silently sitting in his solitary jar, watching as the couple snuggled in bed.

Celebi was currently reading a book, head resting against Zorua's and one arm wrapped around his neck; the fox was instead munching on some chips while drinking from a soda bottle.

"Save some for later, Zorua." Celebi told, and he nodded.
"Yeah... it's way better when I'm tiny... I can feast on these!" he said cheerfully, causing Celebi to giggle.

Zorua then eyed the jar on top of Celebi's desk.
"Hey Wigglytuff, I bet you're hungry... I bet you want one of these~" he chimed, waving a chip in front of his own face before biting it and snickering.

Wigglytuff watched the fox eating longingly.

He WAS hungry... although he feared asking for food to the two...

Almost as if reading his mind, Celebi sighed and shut her book to look at her boyfriend.
"Give him one Zorua... at least the crumbs. He needs to eat after all." she said.

Zorua looked at the half-devoured chip in his paw, before taking another bite, leaving a few crumbs onto his red paw.

Snickering, he leaped from the bed and, balancing on three legs, moved closer to the jar.

"Dinnertime, bu-"

A knock at the door. Zorua looked alarmed - there was someone in the house.

He looked at Celebi terrified, and her eyes glowed.

"Honey, it's me! I'm home!"

Celebi sighed. Her mom had the keys to the house, she forgot... instantly, she sprang back to alert as she eyed the still big Zorua, who disappeared behind an illusion.

Just in time as the door opened to reveal a pink Celebi.

The mother of Zorua's girlfriend stepped in the room.
"Hello honey~" she said cheerfully as she moved to the bed to hug her daughter, who awkwardly returned the hug, knowing the Wigglytuff and Zorua were watching...

Wigglytuff...

Celebi's eyes shot open as she looked at her desk - the jar was still there!

The invisible Zorua noted Celebi's alarmed look and followed her gaze, noticing the still visible jar... he forgot to make it disappear as well.

Celebi's earlier fears were becoming reality - if her mom noticed the jar, it'd be the end.

Noticing her daughter looking at the desk, her mom broke the hug and looked in the same direction.

"Oh, a jar... why is it here Celi?" she asked.

Celebi looked away.
"Ehm... I... uh... needed it. For an experiment with the... uh... microscope...?" she told, before realizing how wrong her sentence was.

Zorua face-pawed as he watched the pink time traveler moving towards the jar, amused.

"Really? I want to see~" she said cheerfully.

Celebi desperately looked at the point where the invisible Zorua was.

The fox gritted his teeth - Celebi's mom had seen the jar... but not its prisoner...

He had to be quick.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: A miniscule pet for Celebi and Zorua

choices: "Your daughter is not who you think she is miss! And Zorua is here too!"
It's simple ma'am, I was helping her with an experiment of hers."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Zorua was about to mask him with an illusion, but he was too slow. "A small pink dot...I think it's moving...is that..." She leaned in closer and Wigglytuff's heart skipped a beat as he jumped up and down to get her attention. "Please ma'am!" He shouted, hoping she'd hear him and she seemed to shrink back.

"I think I heard it speak." She said and Celebi grew pale. It was over...

"Is that...Wigglytuff!?" She said and Wigglytuff felt an immense relief wash over him. It was over!

He shouted. "Yes, yes it's me!" and she seemed to respond before she turned to her daughter.

"Explanation, now!"

-

"So I can shrink things mom...like this." She said as she showed her mom the ability by shrinking a table vase, then growing it again. They had left Zorua and Wigglytuff in the other room as they left to the kitchen and Celebi was showing the power, dreading the fact that she'd probably have to grow Wigglytuff back now...and when she did...

-

"I should crush you right now!" Zorua snarled and Wigglytuff seemed scared, but determined.

"She knows I exist and that i'm here, do it and she'll suspect something else is here too!" Wigglytuff said and Zorua glared before grunting in frustration.

"...I ain't feeding ya now." He said and Wigglytuff smiled back.

"Oh don't worry, i'll pick up dinner on the way home." He said and Zorua had to reign in the temptation to knock the jar over.

"We're back Wigglytuff." They heard the door opening and the pink Celebi and a very pale green Celebi came in.

Silently, she moved to the jar and picked it up, depositing the inhabitant of it onto the floor. She grew him back until he was normal.

Wigglytuff smiled. "Hello ma'am." He waved and she folded her arms. "Celebi." He smirked at the younger girl who looked down.

"What were you doing here Wigglytuff?" The older pokemon asked, folding her arms.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Compromised

choices: "... As much as he deserved it... this isn't the right way,"
"... Is that so? Very well Wigglytuff... enjoy being a pet..."
"... Get out of my sight Wigglytuff... and you two, I want an explanation."
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Your daughter isn't who you think she is miss - she wanted to keep me as a pet!" Wigglytuff exclaimed, and the pink Celebi's eyes widened.

"Celi!" she yelled, her voice falling like a boulder on Celebi's heart.

Wigglytuff smirked.
"And I'll tell you one more - your daughter hangs around with not particularly good pokemon... why don't you show yourself, Zorua?" he called out for the invisible pokemon.

"... Zorua?" the pink fairy said incredulously, glaring at her daughter.

Zorua sighed. It was over... but he still had HIS confession to make.

He silently dispelled the illusion, appearing out of nowhere in front of Celebi's mom.

The green fairy sighed, the pink one looked at him coldly.

"Hello ma'am..." the fox said as calmly as he could. She stared at him.
"Why exactly are you in this house, young man? And is it true that you and my daughter hang out together... are you two in love?" the older time traveler asked.

Zorua nodded.
"Yes. Your daughter... changed me. She's really nice and helped me realize that pranks are not a good thing... I couldn't help it." he admitted sincerely.

Celebi perked up, smiling gratefully.

"Yeah - in fact, you and Celebi there pulled one nasty prank on me last night... and then you did that to me!" Wigglytuff pointed to the jar.

The mouth of the pink fairy hung open.

Her sweet daughter...

"Honey..." she said with a glare, trying to understand why in the world her daughter did such thing... with Zorua! Her daughter was in love with a scoundrel!

However, before Celebi could give an explanation, Zorua spoke up,

"Ma'am... I'll have you know that I actually quitted with pranks... I pulled my last prank on Wigglytuff here because he couldn't simply accept reality, used nasty words and attempted to menace me in public," he revealed.

Wigglytuff glared at him. Zorua grinned.
"And that's not even he tip of the iceberg,"

Celebi's mom glanced at the fox.
"... Explain yourself, young man," she commanded, and Zorua nodded.

"With pleasure ma'am... you see, dear Wigglytuff told that Celebi isn't who you think she is... but was in reality referring to himself!" he cried, causing Wigglytuff to sweat.

"Shut it." he said imperatively.
"Dream on - you blew my cover, now I'm sure ma'am will love to hear that little secret of yours..." he said, before looking at the pink Celebi, who stared at him with curiosity more than anger.

"Ma'am... have you heard of the news about Azurill's death?" he asked. The green eyes of the fairy widened.
"... Azurill dead... n-no, I haven't..." she told, shocked.

The poor mouse was...

"That because he isn't!" Zorua chimed.
"But Wigglytuff here-"

"ENOUGH!" Wigglytuff shouted, grabbing Zorua and wrapping his paw around his muzzle. But as quickly as he was grabbed, Zorua was let go of, Wigglytuff pulled back by a strong psychic force coming from Celebi's mom.

Now she was sure that Wigglytuff hid something - otherwise, he wouldn't have attempted what he just did.

"Zorua, go on," she told, the green Celebi biting her lip... the cat was out of the bag...

"Azurill is alive ma'am! But Wigglytuff faked his death for money when he didn't see him coming home! He made a fake corpse, dropped it into the forest and got money for his 'death', I heard all these things coming from Wigglytuff himself!" Zorua revealed.

The pink time traveler stared at him incredulously.

"That's right mom - Azurill is fine and happy, that's why we wanted to punish Wigglytuff... Zorua isn't a prankster anymore, but Wigglytuff couldn't accept it! He called us pathetic!" Celebi chimed, and her mother glared at the pink rabbit, who was still being held back by psychic.

"Wigglytuff..." she said venomously.

"Celebi shrunk him too!" Wigglytuff meekly revealed... this was his last hope. If the pink Celebi got angry, not the whole village was going to stop her wrath.

The pink fairy looked at her daughter, silently demanding an explanation.

"Long story short, Azurill wanted to blackmail us... we wanted to teach him a lesson - without harming him of course - before returning him..." Celebi meekly explained.

"But before we could... you already know it ma'am." Zorua told.

The pink Celebi looked in between the three pokemon, not knowing what to think.

Wigglytuff was a monster... her daughter was dating a scoundrel who, according to what they said, wasn't a scoundrel anymore except for one last - deserved - prank on Wigglytuff.

Celebi's mother sighed.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Revelations

choices: Wigglytuff gets Azurill
Meloetta stops Wigglytuff
Zorua and Celebi stop Wigglytuff
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
"Sounds like you deserve this Wigglytuff..." She glared at him as he gulped. "But this isn't the way Celebi...Zorua. We have laws, and he has a family. They deserve closure." Wigglytuff got a look of hope that was cut short as a psychic force picked him up, he found himself being dragged, as the older Celebi carried him out of her house.

Celebi and Zorua traded glances before following and soon they found themselves in the backyard of Celebi's house, with Wigglytuff pinned to the ground, struggling.

"Your own kid Wigglytuff? Really?" He tried to get up but found himself pinned. "S-sorry..." He said and was pinned further into the ground. "If you're truly sorry you'll confess to it. Kids, go get Azurill." Celebi blinked.

"But-but we can't...he's..."

"Dead? Clearly not if what you say is true." The older Celebi said.

Wigglytuff saw a rock in front of him...he tried to reach it with his paw...even pinned.

"If we get him, then the truth of Zorua and myself will have to come out too..." Celebi said and the older one looked at her.

"That's a poor reason to keep him confined. Besides, I already know, so what if others do too?" She said and a revelation seemed to occur to Celebi.

Yeah...Wigglytuff's plea backfired, there WAS no reason to keep Azurill secret. She smiled and Zorua snickered before...

the rock came hurling out of the corner of his eye and he saw it aimed for the older Celebi. "Ma'am!" he yelled and she saw it just in time and dodged, but in that time frame she released her psychic aura and Wigglytuff booked.

He was out of sight within seconds.

"Where is he!?" Zorua yelled as he gave chase, but the pink bunny had definitely left.

"...Kids...does he know where Azurill is?" She asked and the two traded worried glances before they started running too.

-

"They can't prove that Azurill didn't die if I just get rid of Azurill! And they showed me right where to find the poor deceased child...so small...so fragile..." Wigglytuff smiled a bit to himself as he ran as quick as he could through the forest. Oh yes, he'd navigate this treacherous territory. Hell, the body was in the forest right? He was definitely pinning it on Zorua now. The mansion came into view as he ran up to it and snuck to its side to open a window. He crept in, being as quiet as possible before making his way through the mansion...it was empty, and navigating it was hard considering that the only time he was in here was when he was tiny.

He found him though...in the library.

"Oh Azurill~" He whispered menacingly and the blue mouse pokemon seemed confused before turning around.

"W-Wigglytuff..." He said, surprised. "You're...normal again..."

"Yes I am~ And i'm afraid that in order to carry on with my life...yours needs to end here~" He said, approaching the tiny blue pokemon on the table, who seemed to shrink back before attempting to run. It was fruitless though. The giant pink bunny could outpace him in every regard for as tiny as Azurill was.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Trying to make the lie real

choices: ... he was extremely tiny, everyone glaring daggers at him...
... he was extremely tiny... in the open... alone...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Wigglytuff took another step, a murderous glare on his face as he extended a stubby paw in order to grab him.

One quick snap of his neck and the evidence of the fraud will be gone...

Azurill screamed as the giant pink rabbit approached his perch on top of the table.

He raised his paw... and it never descended. Wigglytuff felt something gripping his paw and hastily turned around to see two blue eyes, belonging to a white face, staring straight at him with confusion, but as calmly as they could.

"Dear sir... I do believe this is my house. Why did you enter without my permission, attempting to menace my friend over there?" Meloetta asked.

Wigglytuff laughed calmly.
"Yes... You must know that I'm Azurill's legal guardian, miss, and I happened to know that he was here... I was worried about him, so if I could take him and leave..." he told.

Meloetta's eyes widened.
"Oh... So you're that monster that faked Azurill's death I must assume?" she asked.

Wigglytuff looked back at the blue mouse, then at Meloetta.
"Miss... I have no idea what you're talking about. I love my kids - I'd never do something like that." he said.

This pokemon just had to buy it and he'd be free to-

"I heard it coming from your own mouth! The other day at the park! You told to Swinub that my body was cremated - Meloetta, he wants to kill me!" Azurill shouted.

Wigglytuff's expression dropped as he snarled.

"Damn it, you must-"

"You must leave this house this instant sir." Meloetta quietly said, pulling the rabbit back with surprising strength.

However, Wigglytuff glared at her.

"Listen here kid, let me take Azurill and nobody will get hurt... save for him anyway." he said angrily.

Meloetta inhaled deeply.

A scream broke the quietness of the house as Wigglytuff flew through the library, hitting a bookshelf pretty hard, books falling from the higher shelves and hitting his head.

The rabbit snarled as he picked up a book and threw it at Meloetta, who dodged and psychically gripped her opponent. Wigglytuff was lifted off the ground, before he touched it again... with his face... hard... several times...

"OW! CUT IT!"

In the meantime, two more pokemon got inside the library.

"Meloetta!"

The normal type stopped to look backwards, noting Celebi and Zorua standing there.

Zorua looked at the startled Azurill on the table.
"Ya fine kid?" he asked as he approached.

Azurill meekly nodded.
"I'm fine..." he told.

Wigglytuff felt another psychic force adding to Meloetta's. It was Celebi's mom.

As soon as she saw her daughter and her boyfriend running, she hurried behind them.

And they made it in time, it seemed... although it also seemed like there was no need to help Meloetta, who was handling the situation quite well.

"... Sorry for any damage I'm going to cause, dear," the pink fairy told to the younger, green headed pokemon, who released her psychic grip and went to Azurill.

Wigglytuff was slammed into the ground again.

The pink Celebi floated closer.
"You..." he flew up high, hitting his head against the ceiling.

"You attempted to hurt me." he flew back down and was slammed into the ground.
"Called my child pathetic." he was slammed into a bookshelf.
"Haunted her boyfriend for no reason." Wigglytuff was thrown out of the library.

The large rabbit hit a window, the glass shattering and him meekly sliding onto the ground in pain.

"And you..." Celebi's mom flew closer, gritted teeth, clenched fists, a glare fixed on her face.
"You faked the death of a poor kid after pretending to care for him for years!" Wigglytuff hovered into the air... before a weight dropped onto his stomach.

He opened his eyes - Zorua was standing on his belly, grinning.
"Nighty night worm." he snickered as he slammed his paws onto his chest, a wave of darkness hitting Wigglytuff, knocking him out.

The rabbit fell onto the ground, unconscious.

Zorua jumped off his stomach and turned to face Celebi, her mother, Meloetta and Azurill.

"He'll sleep for a while." he chimed.

"Good work Zorua... If I didn't believe it before, I've got my proof - you've changed." the older time traveler said with a smile... before looking at him, then at Celebi.
"Though I'll be still waiting for a few clarifications from you two later." she added.

Celebi sighed.

Meloetta hugged the shivering Azurill to her chest.

"... Sorry for the damage... again..." Celebi's mom apologized as she looked at the broken window.
"Nothing that can't be fixed~" Meloetta replied.
"Thanks for the help you all~"

"... Hey, speaking of..." Zorua eyed the unconscious Wigglytuff.
"Someone's got something flammable and a matchstick?" he snickered.

"Ahem... we talked about this earlier Zorua..." the pink Celebi said.
"Just kidding ma'am..."

The pink fairy sighed.
"Let's call police. Attempted homicide, home invasion, fraud... he's going to jail forever." she said.

However, Celebi shook her head as she moved beside her mom.

"I've got a better idea."

--

Wigglytuff felt extremely dizzy.

How much time had passed...?

He remembered - Meloetta, Celebi's mom, Zorua... they knocked him out...

He opened his eyes - were was he?

His vision cleared as he noticed...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Failed attempt and payback

choices: “I want to see my daughter one last time”
“I won’t give you the satisfaction.”
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Wigglytuff gulped...there, in front of him were the godlike faces of Meloetta, Zorua, Celebi, and her mother...glaring with murderous intent. He had to be the smallest he’d ever been...smaller than even when they tried to keep him as a pet...he whimpered before he heard a voice.

“They’re scary like that...aren’t they?” Wigglytuff turned to see Azurill...at his size.

Wigglytuff snarled and went to leap for him before a shadow was cast over him.

“Don’t take another step closer to my child, bug.” Wigglytuff looked up to the source of that powerful icy calm voice to see Meloetta raising her mountainous paw over him. A cold look in her eyes that all but proclaimed her intent.

Wigglytuff whimpered but turned his attention to Azurill.

“I’m here like this with you for a few reasons...not even I could hear you as you are now at my previous size...I wanted to look you in the eye one last time...and communicate your fate.” Azurill said and Wigglytuff looked down

“Kill me and be done with it.” He said bitterly and Azurill stared at him.

“We aren’t you, and despite everything you have obligations that need to be settled...the other kids, your daughter...I want to give you the chance to confess at least to them...and say goodbye. For their sake. I’ve made my peace with my size...I got a new mom too...make peace with yourself Wigglytuff...or don’t. It’s up to you, but I ask that you do it for their sake.”

Azurill said it calmly and Wigglytuff looked down.
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: An offer of goodbyes

choices: “Welcome back to being a pet.”
We’ll leave you like this, good luck.”
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Wigglytuff looked up, glaring at the blue mouse. This kid that HE took in...this whelp, untouchable thanks to the gods surrounding the two. This brat was looking at Wigglytuff with pity in his eyes.

“No. Do what you will to me but I won’t accept your request. Make peace? Bah! Peace with this? You’ve become a pet Azurill. A nice little bit of window dressing and you’re fine with that? For some brat teenager!”

“She’s in her 20’s...and I’m not her pet. Wigglytuff...I wanted you to give the others closure...to give your daughter peace, not make her wonder about you all her life...don’t you care about her?” Azurill asked, looking sad.

“I loved you like a dad you know...I thought...you were amazing, looking after kids like you did...but you’re not who I thought you were, you’re bitter...and only care about yourself. I’m going to find my way forward without you...without mom...I want to find something to do with myself in life...even tiny, even assumed dead...I’ll look.”

Wigglytuff laughed.

“Azurill, when you’re grown back to...what, doll size? You can’t open a door on your own! Cook! Traverse! You’re too puny, too weak! You’d have been better off dying by my hand.”

“I can’t do a lot on my own...you’re right...but i’m going to try. Meloetta...she’s...going to help me, I know it. Celebi, Buneary, Braixen...Zorua too. They’ll continue to live out there without you, happily...and they’ll help me too. I know it. Wigglytuff...goodbye.” Azurill gave him one last look of pity before he turned around and hopped around on his tail. A signal to Celebi, and soon Azurill grew into a mountain before Wigglytuff.

“He doesn’t want to make his final farewells to his kids...he says do what you’re going to do.” It was a roar to Wigglytuff, who started cowering again now that he was alone in being tiny. Zorua leaned in.

“You’re a crappy dad...not that I’m surprised. Okay bug...”
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.title: Bitter to the end

choices: The four giants are knocked out. It's just him and Azurill...
Celebi and her mom glaring down at him, both carrying a murderous expression...
1223322222133211222211323132112222211131.content:
Hundreds of miles away, a certain Emotion Pokémon suddenly detected a small blip on her radar. Wigglytuff's anger was flaring up to levels leagues beyond that of what any rational being should be capable of.

"You shrink me, kidnap me, and now you're going to leave me to die?!" Wigglytuff bellowed with rage while wagging his finger back and forth, "You pyschotic bitch! All four of you!"

The two near-identicaly Celebi which covered the sky were glaring at him. He didn't care.

"I'd stop if I were you," the massive Zorua hinted gloomily, "Wouldn't want someone to accidentally step on you..."

"I'm not going to be done in by a bunch of little kids," Wigglytuff continued undaunted; his species were quite durable and rubber-y after all, "Never underestimate a cornered rat!"

Suddenly the tip of Wigglytuff's finger shone, shooting out a jet of water. However, at such a small size the water was a mere droplet, which instantly sucked in and consumed his body. Azurill stared as Wigglytuff flailed about, just barely breaking out of it.

"Be careful with water at this size," Azruill mentioned, not being able to stop himself from smiling sardonically as Wigglytuff coughed.

"Rrrgh..." Wigglytuff groaned and used Metronome again. Something to grow him back, something to teleport him away, something to incapacitate these giants; anything was better than this!

"Celebi, you should probably stop him," Celebi's more experienced mom whispered while nudging her daughter. Wigglytuff's fingers flashed and a very very tiny Pokédoll appeared in front of him.

"Sure," Celebi replied as she put her hands together, "I'll make him so small that-"

"That will not be enough," the also very experienced Meoletta interrupted as Wigglytuff's fingers shone again, this time ejecting a small pebble.
