Victini for her part was antsy in her seat as she looked around, thinking about what was coming up later...she couldn't wait to finally get to go on a date with Zorua! She couldn't believe she'd finally worked up the courage! She hoped he hadn't just said yes to get away from her shrinking him...but this was finally her chance to win him over for real. She giggled a little, not realizing that eyes in her class were on her, seeing her blushing and giggling to herself.

"What's up with her...?"

"Who knows...I don't wanna get burned though so I ain't askin'"

Victini was unaware of the murmuring around her as she thought about later, and how she was going to approach the date...
1223322232211312232111.title: Before the date

choices: The date went fine
Zorua's sister suddenly showed up! She had tricked him...
12233222322113122321112.content:
Once more, Victini giggled to herself, unaware of the murmuring around her. She couldn't care less about class right now, the only thing that occupied her mind entirely was the incoming date with Zorua.

Each second that passed made her heart beat slightly faster.

At some point, the legendary smirked to herself as a devious plan came to her mind. Now she was sure how she was going to spend the evening with Zorua; if the fox never went on a date, she decided, he was gonna go on the biggest date of his life.

Literally.

--

Eventually, school ended and let an annoyed Zorua walk out.

The dark-type prankster stopped in front of the building, waiting for his sister.

If his parents knew he had let her wander through the woods alone to get home, he'd be eaten alive.

Though the younger Zorua really had it coming at her sometimes... like himself. That was practically the whole reason Victini shrunk him...

Zorua shook his head and sighed, the thought of Victini strong enough to enter his other thoughts about his annoying little sister as well.

"What have I gotten myself into...?" he murmured to himself, before noting a familiar pair of orange ears among the crowd of pokemon...

Without thinking, Zorua cloaked himself in an illusion as Victini came out and fluttered inches away from him, going right past him.

Luckily, she didn't even sense him.

The invisible Zorua waited for her to be gone and sighed before becoming visible again; he wasn't sure why he avoided Victini, but he guessed it would have been weird to see her publicly talking to (and possibly kissing) him.

Zorua flushed red, why couldn't he stop thinking about-

"Hi bro!"

"Ah!" Zorua screamed and jumped in place, before turning around to glare at his sister.

"Abby quit that!" he growled in annoyance, causing his sister to snicker; her snicker was much similar to his, he mused.

"Why? You do pranks all the time!" she retorted.

Zorua sighed, guessing that it was his fault if he was setting the wrong example.

"... A prank is only fun if you're not the one receiving it, remember that." he scolded, before starting to walk, his sister skipping beside him.

"Which is great, 'cause I know you're never gonna prank me!" his sister snickered, before adopting a look of false innocence,
"I mean, unless you want mom and dad to..."

"Sis, one more word, I don't care whatever mom and dad will do to me, and I'll leave you to find your way through the woods to get home." Zorua warned, exasperated.

He was already tense because of his incoming date, he didn't want to deal with his annoying sister right now.

The younger Zorua snickered again, but then went quiet, internally wondering if her big brother was capable of turning his threat into a reality.

She decided that he was, given what other pokemon in her class told her about him: last time she had pushed her luck, her favorite bow disappeared to never come back.

--

After lunch and a good rest at home, the time came for Zorua to get to the place where his date was gonna meet him.

He just hoped everything went fine, unlike it had in his dream; feeling uneasy, the dark-type left home around 6 P.M. to get to the village plaza.

He eventually got there and waited, ignoring the suspicions or hateful stares from the passing pokemon.

Time passed, without Victini showing up.

"Where is she?" he murmured to himself, already regretting this. What if she already came and didn't find him and assumed he wasn't going to show up?

Zorua shuddered, had he already messed up before even starting? Had he-

"What are you doing, Zorua!?" someone yelled real loudly, causing Zorua to jump a foot in the air before coming down to see...

"ABBY!" he screamed, ignoring the stares other pokemon shot him,
"What the hell are you doing here!?"

Zorua's younger sister pointed her paw at him.

"You've been acting too weird, bro, I wanna know what's going on!" she exclaimed.

"That's none of your business." Zorua replied, nervously glancing around to check if Victini was anywhere near them,
"Now go home, I've got something important to do."

Abby grinned.

"You're so planning to pull a prank, aren't you? Mom and dad-"

"... Already know what I'm up to. Now go home." Zorua repeated sternly.

His younger sibling groaned.

"Fine." she muttered in annoyance,
"I'll just hang around... dad would kill you if you let me go home alone... and then would kill me for going home alone. "

Zorua watched as his sister left and sighed.

"Adorable kid."

"Ah!" Zorua exclaimed, turning to face his date, who had abruptly showed up,
"Victini!" he protested, causing the cream legendary to giggle.

"Ready to go, my little Zorua?" she asked.

Zorua nodded nervously.

"Yeah... wait, 'little'? What's that-" he couldn't finish, because the world around him grew so fast that his breath was cut short.

He looked up, Victini once more a titaness to him.

Luckily, nobody seemed to notice what had happened. It was luck Zorua picked a secluded corner to wait.

"A-Again!?" the fox protested while an orange colored paw came to pick him up. Victini giggled.
"I figured it'll be so much more fun this way~" she sang, right before a pair of cream lips was pressed against Zorua, whose cheeks became as red as the giantess' palm.

"Now come on, I have a nice plan for tonight," the legendary giantess said as she began fluttering off.

From his perch, Zorua sighed.

There he was, microscopic again.

He just hoped everything went smoothly...
12233222322113122321112.title: Shrinking date

choices: It was a lively place, full of tons of other pokemon!
It was a more secluded place, with only the two of them.
122332223221131223211122.content:
Zorua looked at the passing village as he tried to hide himself within Victini's paws, as she fluttered to wherever the hell their date would be. He groaned as he looked up at the titanic legendary. "Was shrinking me again really necessary?" He asked as she smiled down at him. "Not really, but don't you worry, this'll be great! You'll have a great time and that's a Victini guarantee!" She said with enthusiasm as Zorua looked out and about at the passing giants. If some of them could get a hold of him right now...

"Hey lady! What'd you do to my brother!?" A familiar voice chimed from close by and Victini looked to and fro to see...no one. Zorua for his part only groaned. As if he needed this right now...of all the things to deal with...

Victini looked to where she had thought she heard the voice, only to find nothing. When she looked down at her own paw for Zorua, she also saw...nothing!? Where had he gone, where was he!? She looked around frantically before his faint voice called to her side. "I'm over here Victini..." The voice sounded like a mix of agitated, defeated, and tired, but it was Zorua. When Victini looked over, she saw the younger sister of Zorua, Abby...pawing at her older, now much smaller brother as he was trying to dodge her paws. Victini blinked.

"How did she...?" She shook her head before heading over as Zorua dove away from his titanic sister as quick as he could. "Whoa..." Her breath wafted over the tiny dark type as he glared at his sister, and she giggled. She then looked to Victini. "Wow, this is so cool! Did he prank you? Is that why you did this?" Victini gave a small smile to the younger pokemon as she shook her head. "Actually no, I did this preeeetty much for the fun of it." She said as she bent down, picking Zorua up and pulling him close to her chest.

"We're actually about to go have a fun evening together. I thought this would spice it up, for the both of us. Just a bit of a harmless prank on our favorite prankster." Victini said kindly as Abby blinked, before looking at the tiny ball of fluff she was holding that was supposed to be her big brother. She gave a smirk to her brother as her eyes narrowed smugly. "Wow, gotta say, I think you might've been right about pranks being fun when they aren't pulled on you, right little bro?" She said as she giggled at this. She turned her attention to Victini and held out a paw. "Hi, i'm Abby!" She said. "Zorua's big sister!" She giggled at this before Victini used her free paw to shake. "And i'm Victini, Zorua's um...date." She said, blushing and smiling to herself as she said those words.

"A date? Really Zorua? Wooow, that is crazy! Well, I suppose when mom and dad told you to grow up you might've taken the words to heart...oh, wait." She said as she gave another smug grin.

Zorua looked unimpressed as he was about ready to pull his trump card on Abby, when push comes to shove...

"Maybe he could stay like this for a while? It'd be great to play dolls, right Zorua?" Abby said as Zorua gave a nonchalant smile, no teeth at all, it almost looked...kind.

"Oh, wouldn't that be fun Abby? One last play session with Zoey before I make sure she disappears, eh?" Zorua was referring to Abby's favorite doll, a, admittedly pretty expensive Zorua doll that she'd gotten. Zorua had never messed with it and never intended to really, and he knew that Abby hid and guarded that thing pretty hard from him. Victini watched this exchange with amusement, it was pretty obvious these two were siblings, cut from the same cloth...

"Ha, as if you know..."

"Where you hide Zoey under the 5th floorboard under your bed where your snack stash is that mom and dad don't know about and that I could easily rat out? As if i'd know that...now I do believe it's time for good little sisters to go and maybe catch a movie until her big brother picks her up after his date and we can go home where no one will find out how big her brother really was that night?" Zorua finished in as kind and warm a tone as he could currently muster.

Abby's mouth hung agape as she quickly closed it, blushing before giving a nervous smile. "Um...okay Zorua. Have fun on your date..." She said as she walked off, Victini waved at her. "Don't worry, i'll bring him back here in a few hours! Have a good night, it was good meeting you Abby!" Abby looked back with a smile as she waved her paw, leaving the two in silence as they looked around. No pokemon seemed to really pay any attention to them...though they were pretty far from any others at the moment.

Zorua let out a sigh as he looked up at his date, who only had a grin. "Wow, power play." Victini said impressed as Zorua smirked. "I love my little sister to pieces, but I don't take challenges well." Zorua said smugly as he looked around. Though he knew he'd need to get new leverage now. That hiding spot was probably about to change within a week or so...

Victini started to flutter away again as Zorua opted to look at the giant buildings around him. Being this size really was a trip...and something he guessed he could try to enjoy. Victini was taking the wheel of this date it seemed anyway so he might as well go along with it.

As she looked down at the dark type in her paw she almost felt like her chest was going to explode. This was really happening...Zorua was with her on a date...and she was going to make the most of it. She soon approached the destination of their date, the place that she'd win him over for good.
122332223221131223211122.title: Abby discovers and Zorua's power play

choices: Successful Escape Attempt
Close but no cigar....
Zorua used bide!
122332223221131223212.content:
Zorua prepared himself mentally, before saying "I don't think it would work out Victini. I mean, I barely even know you!" When Zorua looked back at the giant legendary, he saw something that would make him forever regret saying no. Victini was misty eyed, just staring blank ahead, not unlike a pokemon he knew from school named Espurr.

"Victini... You ok?" Zorua questioned. Then he started to hear crying, and it doesn't take a genius to understand where it was coming from. "L-look, I'm sorry about saying no and all that, but maybe we can still be friends?"

"Y-you were supposed to say yes," Victini let out, slowly raising her voice. "You weren't supposed to reject me!"

"L-look, I'm sorry about that, but I-"

Victini suddenly cut in, shouting in a very loud tone, magnified by the fact that Victini was on an incomparable scale in comparison to him. "NO! YOU WILL LOVE ME, I WILL NOT LOSE THE LOVE OF MY LIFE! EVEN IF I HAVE TO KIDNAP YOU AND KEEP YOU FOREVER!"

At this point Zorua knew he wanted nothing to do with this lovesick giantess. He needed to plan his escape, but how?

A: Successfully escape, find another pokemon to keep watch (Please not evil people though)
B: Zorua attempts an escape attempt, but is caught by Victini and SHE IS PISSED.
C Zorua bides his time, waiting for a better opportunity to escape when she isn't nearby
122332223221131223212.title: Who said no was an answer?

choices: Sure
Nope
122332223222.content: How about Magearna, the adorable robot looking pokemon?
122332223222.title: Artificial pokemon

choices: "Erasing threat." Her eyes glow again
"Source unknown, must examine." She reaches for Zorua
"Source identify, how are you, Zorua, the school prankster?" Says with a smile.
1223322232221.content:
Zorua recognizes the pokemon, mainly because its the only pokemone that everyone at school is talking about. The mystic pokemon that is said to be artificially made, Magearna. Many people try to talk to her, but everyone says she has a rather....robotic personality. The fox doesn't know if its a good idea to try the harmless prank on the pokemon consdiering he doesn't know too much about her. Speaking of which, Magearna continues to walk until she stops.

"Warning....detecting unknown abnormally in the forest..." The steel fairy says as she looks around.

"Wow...everyone wasn't joking about robotic personality..." Zorua thoughts to himself. He wonders what the pokemon is doing. As if on que, Magearna looks up and sees the bucket.

"Abnormally detected." She says in a dull tone as her eyes starts to glow. "Potential threat, best to eliminate."

"Wait what?" Zorua heard what Magearna says before her eyes glows brightly. With less than a second, a strong beam shoots out of Magearna's eye and hits the bucket. The bucket, as well as everything connected to it, including a certain pokemon, started to glow. Before Zorua could question why, everything around him grew brightly until he soon found himself in a forest....a different forest then the one he was in. He looks around and sees strange trees that didn't look like trees, but giant blade of grass.

Suddenly the ground shakes, causing the fox to bounce up and down. Soon a loud booming sound can be heard above the strange trees.

"Source of potential threat is this way, must find and determine to either further erase threat or not." The voice was so loud, but it sounded very familiar, almost like Magearna. The ground shakes more and more violently with every second. Zorua couldn't even get on his paws to try to take a step without bouncing up and down. Soon his area grew very dark as the shaking soon stop. He looks up to see why.

Magearna stood above him, standing higher than any mountain Zorua has ever seen in his life, and she is looking right at him with her eyes glowing. "Source detected, determining to erase or not." Magearna says as she get down a bit to get a closer look at Zorua, showing no signs of recognizing Zorua as a pokemon. Zorua was scared of what she meant by erasing and tries to get her to stop.

"W-wait, I'm not a threat, I'm Zorua, the school prankster!" Zorua shouts, hoping that got the massive robot to stop. After a second, Magearna says...
1223322232221.title: Eliminating threat

choices: "Solution: I will try to grow you back."
"Solution: I will take care of you."
"Conclusion: it is better like this. Farewell, Zorua the prankster."
12233222322213.content:
The red gaze of the metallic pokemon lingered on the extremely tiny Zorua for a second more, before she spoke,

"Source identified." she said, her eyes closing and her arm raising and waving in what appeared to be a friendly salute.

Extremely inadequate, given the situation.

"How are you, Zorua the prankster?" Magearna continued in a friendlier voice, though the expression on her face didn't change.

"I'm small!" Zorua retorted angrily.

Now that Magearna recognized and the danger of being annihilated passed, he could allow himself to be angry at the giantess, who looked at her tiny victim unimpressed.

"Veracity of the statement confirmed. You are smaller than I remember." she said stoically.

Zorua groaned - was this gigantic robot even aware that she was the one shrinking him?

"Well, you did this to me!" he continued, starting to grow fed up with the giantess' nonchalance.

"Correct. It appears the Fleur Cannon I have used to eliminate the previous threat had bounced to you, causing your size to diminish exponentially." she agreed.

Zorua blinked for a second, taking in every information, finding it rather hard to get the meaning of a few of the words Magearna used.

The meaning of her statement was clear though.

"We-Well, you gotta do something! I can't stay small like this!" he shouted to the towering metal titan,
"I'll die for sure!"

Magearna blinked.

"Veracity of the statement confirmed." she repeated after a moment.

And, before Zorua's incredulous blue eyes, the metal titaness began lowering herself.

Zorua gulped, Magearna looking as tall as a skyscraper even when she was kneeling down.

The lower half of the artificial pokemon, which resembled a pokeball, touched the forest floor while her hand moved forward, in front of Zorua, who reluctantly climbed on top of it.

The hand was hard (no wonder why) but felt surprisingly warm. Her second hand joined the first, providing the dark-type with a better perch.

The tiny fox watched, intimidated, as Magearna brought him to her red eyes.

"S-So..." the illusive prankster stuttered,
"Can you... do something to... fix me?"

The fox snickered awkwardly, finding his choice of words particularly ironic. He wondered how could he laugh when he was pathetically tiny and in the hands of a potentially murderous robot.

Magearna remained silent for a few moments, thinking... elaborating her answer.

After a minute, her robotic, though distinctly feminine voice spoke again,
12233222322213.title: In the hands of Magearna

choices: Can you help me on how to make "friends?"
Can you tell me what to be shrunk, i wish to record the experience.
There seem to be some kind of event happening at school, what is a school dance?
122332223222132.content:
"What do you mean take care of me?" Zorua asks as he felt Magearna stating to stand up. "I said fix me, as in, grow me back."

"Negative, cannot reverse effect." The pokemon says, not even looking at Zorua as she starts to walk.

"What do you mean by that, I'm stuck at this size?" Zorua says, not liking the idea of being a tiny fox for the rest of his life. How in the world is he going to explain this to his parents and sister.

"Negative, effects not permanent. I just don't have ability to reverse shrinking yet." Magearna says. "Fluer Cannon's shrinking capability is experimental as I just created said effect yesterday."

"Great...nice to know it works well on living beings." Zorua says, not liking this more.

"Affirmative, now to work on opposite effect." Magearna says as she looks at Zorua with a smile. "Till then, you shall accompany me at my house until reversal of size is complete."

"Wait, i can't do that. I have to go home, figure out on how to explain my tiny size with my folks." Zorua says as he tries to walk back to see how far it is to the ground before Magearna proceed to use her other hand to pin him down.

"Negative, at current size, even a joltik will be a potential threat should it become hostile. On top of that, it will be very difficult to explain to your 'folk' without having to demonstrate Fluer Cannon again."

"Nope nope, no need to do that." Zorua says as he can figure the desaster it would be if Magearna tries to explain to his family with the fluer cannon. "But can we at least some explain to my parents that i'm staying at your place so they aren't worry."

"Of course, i will send letter if that should suffice." Magearna says in her usaul tone.

"Sure...i guess that can work..." Zorua says as he tries to figure out what to say to his parents of the unexpected "sleepover" he is going to be having.

"Until problem is resolve, can i request something from you, Zorua the prankster?" Magearna asks.

"Just Zorua," He says as he can tell already that this strange pokemon is going to be very literal with everything. "And what is it?" Slightly worry of what this pokemon is going to ask him.

Magearna looks at the pokemon and ask the following question:
122332223222132.title: Massive Caretaker

choices: "Demand: you shall be my partner."
"Demand: you're gonna help me find a partner."
1223322232221323.content:
"It appears something is going on at school," Magearna began explaining,
"An event, which is defined 'school dance'. I wish to know about it, Zorua the prankster. Can you inform me about it?"

"It's just Zorua." the tiny dark type repeated, before adopting a very perplexed expression,
"Are you really asking me that?"

How could someone not know what that kind of event was, he mused.

"Affirmative."

Zorua sighed.

"Well... it's, uh..." he couldn't express himself, feeling embarrassed,
"... Can we go to your place and get things with my family done before I tell ya? That's... kinda more urgent."

"Affirmative. Hold on." Magearna replied, turning around and starting to walk the way she came with the tiny Zorua in her metallic hands.

The dark-type looked around longingly, wondering how long it was gonna take before he could get his size back.

Until then, he mused with a sigh, he was forced to stick to a weirdo robot girl that was asking him what a school dance was.

Could life be any weirder?

--

It didn't take too long for the unusual couple to move from the woods to Magearna's house.

"Destination reached. We're here, Zorua the prankster." she announced.

Zorua, who was now laying flat on the metal hand, didn't even bother to correct her; instead, he shot a gaze at the place Magearna had brought him to.

The house looked more of a workshop than an actual livable building.

Magearna used her free hand to push the door open and enter.

"Welcome, Zorua the prankster." she said, closing the door while her tiny passenger took a look around.

The inside of the house was big, albeit a bit strange.

Magearna walked in what to be her living room which, aside from a couch and a TV, had several tools and written sheets laying in perfect order on a table.

Zorua could not believe someone could be so obsessed with order and cleanliness; he certainly wasn't.

"So, uh... nice place?" he stated, trying to make casual conversation.

"Compliment registered. Answer: thank you, Zorua the prankster." Magearna replied, her free hand patting the fox on the back affectionately.

"Now I shall write the letter that will inform your family about you staying over. Elaborating possibilities... it is better if they do not know about your current situation, expected bad reaction in the contrary case."

"That's for sure." Zorua flatly said while Magearna went to sit at the table, placing her tiny 'guest' down.

She grabbed a white sheet and a pen from the same table and began writing rather fastly.

"Elaborating correct choice of words..." she mumbled every once in awhile.

While she wrote, Zorua had the chance to look around again.

It seemed to him that the house was completely deserted aside from him and his giant host.

"Hey Magearna, do you live alone?" he questioned, causing the metal giantess to look up from her sheet.

"Affirmative." she replied, before her eyes got half lidded in what Zorua judged to be a sad expression,
"I do not know who my creator was or about his actual conditions."

Zorua felt an idiot for bringing up such subject.

"That's, uh... I'm sorry." he muttered an apology while Magearna returned to writing.

After a while though, she looked up again.

"Letter 100% written. Results satisfying." she declared.

Zorua took a look at the written sheet, which announced,

'Dear Mr. and Mrs.,
Your son, Zorua, will be staying at my house for a school assignment which requires the cooperation of both and that will last a few days. In said time, Zorua will be fine and taken care of flawlessly. You'll be informed if anything negative happens.


Magearna.'


"That sounds rather menacing." Zorua commented.

"Negative." Magearna replied, looking at the tiny fox.
"Now, Zorua the prankster, can you tell me about the subject I already mentioned?"

Zorua blushed, but shrugged.

"It's only an event where you ask someone to be your partner to dance at school, really. It's supposed to be fun, but I've personally never gone. Kind of annoying to me." he explained, before looking at the giantess before him,
"Are you... going?" he asked.

He didn't know why, but he couldn't imagine Magearna joining such occurrence; when he tried picturing her dancing, he couldn't help but feel weirded out.

"Affirmative." the metal titaness replied,
"I will be joining the 'dance', though I currently lack a 'partner'... elaborating... Zorua the prankster?" she asked then, causing Zorua to sigh.

"Yeah?"

"I have decided that, in exchange for my help to grow you back to your previous and original size, you are going to do something for me." Magearna said.

Zorua perked up, what?

"W-What do you mean?" he asked,
"... What do you want me to do?"

A small cloud of steam exited through Magearna's long ears, leading Zorua to believe she was embarrassed.

Regardless, she spoke.
1223322232221323.title: Magearna's odd request

choices: "Negative due to time constraints. You will be my partner as is."
"Affirmative"
12233222322213231.content:
The words caught the diminutive prankster off guard as he looked at the metal titaness, her face not changing in the slightest as she looked at him. "Y-you want me...to be your date at the dance?" Zorua said, somewhat flabbergasted.

"Affirmative." Was the response he got, her tone not changing.

"...Yeah, no." Zorua said in a dismissive tone.

"Error: Zorua the prankster, you accepted my terms then denied my terms." Magearna looked down, unaware that Zorua out and out said no.

He sighed, somewhat exasperated at this situation. He was sure his sister would be laughing herself silly if she saw this. "I'll clarify then. I ain't going to the stupid school dance!" Zorua said, stamping his front paws on the table that he stood on. Magearna didn't seem to react at first, leaving Zorua hanging for a second.

"...Uh, Mage-"

"Query for Zorua the prankster. Do you wish to return to a survivable size?" She said.

"Of course I do, like this I-"

"Query for Zorua the prankster. Do you need my assistance to return to a survivable size?" It was the same tone, but a sense of dread started to wash over Zorua as she kept going.

"Um...y-yeah, I suppose..."

"Query for Zorua the prankster. Will you be my partner at the 'school dance'?" She said. Zorua could swear there was a bit of smugness beneath that robotic stoicism, he couldn't tell for sure, but he KNEW it was there.

"T-that's...Magearna! I'm a quadruped! I don't dance well!" Zorua said, trying to come up with an adequate excuse.

"I am able to assist Zorua the prankster in learning 'dancing'." Magearna said. Zorua's jaw hung open. He could not believe this crap! She was trying to FORCE him to say yes. But as he thought about it, he realized that if he kept saying no he might be with this weirdo pokemon for a long time...at this size...with no freedom...no pranking! He gulped as he steeled his resolve.

"If, I agree...IF I agree! You promise that you'll have me back to normal...soonish?" Zorua said.

Magearna nodded at this. "Affirmative."

Zorua gritted his teeth as he looked up at her, he was caught in a crappy situation for sure...but all things considered, he was left without much choice. This artificial pokemon had him over a barrel...he never expected her to be capable of blackmail of all things.

"Fine." He said, still through gritted teeth. "I will accompany you to the freaking school dance." Magearna at this allowed herself a small smile.

"Consent has been received. Proceeding to plan for event 'school dance'." She said as she gently picked Zorua up, bringing him level with her red eyes. He gulped a bit. "So uh...h-hey, you'll have me back to normal before this dance, right?" He asked.

Magearna was silent for a moment as she registered what Zorua the prankster asked.
12233222322213231.title: Won't take no for an answer

choices: Magearna returns, and with someone that Zorua knows
Magearna returns with food and book
Skip to the day of the dance
122332223222132311.content:
"Go to the dance at this size?" Zorua couldn't believe what Magearna is saying to him. "You got to be joking."

"Negative, I know no joke other than why is six afraid of seven." Magearna says, making Zorua really wish he could tell if she is telling the truth past that constant stoic expression of hers. "Calculation of possible ability to reverse your size will take approximately one day after the school dance."

Zorua couldn't believe this, he will have to wait the day after the dance to grow back to normal. Many thoughts ranges from the embaressment of the idea of everyone at school knowing he is tiny to the fear of getting crush by many classmates that will not pay attention to his tiny size.

"Magearna, isn't that dangerous. I could possibly be crush or something." Zorua says.

"Possibility are high." Magearna says, not even remotely adding comfort to the poor fox. "But you are with me, and i will make sure that nothing bad could possibly happen to you in the time period of your small size with a 98% chance of success."

"A-and the other two percent?"

"You are subjugated to either teasing by other pokemon or nonstop petting and being call 'cute' by other pokemon." Magearna says before moving her hand closer to her eyes. "The latter probably from I should i feel like it."

Zorua doesn't know what to say after that last part from the metal titaness before shaking his head a bit to collect his thought. "O-ok, but how in the world am i going to dance with you at this size?"

"Solution unknown." Magearna says as she tries to think of something but nothing comes in mind. "Will find possibilities to your question during time of working on Fluer Cannon."

Zorua feels a pit in his stomach as he wonders how in the world he is going to survive a single dance from this strange girl. Before he could question anything else, he felt Magearna moving him towards the table.

"I am going to deliver the letter to your family, as well as a few things ranging from a book on how to dance as well as food for you." She says as she stands up before leaving. "I will return shortly, feel free to make yourself comfortable until i return." She says as she leaves to the door before leaving the house and leaving the tiny fox only on the table.

"......I'm so screw for that dance." Zorua says to himself as he lays on the table, feeling a little weirded out at the thought that his first date is with a strange robotic girl he only met today will be at a dance while at the size of tiny bug. "What next?"
122332223222132311.title: Poor timing to get shrunk

choices: "I'll stay a little longer." She say with a smile
"Sorry, but i'll head back home." She says with thought of food in the mind
"How about i stay over as well?" She suggest with Magearna accepting the idea.
1223322232221323111.content:
An hour has past since Magearna has left the house. Zorua still on the table, hasn't move much maily because he really doesn't know what to do in this house of the strange girl. It wasn't long till he started hearing the front doorknob turning.

"Zorua the prankster, i have return from the task." Magearna says as she opens the door. "However, I seem to have also brought a guest who was very insistent on accompanying me back here."

"A guest, who...?" Zorua didn't bother finishing that question as he turn stone as he sees who came with Magearna.

"Brother!~" A female voice chimes as a hyperactive fox, the same type as Zorua, rushes past Magearna and ran straight to Zorua.

"S-sis!?" Zorua tries to run away as fast as he possibly could, with no luck as the titanic fox hovers above before slamming her paws in front of Zorua's path, blocking from leaving his spot.

"Oh my, you're so tiny~" The female Zorua says as she giggles and grabs her brother, poking and petting him.

"Why her....?" Zorua says in distress as he struggle to fruitlessly escape his sister's playful grasp.

"It is as i said, your sister insist on accompanying me as soon as i deliver the message to your house." Magearna says as she walks to the table and sets what looks like a "how to..." book and wrap bag that has Zorua's name on it.

"Mom and dad said it was ok for you to hang out, but they also wanted to make sure you have some stuff pack as well," The sister says as she began to nuzzle Zorua. "And i said i wanted to deliver it, as the loving sister i am." She says with a toothy grin.

"Lier, you just wanted to see what kind of situation i have gotten into this time." Zorua states, knowing how nosey his sister loves to be, with said sister saying nothing but giving a innocent look.

"Explaination might be in order," Magearna says with Zorua trying to stop her, only to have the massive sister placing her paw on his mouth to prevent him from speaking.

"Let me guess, he tried to pull a prank and you decide give some pay back?" The sister says flatly, like she expected this to be the case.

"Slightly inaccurate, i thought Zorua the prankster was a threat and accidently shrunk him with Fluer cannon." Magearna explain. "I am now procceding to reverse effect of said Fluer cannon, but approximation may take a day after the dance."

"Dance?" The sister was confuse at first before her eyes started to gleam a bit and her grin returns.

"Abby, its not what you think." Zorua nervously says as he sees his sister looking at him.

"Bro, you sly fox." She says as she giggles more. "Well, i won't say anything about this to mom and dad, this is too good to tell."

"Abby, i'm only doing to as a deal so Magearna will fix me back." Zorua tries to explain with Abby having no intrest in caring if its true or not.

"Whatever you say, Zorua the shrimpy." She says, remembering the small title Magearna adresses Zorua and decides to tease him.

"Pardon me." Magearna decides to interupt the siblings' talk. "I am going to start working on the Fluer cannon's growth feature before procedding to take some time with Zorua the shrimpy..." Seems Magearna decides to update Zorua to the somewhat more accurate title brought upon from Abby.

"Don't call me that, just Zorua." Zorua says, feeling worse of this whole thing than before, though Magearna shows no signs of awknowledging Zorua's plea.

"...would you like to stay for a while longer or would you wish to head to your home?" Magearna asks as she waits for a response.

"Hmm, well it would be fun to stay and talk about all sorts of funny stuff about bro and see what you two might be doing for the dance." Abby says outloud as she sets her brother back on the table. "But, mom is making delious dinner tonight...." Abby thoughts to herself before deciding.

1223322232222.title: Singing legend

choices: ... Concerned, "What happened to you?"
... Annoyed, "I suppose it was you before!"
12233222322221.content:
As soon as Zorua laid eyes on what was going to be his next victim, he hesitated and took a step back, the rope in his mouth being pulled slightly, threatening to make the bucket fall from its perch. Luckily, it stayed in place.

For now, Zorua decided it was good his prank didn't fall.

After all, it was never a good idea to mess with a legendary, and one with her power, well...

Meloetta was fluttering towards his prank, blissfully unaware, looking around nonchalantly. Was she looking for him? Odd, since, all the times the two met, they didn't exchange a single word.

Because, unlike most Pokemon in school, Zorua wasn't really interested in the admittedly pretty legendary, but didn't try to prank her either. The two simply ignored each other.

But why was Meloetta in HIS forest right now? Pokemon just avoided it, knowing what awaited them.

As for Meloetta, Zorua only really knew about her legendary status, which made her a dangerous target.

However, she was also supposedly nice from what the prankster had heard.

But, risk or not, it all paled when Zorua thought about how high his reputation was going to be when he told he had managed to prank a legendary and get away with it. In fact, only few Pokemon ever caught Zorua after getting pranked.

Sure, they paid him back harshly, but he was sure he could get away from Meloetta, as he was with all of his previous victims.

After making up his mind, the fox waited and, as the green-headed legendary fluttered towards the branch the bucket was resting on, he pulled the rope, causing it to fall.

Time seemed to slow down and, for a moment, Zorua's mind saw his bucket falling on Meloetta, spluttering its contents onto her.

But it was just a mirage.

On the very last second the legendary looked up and, noting that she was about to be hit by the bucket, did what everyone would do in a situation like that: she screamed.

However, hers was no normal scream, because it sent out of her mouth a wave of sound so sharp that the bucket was blown away and unceremoniously fell to the ground while Zorua was forced to cower in his hiding spot, deafened.

He felt his ears ringing for several moments, until the pain started to loosen its grip, allowing him to open his eyes, only to discover that things were way different than he expected.

The forest now looked like an endless jungle, while the same Pokemon that had screamed...

Zorua felt his blood growing colder.

When did Meloetta become so tall!? She was impossibly huge to him now! As a matter of fact, everything around Zorua was!

It meant... that he had shrunken down! But... how? Why? What was going on?

There had to be an explanation to this, and the only one he could think of was...

Zorua looked in Meloetta's direction.

As questions raged inside of the dark-type's head, Meloetta was busy looking around, trying to figure out who had tried to 'attack' her.

"Who's there?" she called, sounding upset now that she had realized that the 'ambush' was nothing more than a prank,
"This is not funny! Come on out!"

Instinctively, Zorua took a step back.

As for Meloetta, seeing as she wasn't receiving any response, she warily called out again,

"Stay away from me!"

After that, the legendary resumed flying, though at a faster pace than before. Evidently, the prank startled her enough to make her enter an agitated state.

When the giantess fluttered near him, Zorua's mind quickly put two and two together, and he snapped out of a trance.

Surely, he couldn't stay like this and be left on his own by the very Pokemon that shrank him in the first place without her even knowing.

He had to get her attention, or she was going to leave without even knowing what she did!

Hastily, the diminutive fox stumbled to his feet and sprinted behind the green headed giantess, trying to keep up with her.

It wasn't easy, given her bigger stature and the gift of flight.

Zorua had to get her attention fast, or she was going to just leave him behind.

"H-Hey! Meloetta!" the fox cried at the top of his lungs as he sped towards the singing legendary, desperately hoping she'd hear him.

Luckily for him, Meloetta thought she heard someone calling her name and stopped in mid-air, looking curious.

"Huh?" she wondered,
"Did someone call me?"

Zorua finally arrived right beneath her hovering form and stood underneath her toeless white feet.

"Yes!" he screamed, cheering since Meloetta could apparently still hear him. He guessed he wasn't that tiny, after all, but he still didn't want to be the size he was now.
"Meloetta! Down here!"

The giantess seemed to hear him perfectly, because her blue eyes suddenly looked down, scanning the forest floor for a couple moments before they finally set onto Zorua and widened as they recognized the poor fox.

For a moment, Meloetta was speechless. However, Zorua wasn't,

"Meloetta! You've got to help me!" he cried, jumping up.

The legendary recovered from the surprise.

"Zo-Zorua?" she stuttered as her slender form began lowering and she brought her face closer to Zorua to better see him,
"Is that you?"

"Yes, it's me!" the fox replied, somewhat relieved.

For a minute, Meloetta just stared at him in disbelief, wondering why Zorua was tiny and calling for her. Then, the giantess found her composure.

Zorua nervously stared back as he noted Meloetta staring at him...

1223323.title: The Disaster Pokemon

choices: Go into town for a day off, and do some shopping, and then relax after that!
Look around the guild and find a Pokemon to do a mission with you!
12233231.content:
You, being a Absol of course, were deep in thought as you stared at the job posting board in front of you. Being apart of a one man, or in this case, one Pokemon rescue team and all meant that missions had to be completed. Missions ranged from rescuing Pokemon lost in dungeons, retrieving a item, or sometimes even defeating a Pokemon outlaw. However you were a solo team, comprising of you...and no one else. You could say that you were above average in doing missions. There are some missions that you can handle by yourself, and you have pretty good strength. However, there were still quite a bit that gave you trouble.

You sigh as you look away from the board and step back. Some of the jobs were just way too difficult, and others were too simple and offered little reward. You were friends and on good terms with a lot of the guild members in your guild. You could possibly ask one of your fellow guild members to come along with you on a more difficult mission, it would make things a lot easier, plus you wouldn't get as bored, since you would have some company to tag along with you. Plus missions are always fun and exhilarating, giving you a sense of adventure.

On the other paw, you could just use this as a day off and head into town. The town was always bustling with Pokemon and shops, so it could keep you busy for the day. You had some poke stored away in the bank that you've wanted to spend for a while now. A day of shopping could be fun, and you would get new items to help you out on missions. And after you did shopping you would have a few hours to just chill and relax for the rest of the day.

You gave it some thought, tapping a paw against your head, thinking of what to do to for today. You thought of the pros and cons of both options. After thinking over it you decided that you wanted to...
12233231.title: Absol

choices: Ask Floatzel
Ask Quilava
Check out the mess hall
122332312.content:
After some thought you decided that you were feeling too restless to spend a day relaxing and the idea of getting more money from missions was always nice. You figured it wouldn't hurt to do tougher assignment so you made your way down to the guild to find yourself a partner to do them with you. A quick walk later and you were pushing open the door to the guild main hall. Already you could see some potential candidates.

The first one you noticed was Floatzel. She was a newcomer to the town and rose through the ranks quickly. Much like you, she did most of her missions solo but right now she was looking quite bored. A cute yawn emphasized her boredom as she leaned against the wall with her arms crossed, her eyes just staring at the middle distance. From the looks of things she had nothing to do and might enjoy the suggestion of going on a mission to give her something to do. A few times now you've chatted with her and she seemed easy-going so it shouldn't be a problem. You were also curious about a special ability she was rumored to have but that was just gossip you've heard a few times...

Another Pokemon that you can see that may join you was Quilava. As soon as you looked at him your eyes met and he gave you an enthusiastic wave with his stubby paw. You've never gone on a mission with him either but from what you've seen from him around the village he's very energetic and passionate. There were only a select few you can recall that actively go on missions with him and besides that small friend group of his, most other Pokemon avoided him. Perhaps he was overbearing or had some other personality trait you didn't know about, not that you would know. Regardless, he would definitely come along if you asked him.

Or you could just check out the mess hall. Judging from the racket coming from it there were a bunch of different Pokemon currently finishing their lunch.

12233321.content: Okay, now the pokemon who have the change size power is a legendary pokemon or a normal pokemon?
12233321.title: Riolu

info.brief_description: A pokemom gains the power to shrink or grow others, even themself, but which pokemon?
info.description:
As the title says, a pokemon somehow gains the power to change the size of others as well as themselfs. Yes there are plenty of pokemon size related interaction, but let's somewhat make things interesting.

The pokemon has to be a pokemon, no anthro or furry, its not because i don't like them but rather its too easy to make to turn them into anthro and go from there. So as said, i'm strictly not going to allow anthro for this one.

Second, no worshipping, disgusting interaction like pee or scat or anything like that. I will delete any chapters like that without question.

Third, you can either play as the pokemon that is changing the size of other or themself, or you can be someone else that is watching the size changing pokemon, be it a pokemon or human. Another thing, please make the pokemon either a boy or a girl, including legendary pokemons. I normally prefer giantess interaction, but this time i will allow giants as well, just to see how this goes.

Forth, please only one size changing pokemon. They can shrink or grow other as they like, but only one pokemon is allow to change size. There is no limit to how big or small everyone gets, so go nuts.

Last rule for now, please put effort into at least making a paragraph with proper grammar. If its to make options for choosing a pokemon then i don't mind a short sentence or two.

Other then that, you're free to do whatever you want, from making the pokemon playful and destroy cities to even shrink pokemon or humans and do whatever they want, go wild...just not too wild. I'll be changing rules later, but only in for something i forgot to add in. Other than that, please enjoy and please add in more chapters.
